name: 3/4 Sit-Up
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo and secure your feet. Your piernas should be bent at the rodillas.
Place your manos behind or to the side of your head. You will begin with your back on the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Flex your hips and spine to raise your torso toward your rodillas.
At the top of the contraction your torso should be perpendicular to the suelo. Reverse the motion, going only ¾ of the way down.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: 90/90 Hamstring
instructions: Lie on your back, with one leg extended straight out.
With the other leg, bend the hip and knee to 90 degrees. You may brace your leg with your manos if necessary. This will be your starting posición.
Extend your leg straight into the air, pausing briefly at the top. Regresa the leg to the starting posición.
Repite for 10-20 repetitions, and then Cambia to the other leg.

name: Ab Crunch Machine
instructions: Selecciona a light resistance and Siéntate down on the ab machine placing your feet under the pads provided and grabbing the top handles. Your brazos should be bent at a 90 degree angle as you rest the triceps on the pads provided. This will be your starting posición.

At the same time, begin to Levanta the piernas up as you crunch your upper torso. Respira out as you perform this movement. Tip: Be sure to use a slow and controlled motion. Concentrate on using your abs to move the peso while relaxing your piernas and feet.
After a second pause, Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Ab Roller
instructions: Sostén the Ab Roller with both manos and kneel on the suelo.
Now place the ab roller on the suelo in front of you so that you are on all your manos and rodillas (as in a kneeling Empuja up posición). This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente roll the ab roller straight forward, stretching your cuerpo into a straight posición. Tip: Go down as far as you can without touching the suelo with your cuerpo. Respira in during this portion of the movement.
After a pause at the stretched posición, start pulling yourself back to the starting posición as you Respira out. Tip: Go Lentamente and Mantén your abs tight at all times.

name: Adductor
instructions: Lie face down with one leg on a foam roll.
Rotate the leg so that the foam roll contacts against your inner thigh. Shift as much peso onto the foam roll as can be tolerated.
While trying to relax the muscles if the inner thigh, roll over the foam between your hip and knee, holding points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite with the other leg.

name: Adductor/Groin
instructions: Lie on your back with your feet raised towards the ceiling.
Have your partner Sostén your feet or ankles. Abduct your piernas as far as you can. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to squeeze your piernas together for 10 or more seconds, while your partner prevents you from doing so.

Now, relax the muscles in your piernas as your partner pushes your feet apart, stretching as far as is comfortable for you. Be sure to let your partner know when the stretch is adequate to prevent overstretching or injury.

name: Advanced con Pesa Rusa Windmill
instructions: Clean and Press a kettlebell overhead with one arm.

Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, Empuja your butt out in the direction of the locked out kettlebell. Mantén the non-working arm behind your back and turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the kettlebell.
Baja yourself as far as possible.
Pause for a second and reverse the motion back to the starting posición.

name: Air Bike
instructions: Lie flat on the suelo with your Baja back pressed to the suelo. For this exercise, you will need to put your manos beside your head. Be careful however to not strain with the neck as you perform it. Now Levanta your shoulders into the crunch posición.
Bring rodillas up to where they are perpendicular to the suelo, with your Baja piernas parallel to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

Now simultaneously, Lentamente go through a cycle pedal motion kicking forward with the right leg and bringing in the knee of the left leg. Bring your right elbow close to your left knee by crunching to the side, as you Respira out.
Go back to the initial posición as you Respira in.
Crunch to the opposite side as you cycle your piernas and bring closer your left elbow to your right knee and Exhala.
Continue alternating in this manner until all of the recommended repetitions for each side have been completed.

name: All Fours Quad Stretch
instructions: Start off on your manos and rodillas, then Levanta your leg off the suelo and Sostén the foot with your hand.
Use your hand to Sostén the foot or ankle, keeping the knee fully flexed, stretching the quadriceps and hip flexors.
Focus on extending your hips, thrusting them towards the suelo. Sostén for 10-20 seconds and then Cambia sides.

name: Alternate Hammer Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright and a dumbbell in each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
The palms of the manos should be facing your torso. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the right peso forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Continue the movement until your biceps is fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite the movement with the left hand. This equals one repetition.
Continue alternating in this manner for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Alternate Heel Touchers
instructions: Lie on the suelo with the rodillas bent and the feet on the suelo around 18-24 inches apart. Your brazos should be extended by your side. This will be your starting posición.
Crunch over your torso forward and up about 3-4 inches to the right side and touch your right heel as you Sostén the contraction for a second. Exhala while performing this movement.
Now go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala.

Now crunch over your torso forward and up around 3-4 inches to the left side and touch your left heel as you Sostén the contraction for a second. Exhala while performing this movement and then go back to the starting posición as you Inhala. Now that both heels have been touched, that is considered 1 repetition.
Continue alternating sides in this manner until all prescribed repetitions are done.

name: Alternate Incline con Mancuerna Curl
instructions: Siéntate down on an incline Banco with a dumbbell in each hand being held at brazos length. Tip: Mantén the elbows close to the torso.This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the right peso forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. As you do so, rotate the hand so that the palm is facing up. Continue the movement until your biceps is fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Lentamente begin to bring the dumbbell back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite the movement with the left hand. This equals one repetition.
Continue alternating in this manner for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Alternate Leg Diagonal Bound
instructions: Assume a comfortable stance with one foot slightly in front of the other.
Begin by pushing off with the front leg, driving the opposite knee forward and as high as possible before landing. Attempt to cover as much distance to each side with each bound.
It may help to use a line on the suelo to guage distance from side to side.
Repite the sequence with the other leg.

name: Alternating en Cable Shoulder Press
instructions: Move the cables to the bottom of the tower and Selecciona an appropriate peso.
Grasp the cables and Sostén them at shoulder height, palms facing forward. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your head and chest up, extend through the elbow to Press one side directly over head.
After pausing at the top, Regresa to the starting posición and Repite on the opposite side.

name: Alternating Deltoid Raise
instructions: In a standing posición, Sostén a pair of mancuernas at your side.
Keeping your elbows slightly bent, raise the weights directly in front of you to shoulder height, avoiding any swinging or cheating.
Regresa the weights to your side.
On the next repetition, raise the weights laterally, raising them out to your side to about shoulder height.
Regresa the weights to the starting posición and continue alternating to the front and side.

name: Alternating Floor Press
instructions: Lie on the suelo with two kettlebells next to your shoulders.
posición one in place on your chest and then the other, gripping the kettlebells on the handle with the palms facing forward.
Extend both brazos, so that the kettlebells are being held above your chest. Baja one kettlebell, bringing it to your chest and turn the wrist in the direction of the locked out kettlebell.
Raise the kettlebell and Repite on the opposite side.

name: Alternating Hang Clean
instructions: Place two kettlebells between your feet. To get in the starting posición, Empuja your butt back and look straight ahead.

Clean one kettlebell to your shoulder and Sostén on to the other kettlebell in a hanging posición. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrist as you do so.
Baja the cleaned kettlebell to a hanging posición and clean the alternate kettlebell. Repite.

name: Alternating con Pesa Rusa Press
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders. Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so.
Press one directly overhead by extending through the elbow, turning it so the palm faces forward while holding the other kettlebell stationary .
Baja the pressed kettlebell to the starting posición and immediately Press with your other arm.

name: Alternating con Pesa Rusa Row
instructions: Place two kettlebells in front of your feet. Bend your rodillas slightly and Empuja your butt out as much as possible. As you bend over to get into the starting posición grab both kettlebells by the handles.

Tira one kettlebell off of the suelo while holding on to the other kettlebell. Retract the shoulder blade of the working side, as you flex the elbow, drawing the kettlebell towards your stomach or rib cage.
Baja the kettlebell in the working arm and Repite with your other arm.

name: Alternating Renegade Row
instructions: Place two kettlebells on the suelo about shoulder width apart. posición yourself on your toes and your manos as though you were doing a pushup, with the cuerpo straight and extended. Use the handles of the kettlebells to support your upper cuerpo. You may need to posición your feet wide for support.
Empuja one kettlebell into the suelo and Remo the other kettlebell, retracting the shoulder blade of the working side as you flex the elbow, pulling it to your side.
Then Baja the kettlebell to the suelo and begin the kettlebell in the opposite hand. Repite for several reps.

name: Ankle Circles
instructions: Use a sturdy object like a Sentadilla rack to Sostén yourself.

Levanta the right leg in the air (just around 2 inches from the suelo) and perform a circular motion with the big toe. Pretend that you are drawing a big circle with it. Tip: One circle equals 1 repetition. Respira normally as you perform the movement.
When you are done with the right foot, then Repite with the left leg.

name: Ankle On The Knee
instructions: From a lying posición, bend your rodillas and Mantén your feet on the suelo.
Place your ankle of one foot on your opposite knee.
Grasp the thigh or knee of the bottom leg and Tira both of your piernas into the chest. Relax your neck and shoulders. Sostén for 10-20 seconds and then Cambia sides.

name: Anterior Tibialis-SMR
instructions: Begin seated on the suelo with your piernas bent and your feet on the suelo.

Using a Muscle Roller or a rolling pin, apply pressure to the muscles on the outside of your shins. Work from just below the knee to above the ankle, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite on the other leg.

name: Anti-Gravity Press
instructions: Place a bar on the suelo behind the head of an incline Banco.
Lay on the Banco face down. With a pronated grip, pick the barra up from the suelo. Flex the elbows, performing a reverse Curl to bring the bar near your chest. This will be your starting posición.
To begin, Press the barra out in front of your head by extending your elbows. Mantén your brazos parallel to the suelo throughout the movement.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite to complete the set.

name: Arm Circles
instructions: Párate up and extend your brazos straight out by the sides. The brazos should be parallel to the suelo and perpendicular (90-degree angle) to your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Lentamente start to make circles of about 1 foot in diameter with each outstretched arm. Respira normally as you perform the movement.
Continue the circular motion of the outstretched brazos for about ten seconds. Then reverse the movement, going the opposite direction.

name: Arnold con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Siéntate on an exercise Banco with back support and Sostén two mancuernas in front of you at about upper chest level with your palms facing your cuerpo and your elbows bent. Tip: Your brazos should be next to your torso. The starting posición should look like the contracted portion of a dumbbell Curl.
Now to perform the movement, raise the mancuernas as you rotate the palms of your manos until they are facing forward.
Continue lifting the mancuernas until your brazos are extended above you in straight arm posición. Respira out as you perform this portion of the movement.

After a second pause at the top, begin to Baja the mancuernas to the original posición by rotating the palms of your manos towards you. Tip: The left arm will be rotated in a counter clockwise manner while the right one will be rotated clockwise. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Around The Worlds
instructions: Lay down on a flat Banco holding a dumbbell in each hand with the palms of the manos facing towards the ceiling. Tip: Your brazos should be parallel to the suelo and next to your thighs. To avoid injury, make sure that you Mantén your elbows slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Now move the mancuernas by creating a semi-circle as you displace them from the initial posición to over the head. All of the movement should happen with the brazos parallel to the suelo at all times. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Reverse the movement to Regresa the peso to the starting posición as you Exhala.

name: Atlas Stone Trainer
instructions: This trainer is effective for developing Atlas Stone strength for those who don't have access to stones, and are typically made from bar ends or heavy pipe.
Begin by loading the desired peso onto the bar. Straddle the peso, wrapping your brazos around the implement, bending at the hips.

Begin by pulling the peso up past the rodillas, extending through the hips. As the peso clears the rodillas, it can be lapped by resting it on your thighs and sitting back, hugging it tightly to your chest.
Finish the movement by extending through your hips and rodillas to raise the peso as high as possible. The peso can be returned to the lap or to the suelo for successive repetitions.

name: Atlas Stones
instructions: Begin with the atlas stone between your feet. Bend at the hips to wrap your brazos vertically around the Atlas Stone, attempting to get your fingers underneath the stone. Many stones will have a small flat portion on the bottom, which will make the stone easier to Sostén.
Pulling the stone into your torso, drive through the back half of your feet to Tira the stone from the suelo.
As the stone passes the rodillas, lap it by sitting backward, pulling the stone on top of your thighs.

Siéntate low, getting the stone high onto your chest as you change your grip to reach over the stone. Párate, driving through with your hips. Close distance to the loading platform, and lean back, extending the hips to get the stone as high as possible.

name: Axle Deadlift
instructions: Approach the bar so that it is centered over your feet. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hip to grip the bar at shoulder width, allowing your shoulder blades to protract. Typically, you would use an over/under grip.

With your feet and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and flex the rodillas until your shins contact the bar. Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward.
After the bar passes the rodillas, aggressively Tira the bar back, pulling your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward into the bar.
Baja the bar by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Back Flyes - With con Bandas
instructions: Run a band around a stationary post like that of a Sentadilla rack.
Grab the band by the handles and Párate back so that the tension in the band rises.

Extend and Levanta the brazos straight in front of you. Tip: Your brazos should be straight and parallel to the suelo while perpendicular to your torso. Your feet should be firmly planted on the suelo spread at shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala, move your brazos to the sides and back. Mantén your brazos extended and parallel to the suelo. Continue the movement until the brazos are extended to your sides.
After a pause, go back to the original posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Backward Drag
instructions: Load a sled with the desired peso, attaching a rope or straps to the sled that you can Sostén onto.
Begin the exercise by moving backwards for a given distance. Leaning back, extend through the piernas for short steps to move as quickly as possible.

name: Backward Medicine Ball Throw
instructions: This exercise is best done with a partner. If you lack a partner, the ball can be thrown and retrieved or thrown against a wall.
Begin standing a few meters in front of your partner, both facing the same direction. Begin holding the ball between your piernas.
Sentadilla down and then forcefully reverse direction, coming to full Extensión and you toss the ball over your head to your partner.
Your partner can then roll the ball back to you. Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Balance Board
instructions: Place a balance board in front of you.
Párate up on it and try to balance yourself.
Sostén the balance for as long as desired.

name: Ball Leg Curl
instructions: Begin on the suelo laying on your back with your feet on top of the ball.
posición the ball so that when your piernas are extended your ankles are on top of the ball. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your hips off of the suelo, keeping your peso on the shoulder blades and your feet.
Flex the rodillas, pulling the ball as close to you as you can, contracting the hamstrings.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Banda Assisted Pull-Up
instructions: Choke the band around the center of the pullup bar. You can use different bands to provide varying levels of assistance.
Tira the end of the band down, and place one bent knee into the loop, ensuring it won't slip out. Take a medium to wide grip on the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Tira yourself upward by contracting the lats as you flex the elbow. The elbow should be driven to your side. Tira to the front, attempting to get your chin over the bar. Avoid swinging or jerking movements.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Banda Good Morning
instructions: Using a 41 inch band, Párate on one end, spreading your feet a small amount. Bend at the hips to loop the end of the band behind your neck. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your piernas straight, extend through the hips to come to a near vertical posición.
Ensure that you do not round your back as you go down back to the starting posición.

name: con Banda Good Morning (Pull Through)
instructions: Loop the band around a post. Standing a little ways away, loop the opposite end around the neck. Your manos can help Sostén the band in posición.
Begin by bending at the hips, getting your butt back as far as possible. Mantén your back flat and bend forward to about 90 degrees. Your rodillas should be only slightly bent.
Regresa to the starting posición be driving through with the hips to come back to a standing posición.

name: con Banda Hip Adductions
instructions: Anchor a band around a solid post or other object.
Párate with your left side to the post, and put your right foot through the band, getting it around the ankle.
Párate up straight and Sostén onto the post if needed. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the knee straight, raise your right piernas out to the side as far as you can.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite for the desired rep count.
Cambia sides.

name: con Banda Pull Apart
instructions: Begin with your brazos extended straight out in front of you, holding the band with both manos.
Initiate the movement by performing a reverse Aperturas motion, moving your manos out laterally to your sides.
Mantén your elbows extended as you perform the movement, bringing the band to your chest. Ensure that you Mantén your shoulders back during the exercise.
Pause as you complete the movement, returning to the starting posición under control.

name: con Banda Skull Crusher
instructions: Secure a band to the base of a rack or the Banco. Lay on the Banco so that the band is lined up with your head.
Take Sostén of the band, raising your elbows so that the upper arm is perpendicular to the suelo. With the elbow flexed, the band should be above your head. This will be your starting posición.
Extend through the elbow to straighten your arm, keeping your upper arm in place. Pause at the top of the motion, and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Barra Ab Rollout
instructions: For this exercise you will need to get into a pushup posición, but instead of having your manos of the suelo, you will be grabbing on to an Olympic barra (loaded with 5-10 lbs on each side) instead. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping a slight arch on your back, Levanta your hips and roll the barra towards your feet as you Exhala. Tip: As you perform the movement, your glutes should be coming up, you should be keeping the abs tight and should maintain your back posture at all times. Also your brazos should be staying perpendicular to the suelo throughout the movement. If you don't, you will work out your shoulders and back more than the abs.
After a second contraction at the top, start to roll the barra back forward to the starting posición Lentamente as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Ab Rollout - On Knees
instructions: Sostén an Olympic barra loaded with 5-10lbs on each side and kneel on the suelo.
Now place the barra on the suelo in front of you so that you are on all your manos and rodillas (as in a kneeling Empuja up posición). This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente roll the barra straight forward, stretching your cuerpo into a straight posición. Tip: Go down as far as you can without touching the suelo with your cuerpo. Respira in during this portion of the movement.
After a second pause at the stretched posición, start pulling yourself back to the starting posición as you Respira out. Tip: Go Lentamente and Mantén your abs tight at all times.

name: con Barra Bench Press - Medium Grip
instructions: Lie back on a flat Banco. Using a medium width grip (a grip that creates a 90-degree angle in the middle of the movement between the forearms and the upper brazos), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
From the starting posición, Respira in and begin coming down Lentamente until the bar touches your middle chest.

After a brief pause, Empuja the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out. Focus on pushing the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición at the top of the motion, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: Ideally, lowering the peso should take about twice as long as raising it.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: con Barra Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding a barra at a shoulder-width grip. The palm of your manos should be facing forward and the elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting posición.
While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Curls Lying Against An Incline
instructions: Lie against an incline Banco, with your brazos holding a barra and hanging down in a horizontal line. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping the upper brazos stationary, Curl the peso up as high as you can while squeezing the biceps. Respira out as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Only the forearms should move. Do not swing the brazos.
After a second contraction, Lentamente go back to the starting posición as you Inhala. Tip: Make sure that you go all of the way down.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Deadlift
instructions: Párate in front of a loaded barra.

While keeping the back as straight as possible, bend your rodillas, bend forward and grasp the bar using a medium (shoulder width) overhand grip. This will be the starting posición of the exercise. Tip: If it is difficult to Sostén on to the bar with this grip, alternate your grip or use wrist straps.

While holding the bar, start the Levanta by pushing with your piernas while simultaneously getting your torso to the upright posición as you Respira out. In the upright posición, stick your chest out and contract the back by bringing the shoulder blades back. Think of how the soldiers in the military look when they are in standing in attention.

Go back to the starting posición by bending at the rodillas while simultaneously leaning the torso forward at the waist while keeping the back straight. When the weights on the bar touch the suelo you are back at the starting posición and ready to perform another repetition.
Perform the amount of repetitions prescribed in the program.

name: con Barra Full Squat
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack just above shoulder level. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder-width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times and maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición.

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas and sitting back with your hips as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until your hamstrings are on your calves. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel or middle of your foot as you straighten the piernas and extend the hips to go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Glute Bridge
instructions: Begin seated on the suelo with a loaded barra over your piernas. Using a fat bar or having a pad on the bar can greatly reduce the discomfort caused by this exercise. Roll the bar so that it is directly above your hips, and lay down flat on the suelo.
Begin the movement by driving through with your heels, extending your hips vertically through the bar. Your peso should be supported by your upper back and the heels of your feet.
Extend as far as possible, then reverse the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Barra Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: Using a medium width grip (a grip that creates a 90-degree angle in the middle of the movement between the forearms and the upper brazos), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over your neck with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, bring the bar down Lentamente until it is about 1 inch from your neck.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: con Barra Hack Squat
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a barra behind you at brazos length and your feet at shoulder width. Tip: A shoulder width grip is best with the palms of your manos facing back. You can use wrist wraps for this exercise for a better grip. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping your head and eyes up and back straight, Sentadilla until your upper thighs are parallel to the suelo. Respira in as you Lentamente go down.
Pressing mainly with the heel of the foot and squeezing the thighs, go back up as you Respira out.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Hip Thrust
instructions: Begin seated on the suelo with a Banco directly behind you. Have a loaded barra over your piernas. Using a fat bar or having a pad on the bar can greatly reduce the discomfort caused by this exercise.
Roll the bar so that it is directly above your hips, and lean back against the Banco so that your shoulder blades are near the top of it.

Begin the movement by driving through your feet, extending your hips vertically through the bar. Your peso should be supported by your shoulder blades and your feet. Extend as far as possible, then reverse the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Barra Incline Bench Press - Medium Grip
instructions: Lie back on an incline Banco. Using a medium-width grip (a grip that creates a 90-degree angle in the middle of the movement between the forearms and the upper brazos), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on you upper chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, squeeze your chest, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: it should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: con Barra Incline Shoulder Raise
instructions: Lie back on an Incline Banco. Using a medium width grip (a grip that is slightly wider than shoulder width), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos straight. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the brazos straight, Levanta the bar by protracting your shoulder blades, raising the shoulders from the Banco as you Respira out.
Bring back the bar to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Lunge
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack just below shoulder level. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and step forward with your right leg and Sentadilla down through your hips, while keeping the torso upright and maintaining balance. Inhala as you go down. Note: Do not allow your knee to go forward beyond your toes as you come down, as this will put undue stress on the knee joint. li>
Using mainly the heel of your foot, Empuja up and go back to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite the movement for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform with the left leg.

name: con Barra Rear Delt Row
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a barra using a wide (higher than shoulder width) and overhand (palms facing your cuerpo) grip.

Bend rodillas slightly and bend over as you Mantén the natural arch of your back. Let the brazos hang in front of you as they Sostén the bar. Once your torso is parallel to the suelo, flare the elbows out and away from your cuerpo. Tip: Your torso and your brazos should resemble the letter "T". Now you are ready to begin the exercise.

While keeping the upper brazos perpendicular to the torso, Tira the barra up towards your upper chest as you squeeze the rear delts and you Respira out. Tip: When performed correctly, this exercise should resemble a Banco Press in reverse. Also, refrain from using your biceps to do the work. Focus on targeting the rear delts; the brazos should only act as hooks.
Lentamente go back to the initial posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Rollout from Bench
instructions: Place a loaded barra on the suelo, near the end of a Banco. Kneel with both piernas on the Banco, and take a medium to narrow grip on the barra. This will be your starting posición.

To begin, extend through the hips to Lentamente roll the bar forward. As you roll out, flex the shoulder to roll the bar above your head. Ensure that your brazos remain extended throughout the movement.
When the bar has been moved as far forward as possible, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Barra Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Place a block about 12 inches in front of a flat Banco.
Siéntate on the Banco and place the ball of your feet on the block.
Have someone place a barra over your upper thighs about 3 inches above your rodillas and Sostén it there. This will be your starting posición.
Raise up on your toes as high as possible as you squeeze the calves and as you Respira out.
After a second contraction, Lentamente go back to the starting posición. Tip: To get maximum benefit stretch your calves as far as you can.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Shoulder Press
instructions: Siéntate on a Banco with back support in a Sentadilla rack. posición a barra at a height that is just above your head. Grab the barra with a pronated grip (palms facing forward).

Once you pick up the barra with the correct grip width, Levanta the bar up over your head by locking your brazos. Sostén at about shoulder level and slightly in front of your head. This is your starting posición.
Baja the bar down to the shoulders Lentamente as you Inhala.
Levanta the bar back up to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Shrug
instructions: Párate up straight with your feet at shoulder width as you Sostén a barra with both manos in front of you using a pronated grip (palms facing the thighs). Tip: Your manos should be a little wider than shoulder width apart. You can use wrist wraps for this exercise for a better grip. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your shoulders up as far as you can go as you Respira out and Sostén the contraction for a second. Tip: Refrain from trying to Levanta the barra by using your biceps.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Shrug Behind The Back
instructions: Párate up straight with your feet at shoulder width as you Sostén a barra with both manos behind your back using a pronated grip (palms facing back). Tip: Your manos should be a little wider than shoulder width apart. You can use wrist wraps for this exercise for better grip. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your shoulders up as far as you can go as you Respira out and Sostén the contraction for a second. Tip: Refrain from trying to Levanta the barra by using your biceps. The brazos should remain stretched out at all times.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Side Bend
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a barra placed on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck). Your feet should be shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping your back straight and your head up, bend only at the waist to the right as far as possible. Respira in as you bend to the side. Then Sostén for a second and come back up to the starting posición as you Exhala. Tip: Mantén the rest of the cuerpo stationary.
Now Repite the movement but bending to the left instead. Sostén for a second and come back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Side Split Squat
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a barra placed on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck). Your feet should be placed wide apart with the foot of the lead leg angled out to the side. This will be your starting posición.
Baja your cuerpo towards the side of your angled foot by bending the knee and hip of your lead leg and while keeping the opposite leg only slightly bent. Respira in as you Baja your cuerpo.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the hip and knee of the lead leg. Respira out as you perform this movement.
After performing the recommended amount of reps, Repite the movement with the opposite leg.

name: con Barra Squat
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack to just below shoulder level. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas and hips as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Squat To A Bench
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first place a flat Banco or a box behind you. The flat Banco is used to teach you to set your hips back and to hit depth.

Then, set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas and sitting your hips back as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until you slightly touch the Banco behind you. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas and extend the hips to go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Barra Step Ups
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a barra placed on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) and Párate upright behind an elevated platform (such as the one used for spotting behind a flat Banco). This is your starting posición.

Place the right foot on the elevated platform. Step on the platform by extending the hip and the knee of your right leg. Use the heel mainly to Levanta the rest of your cuerpo up and place the foot of the left leg on the platform as well. Respira out as you execute the force required to come up.

Step down with the left leg by flexing the hip and knee of the right leg as you Inhala. Regresa to the original standing posición by placing the right foot of to next to the left foot on the initial posición.
Repite with the right leg for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform with the left leg.

name: con Barra Walking Lunge
instructions: Begin standing with your feet shoulder width apart and a barra across your upper back.

Step forward with one leg, flexing the rodillas to drop your hips. Descend until your rear knee nearly touches the suelo. Your posture should remain upright, and your front knee should stay above the front foot.
Drive through the heel of your lead foot and extend both rodillas to raise yourself back up.
Step forward with your rear foot, repeating the Zancada on the opposite leg.

name: Battling Ropes
instructions: For this exercise you will need a heavy rope anchored at its center 15-20 feet away. Standing in front of the rope, take an end in each hand with your brazos extended at your side. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by rapidly raising one arm to shoulder level as quickly as you can.
As you let that arm drop to the starting posición, raise the opposite side.
Continue alternating your left and right brazos, whipping the ropes up and down as fast as you can.

name: Bear Crawl Sled Drags
instructions: Wearing either a harness or a loose peso belt, attach the chain to the back so that you will be facing away from the sled. Bend down so that your manos are on the suelo. Your back should be flat and rodillas bent. This is your starting posición.
Begin by driving with piernas, alternating left and right. Use your manos to maintain balance and to help Tira. Try to Mantén your back flat as you move over a given distance.

name: Behind Head Chest Stretch
instructions: Siéntate upright on the suelo with your partner behind you.
Place your manos behind your hand, and Empuja your elbows back as far as you can. Your partner should Sostén your elbows. This will be your starting posición.
Gently attempt to Tira your elbows forward with your manos still behind your head for 10 or more seconds. Your partner should prevent your elbows from moving.

Now, relax your muscles and have your partner gently Tira the elbows back as far as it comfortable for you. Be sure to let your partner know when the stretch is adequate to prevent overstretching or injury.

name: Bench Dips
instructions: For this exercise you will need to place a Banco behind your back. With the Banco perpendicular to your cuerpo, and while looking away from it, Sostén on to the Banco on its edge with the manos fully extended, separated at shoulder width. The piernas will be extended forward, bent at the waist and perpendicular to your torso. This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente Baja your cuerpo as you Inhala by bending at the elbows until you Baja yourself far enough to where there is an angle slightly smaller than 90 degrees between the upper arm and the forearm. Tip: Mantén the elbows as close as possible throughout the movement. Forearms should always be pointing down.
Using your triceps to bring your torso up again, Levanta yourself back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bench Jump
instructions: Begin with a box or Banco 1-2 feet in front of you. Párate with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Perform a short Sentadilla in preparation for the jump; swing your brazos behind you.
Rebound out of this posición, extending through the hips, rodillas, and ankles to jump as high as possible. Swing your brazos forward and up.
Jump over the Banco, landing with the rodillas bent, absorbing the impact through the piernas.
Turn around and face the opposite direction, then jump back over the Banco.

name: Bench Press - Powerlifting
instructions: Begin by lying on the Banco, getting your head beyond the bar if possible. Tuck your feet underneath you and arch your back. Using the bar to help support your peso, Levanta your shoulder off the Banco and retract them, squeezing the shoulder blades together. Use your feet to drive your traps into the Banco. Maintain this tight cuerpo posición throughout the movement.
However wide your grip, it should cover the ring on the bar. Tira the bar out of the rack without protracting your shoulders. Focus on squeezing the bar and trying to Tira it apart.
Baja the bar to your Baja chest or upper stomach. The bar, wrist, and elbow should stay in line at all times.
Pause when the barra touches your torso, and then drive the bar up with as much force as possible. The elbows should be tucked in until lockout.

name: Bench Press - With con Bandas
instructions: Using a flat Banco secure a band under the leg of the Banco that is nearest to your head.
Once the band is secure, grab it by both handles and Recuéstate on the Banco.
Extend your brazos so that you are holding the band handles in front of you at shoulder width.
Once at shoulder width, rotate your wrists forward so that the palms of your manos are facing away from you. This will be your starting posición.
Bring down the handles Lentamente until your elbow forms a 90 degree angle. Mantén full control at all times.

As you Respira out, bring the handles up using your pectoral muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, squeeze your chest, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.

name: Bench Press with Chains
instructions: Adjust the leader chain, shortening it to the desired length.Place the chains on the sleeves of the bar.

Lying on the Banco, get your head beyond the bar if possible. Tuck your feet underneath you and arch your back. Using the bar to help support your peso, Levanta your shoulder off the Banco and retract them, squeezing the shoulder blades together. Use your feet to drive your traps into the Banco. Maintain this tight cuerpo posición throughout the movement. However wide your grip, it should cover the ring on the bar.

Tira the bar out of the rack without protracting your shoulders. Focus on squeezing the bar and trying to Tira it apart. Baja the bar to your Baja chest or upper stomach. The bar, wrist, and elbow should stay in line at all times.
Pause when the barra touches your torso, and then drive the bar up with as much force as possible. The elbows should be tucked in until lockout.

name: Bench Sprint
instructions: Párate on the suelo with one foot resting on a Banco or box with your heel close to the edge.
Empuja off with your foot on top of the Banco, extending through the hip and knee.
Land with the opposite foot on top of the box, returning your other foot back to the start posición.
Continue alternating from one foot to another to complete the set.

name: Bent-Arm con Barra Pullover
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco with a barra using a shoulder grip width.
Sostén the bar straight over your chest with a bend in your brazos. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping your brazos in the bent arm posición, Baja the peso Lentamente in an arc behind your head while breathing in until you feel a stretch on the chest.
At that point, bring the barra back to the starting posición using the arc through which the peso was lowered and Exhala as you perform this movement.
Sostén the peso on the initial posición for a second and Repite the motion for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: Bent-Arm con Mancuerna Pullover
instructions: Place a dumbbell standing up on a flat Banco.

Ensuring that the dumbbell stays securely placed at the top of the Banco, lie perpendicular to the Banco (torso across it as in forming a cross) with only your shoulders lying on the surface. Hips should be below the Banco and piernas bent with feet firmly on the suelo. The head will be off the Banco as well.

Grasp the dumbbell with both manos and Sostén it straight over your chest with a bend in your brazos. Both palms should be pressing against the underside one of the sides of the dumbbell. This will be your starting posición. Caution: Always ensure that the dumbbell used for this exercise is secure. Using a dumbbell with loose plates can result in the dumbbell falling apart and falling on your face.
While keeping your brazos locked in the bent arm posición, Baja the peso Lentamente in an arc behind your head while breathing in until you feel a stretch on the chest.
At that point, bring the dumbbell back to the starting posición using the arc through which the peso was lowered and Exhala as you perform this movement.
Sostén the peso on the initial posición for a second and Repite the motion for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: Bent-Knee Hip Raise
instructions: Lay flat on the suelo with your brazos next to your sides.
Now bend your rodillas at around a 75 degree angle and Levanta your feet off the suelo by around 2 inches.

Using your Baja abs, bring your rodillas in towards you as you maintain the 75 degree angle bend in your piernas. Continue this movement until you raise your hips off of the suelo by rolling your pelvis backward. Respira out as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: At the end of the movement your rodillas will be over your chest.
Squeeze your abs at the top of the movement for a second and then Regresa to the starting posición Lentamente as you Respira in. Tip: Maintain a controlled motion at all times.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Over con Barra Row
instructions: Holding a barra with a pronated grip (palms facing down), bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén the head up. The barra should hang directly in front of you as your brazos hang perpendicular to the suelo and your torso. This is your starting posición.

Now, while keeping the torso stationary, Respira out and Levanta the barra to you. Mantén the elbows close to the cuerpo and only use the forearms to Sostén the peso. At the top contracted posición, squeeze the back muscles and Sostén for a brief pause.
Then Inhala and Lentamente Baja the barra back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Over con Mancuerna Rear Delt Raise With Head On Bench
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a dumbbell in each hand and with an incline Banco in front of you.

While keeping your back straight and maintaining the natural arch of your back, lean forward until your forehead touches the Banco in front of you. Let the brazos hang in front of you perpendicular to the suelo. The palms of your manos should be facing each other and your torso should be parallel to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your torso forward and stationary, and the brazos straight with a slight bend at the elbows, Levanta the mancuernas straight to the side until both brazos are parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you Levanta the weights. Caution: avoid swinging the torso or bringing the brazos back as opposed to the side.
After a one second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas back to the starting posición.
Repite the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Over Low-Pulley Side Lateral
instructions: Selecciona a peso and Sostén the handle of the low pulley with your right hand.

Bend at the waist until your torso is nearly parallel to the suelo. Your piernas should be slightly bent with your left hand placed on your Baja left thigh. Your right arm should be hanging from your shoulder in front of you and with a slight bend at the elbow. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your right arm, elbow slightly bent, to the side until the arm is parallel to the suelo and in line with your right ear. Respira out as you perform this step.
Lentamente Baja the peso back to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and Repite the movement with the other arm.

name: Bent Over One-Arm Long Bar Row
instructions: Put peso on one of the ends of an Olympic barra. Make sure that you either place the other end of the barra in the corner of two walls; or put a heavy object on the suelo so the barra cannot slide backward.
Bend forward until your torso is as close to parallel with the suelo as you can and Mantén your rodillas slightly bent.
Now grab the bar with one arm just behind the plates on the side where the peso was placed and put your other hand on your knee. This will be your starting posición.

Tira the bar straight up with your elbow in (to maximize back stimulation) until the plates touch your Baja chest. Squeeze the back muscles as you Levanta the peso up and Sostén for a second at the top of the movement. Respira out as you Levanta the peso. Tip: Do not allow for any swinging of the torso. Only the arm should move.

Lentamente Baja the bar to the starting posición getting a nice stretch on the lats. Tip: Do not let the plates touch the suelo. To ensure the best range of motion, I recommend using small plates (25-lb ones) as opposed to larger plates (like 35-45lb ones).
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and Cambia brazos.

name: Bent Over Two-Arm Long Bar Row
instructions: Put peso on one of the ends of an Olympic barra. Make sure that you either place the other end of the barra in the corner of two walls; or put a heavy object on the suelo so the barra cannot slide backward.
Bend forward until your torso is as close to parallel with the suelo as you can and Mantén your rodillas slightly bent.
Now grab the bar with both brazos just behind the plates on the side where the peso was placed and put your other hand on your knee. This will be your starting posición.

Tira the bar straight up with your elbows in (to maximize back stimulation) until the plates touch your Baja chest. Squeeze the back muscles as you Levanta the peso up and Sostén for a second at the top of the movement. Respira out as you Levanta the peso. Tip: Use a stirrup or double handle cable attachment by hooking it under the end of the bar.

Lentamente Baja the bar to the starting posición getting a nice stretch on the lats. Tip: Do not let the plates touch the suelo. To ensure the best range of motion, I recommend using small plates (25-lb ones) as opposed to larger plates (like 35-45lb ones).
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Over Two-con Mancuerna Row
instructions: With a dumbbell in each hand (palms facing your torso), bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward by bending at the waist; as you bend make sure to Mantén your back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén the head up. The weights should hang directly in front of you as your brazos hang perpendicular to the suelo and your torso. This is your starting posición.

While keeping the torso stationary, Levanta the mancuernas to your side (as you Respira out), keeping the elbows close to the cuerpo (do not exert any force with the forearm other than holding the weights). On the top contracted posición, squeeze the back muscles and Sostén for a second.
Lentamente Baja the peso again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Over Two-con Mancuerna Row With Palms In
instructions: With a dumbbell in each hand (palms facing each other), bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén the head up. The weights should hang directly in front of you as your brazos hang perpendicular to the suelo and your torso. This is your starting posición.

While keeping the torso stationary, Levanta the mancuernas to your side as you Respira out, squeezing your shoulder blades together. On the top contracted posición, squeeze the back muscles and Sostén for a second.
Lentamente Baja the peso again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Bent Press
instructions: Clean a kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulder. The wrist should rotate as you do so. This will be your starting posición.

Begin my leaning to the side opposite the kettlebell, continuing until you are able to touch the suelo with your free hand, keeping your eyes on the kettlebell. As you do so, Press the peso vertically be extending through the elbow, keeping your arm perpendicular to the suelo.
Regresa to an upright posición, with the kettlebell above your head. Regresa the kettlebell to the shoulder and Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Bicycling
instructions: To begin, seat yourself on the bike and adjust the seat to your height.

name: Bicycling, Stationary
instructions: To begin, seat yourself on the bike and adjust the seat to your height.

Selecciona the desired option from the menu. You may have to start pedaling to turn it on. You can use the manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to use. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. The level of resistance can be changed throughout the workout. The handles can be used to monitor your heart rate to help you stay at an appropriate intensity.

name: Board Press
instructions: Begin by lying on the Banco, getting your head beyond the bar if possible. One to five boards, made out of 2x6's, can be screwed together and held in place by a training partner, bands, or just tucked under your shirt.

Tuck your feet underneath you and arch your back. Using the bar to help support your peso, Levanta your shoulder off the Banco and retract them, squeezing the shoulder blades together. Use your feet to drive your traps into the Banco. Maintain this tight cuerpo posición throughout the movement.

You can take a standard Banco grip, or shoulder width to focus on the triceps. Tira the bar out of the rack without protracting your shoulders. The bar, wrist, and elbow should stay in line at all times. Focus on squeezing the bar and trying to Tira it apart.
Baja the bar to the boards, and then drive the bar up with as much force as possible. The elbows should be tucked in until lockout.

name: Body-Up
instructions: Assume a plank posición on the suelo. You should be supporting your bodyweight on your toes and forearms, keeping your torso straight. Your forearms should be shoulder-width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Pressing your palms firmly into the suelo, extend through the elbows to raise your cuerpo from the suelo. Mantén your torso rigid as you perform the movement.
Lentamente Baja your forearms back to the suelo by allowing the elbows to flex.
Repite.

name: Body Tricep Press
instructions: posición a bar in a rack at chest height.
Standing, take a shoulder width grip on the bar and step a yard or two back, feet together and brazos extended so that you are leaning on the bar. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by flexing the elbow, lowering yourself towards the bar.
Pause, and then reverse the motion by extending the elbows.
Progress from bodyweight by adding chains over your shoulders.

name: Peso Corporal Flyes
instructions: posición two equally loaded EZ bars on the suelo next to each other. Ensure they are able to roll.
Assume a Empuja-up posición over the bars, supporting your peso on your toes and manos with your brazos extended and cuerpo straight.
Place your manos on the bars. This will be your starting posición.
Using a slow and controlled motion, move your manos away from the midline of your cuerpo, rolling the bars apart. Inhala during this portion of the motion.
After moving the bars as far apart as you can, Regresa to the starting posición by pulling them back together. Exhala as you perform this movement.

name: Peso Corporal Mid Row
instructions: Begin by taking a medium to wide grip on a Tira-up apparatus with your palms facing away from you. From a hanging posición, tuck your rodillas to your chest, leaning back and getting your piernas over your side of the Tira-up apparatus. This will be your starting posición.
Beginning with your brazos straight, flex the elbows and retract the shoulder blades to raise your cuerpo up until your piernas contact the Tira-up apparatus.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Peso Corporal Squat
instructions: Párate with your feet shoulder width apart. You can place your manos behind your head. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing your rodillas and hips, sitting back with your hips.
Continue down to full depth if you are able,and quickly reverse the motion until you Regresa to the starting posición. As you Sentadilla, Mantén your head and chest up and Empuja your rodillas out.

name: Peso Corporal Walking Lunge
instructions: Begin standing with your feet shoulder width apart and your manos on your hips.

Step forward with one leg, flexing the rodillas to drop your hips. Descend until your rear knee nearly touches the suelo. Your posture should remain upright, and your front knee should stay above the front foot.
Drive through the heel of your lead foot and extend both rodillas to raise yourself back up.
Step forward with your rear foot, repeating the Zancada on the opposite leg.

name: Bosu Ball en Cable Crunch With Side Bends
instructions: Connect a standard handle to each arm of a cable machine, and posición them in the most downward posición.
Grab a Bosu Ball and posición it in front and center of the cable machine.
Recuéstate on the Bosu Ball with the small of your back arched around the ball. Your rear end should be close to the suelo without touching it.
With both manos, reach back and grab the handle of each cable.
With your feet positioned in a wide stance, extend your brazos straight out in front of you and in between your rodillas. Your manos should be at knee level.
Mantén your brazos straight and in-line with the upward angle of the cable. Elevate your torso in a crunching motion without dropping or bending your brazos.
Maintain the rigid posición with your brazos. Lentamente descend back to the starting posición with your back arched around the Bosu Ball and your abdominals elongated.
Repite the same series of movements to failure.
Once you reach failure, Mantén your abs tight and raise your torso into plank posición so your back is elevated off the Bosu Ball.
Baja your brazos down to your side; Mantén them straight. Start doing alternating side bends; reach for your heels! This finishing movement will focus on your obliques.

name: Bottoms-Up Clean From The Hang Position
instructions: Initiate the exercise by standing upright with a kettlebell in one hand.
Swing the kettlebell back forcefully and then reverse the motion forcefully. Crush the kettlebell handle as hard as possible and raise the kettlebell to your shoulder.

name: Bottoms Up
instructions: Begin by lying on your back on the suelo. Your piernas should be straight and your brazos at your side. This will be your starting posición.

To perform the movement, tuck the rodillas toward your chest by flexing the hips and rodillas. Following this, extend your piernas directly above you so that they are perpendicular to the suelo. Rotate and elevate your pelvis to raise your glutes from the suelo.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Box Jump (Multiple Response)
instructions: Assume a relaxed stance facing the box or platform approximately an arm's length away. brazos should be down at the sides and piernas slightly bent.
Using the brazos to aid in the initial burst, jump upward and forward, landing with feet simultaneously on top of the box or platform.
Immediately drop or jump back down to the original starting place; then Repite the sequence.

name: Box Skip
instructions: You will need several boxes lined up about 8 feet apart.
Begin facing the first box with one leg slightly behind the other.
Drive off the back leg, attempting to gain as much height with the hips as possible.

Immediately upon landing on the box, drive the other leg forward and upward to gain height and distance, leaping from the box. Land between the first two boxes with the same leg that landed on the first box.
Then, step to the next box and Repite.

name: Box Squat
instructions: The box Sentadilla allows you to Sentadilla to desired depth and develop explosive strength in the Sentadilla movement. Begin in a power rack with a box at the appropriate height behind you. Typically, you would aim for a box height that brings you to a parallel Sentadilla, but you can train higher or Baja if desired.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wider for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings, or closer together for more quad development. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Pause when you reach the box, and relax the hip flexors. Never bounce off of a box.
Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward off of the box as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe.

name: Box Squat with con Bandas
instructions: Begin in a power rack with a box at the appropriate height behind you. Set up the bands on the sleeves, secured to either band pegs, the rack, or mancuernas so that there is appropriate tension. If mancuernas are used, secure them so that they don't move. Also, ensure that the mancuernas you are using are heavy enough for the bands that you are using. Additional plates can be used to Sostén the mancuernas down. If more tension is needed, you can either widen the base on the suelo or choke the bands. Typically, you would aim for a box height that brings you to a parallel Sentadilla, but you can train higher or Baja if desired.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wider for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings, or closer together for more quad development. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Pause when you reach the box, and relax the hip flexors. Never bounce off of a box.

Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward off of the box as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe. Use care to Regresa the barra to the rack.

name: Box Squat with Chains
instructions: Begin in a power rack with a box at the appropriate height behind you. Typically, you would aim for a box height that brings you to a parallel Sentadilla, but you can train higher or Baja if desired.

To set up the chains, begin by looping the leader chain over the sleeves of the bar. The heavy chain should be attached using a snap hook. Adjust the length of the lead chain so that a few links are still on the suelo at the top of the movement.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wider for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings, or closer together for more quad development. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Pause when you reach the box, and relax the hip flexors. Never bounce off of a box.
Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward off of the box as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe.

name: Brachialis-SMR
instructions: Lie on your side, with your upper arm against the foam roller. The upper arm should be more or less aligned with your cuerpo, with the outside of the bicep pressed against the foam roller.
Raise your hips off of the suelo, supporting your peso on your arm and on your feet. Sostén for 10-30 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Bradford/Rocky Presses
instructions: Siéntate on a Military Press Banco with a bar at shoulder level with a pronated grip (palms facing forward). Tip: Your grip should be wider than shoulder width and it should create a 90-degree angle between the forearm and the upper arm as the barra goes down. This is your starting posición.
Once you pick up the barra with the correct grip, Levanta the bar up over your head by locking your brazos.
Now Baja the bar down to the back of the head Lentamente as you Inhala.
Levanta the bar back up to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Baja the bar down to the starting posición Lentamente as you Inhala. This is one repetition.
Alternate in this manner until you complete the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Butt-Ups
instructions: Begin a pushup posición but with your elbows on the suelo and resting on your forearms. Your brazos should be bent at a 90 degree angle.
Arch your back slightly out rather than keeping your back completely straight.

Raise your glutes toward the ceiling, squeezing your abs tightly to close the distance between your ribcage and hips. The end result will be that you'll end up in a high bridge posición. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Baja back down Lentamente to your starting posición as you Respira in. Tip: Don't let your back sag downwards.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Butt Lift (Bridge)
instructions: Lie flat on the suelo on your back with the manos by your side and your rodillas bent. Your feet should be placed around shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
Pushing mainly with your heels, Levanta your hips off the suelo while keeping your back straight. Respira out as you perform this part of the motion and Sostén at the top for a second.
Lentamente go back to the starting posición as you Respira in.

name: Butterfly
instructions: Siéntate on the machine with your back flat on the pad.
Take Sostén of the handles. Tip: Your upper brazos should be positioned parallel to the suelo; adjust the machine accordingly. This will be your starting posición.
Empuja the handles together Lentamente as you squeeze your chest in the middle. Respira out during this part of the motion and Sostén the contraction for a second.
Regresa back to the starting posición Lentamente as you Inhala until your chest muscles are fully stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Chest Press
instructions: Adjust the peso to an appropriate amount and be seated, grasping the handles. Your upper brazos should be about 45 degrees to the cuerpo, with your head and chest up. The elbows should be bent to about 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by extending through the elbow, pressing the handles together straight in front of you. Mantén your shoulder blades retracted as you execute the movement.
After pausing at full Extensión, Regresa to th starting posición, keeping tension on the cables.
You can also execute this movement with your back off the pad, at an incline or decline, or alternate manos.

name: en Cable Crossover
instructions: To get yourself into the starting posición, place the pulleys on a high posición (above your head), Selecciona the resistance to be used and Sostén the pulleys in each hand.

Step forward in front of an imaginary straight line between both pulleys while pulling your brazos together in front of you. Your torso should have a small forward bend from the waist. This will be your starting posición.

With a slight bend on your elbows in order to prevent stress at the biceps tendon, extend your brazos to the side (straight out at both sides) in a wide arc until you feel a stretch on your chest. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén in mind that throughout the movement, the brazos and torso should remain stationary; the movement should only occur at the shoulder joint.
Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición as you Respira out. Make sure to use the same arc of motion used to Baja the weights.
Sostén for a second at the starting posición and Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel below a high pulley that contains a rope attachment.
Grasp cable rope attachment and Baja the rope until your manos are placed next to your face.
Flex your hips slightly and allow the peso to hyperextend the Baja back. This will be your starting posición.

With the hips stationary, flex the waist as you contract the abs so that the elbows travel towards the middle of the thighs. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement and Sostén the contraction for a second.

Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Inhala. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén constant tension on the abs throughout the movement. Also, do not choose a peso so heavy that the Baja back handles the brunt of the work.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Deadlifts
instructions: Move the cables to the bottom of the towers and Selecciona an appropriate peso. Párate directly in between the uprights.
To begin, Sentadilla down be flexing your hips and rodillas until you can reach the handles.
After grasping them, begin your ascent. Driving through your heels extend your hips and rodillas keeping your manos hanging at your side. Mantén your head and chest up throughout the movement.
After reaching a full standing posición, Regresa to the starting posición and Repite.

name: en Cable Hammer Curls - Rope Attachment
instructions: Attach a rope attachment to a low pulley and Párate facing the machine about 12 inches away from it.
Grasp the rope with a neutral (palms-in) grip and Párate straight up keeping the natural arch of the back and your torso stationary.
Put your elbows in by your side and Mantén them there stationary during the entire movement. Tip: Only the forearms should move; not your upper brazos. This will be your starting posición.
Using your biceps, Tira your brazos up as you Exhala until your biceps touch your forearms. Tip: Remember to Mantén the elbows in and your upper brazos stationary.
After a 1 second contraction where you squeeze your biceps, Lentamente start to bring the peso back to the original posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Hip Adduction
instructions: Párate in front of a low pulley facing forward with one leg next to the pulley and the other one away.
Attach the ankle cuff to the cable and also to the ankle of the leg that is next to the pulley.
Now step out and away from the stack with a wide stance and grasp the bar of the pulley system.
