Párate on the foot that does not have the ankle cuff (the far foot) and allow the leg with the cuff to be pulled towards the low pulley. This will be your starting posición.
Now perform the movement by moving the leg with the ankle cuff in front of the far leg by using the inner thighs to abduct the hip. Respira out during this portion of the movement.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Repite the same movement with the opposite leg.

name: en Cable Incline Pushdown
instructions: Lie on incline an Banco facing away from a high pulley machine that has a straight bar attachment on it.

Grasp the straight bar attachment overhead with a pronated (overhand; palms down) shoulder width grip and extend your brazos in front of you. The bar should be around 2 inches away from your upper thighs. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the upper brazos stationary, Levanta your brazos back in a semi circle until the bar is straight over your head. Respira in during this portion of the movement.
Lentamente go back to the starting posición using your lats and Sostén the contraction once you reach the starting posición. Respira out during the execution of this movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Incline Triceps Extension
instructions: Lie on incline an Banco facing away from a high pulley machine that has a straight bar attachment on it.

Grasp the straight bar attachment overhead with a pronated (overhand; palms down) narrow grip (less than shoulder width) and Mantén your elbows tucked in to your sides. Your upper brazos should create around a 25 degree angle when measured from the suelo.
Keeping the upper brazos stationary, extend the brazos as you flex the triceps. Respira out during this portion of the movement and Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Internal Rotation
instructions: Siéntate next to a low pulley sideways (with piernas stretched in front of you or crossed) and grasp the single hand cable attachment with the arm nearest to the cable. Tip: If you can adjust the pulley's height, you can use a flat Banco to Siéntate on instead.
posición the elbow against your side with the elbow bent at 90° and the arm pointing towards the pulley. This will be your starting posición.

Tira the single hand cable attachment toward your cuerpo by internally rotating your shoulder until your forearm is across your abs. You will be creating an imaginary semi-circle. Tip: The forearm should be perpendicular to your torso at all times.
Lentamente go back to the initial posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Repite the movement with the next arm.

name: en Cable Iron Cross
instructions: Begin by moving the pulleys to the high posición, Selecciona the resistance to be used, and take a handle in each hand.
Párate directly between both pulleys with your brazos extended out to your sides. Your head and chest should be up while your brazos form a "T". This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the elbows extended, Tira your brazos straight to your sides.
Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición after a pause at the peak contraction.
Continue the movement for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: en Cable Judo Flip
instructions: Connect a rope attachment to a tower, and move the cable to the lowest pulley posición. Párate with your side to the cable with a wide stance, and grab the rope with both manos.
Twist your cuerpo away from the pulley as you bring the rope over your shoulder like you're performing a judo flip.
Shift your peso between your feet as you twist and crunch forward, pulling the cable downward.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite until failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: en Cable Lying Triceps Extension
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco and grasp the straight bar attachment of a low pulley with a narrow overhand grip. Tip: The easiest way to do this is to have someone hand you the bar as you lay down.
With your brazos extended, posición the bar over your torso. Your brazos and your torso should create a 90-degree angle. This will be your starting posición.

Baja the bar by bending at the elbow while keeping the upper brazos stationary and elbows in. Go down until the bar lightly touches your forehead. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Flex the triceps as you Levanta the bar back to its starting posición. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Sostén for a second at the contracted posición and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable One Arm Tricep Extension
instructions: With your right hand, grasp a single handle attached to the high-cable pulley using a supinated (underhand; palms facing up) grip. You should be standing directly in front of the peso stack.

Now Tira the handle down so that your upper arm and elbow are locked in to the side of your cuerpo. Your upper arm and forearm should form an acute angle (less than 90-degrees). You can Mantén the other arm by the waist and you can have one leg in front of you and the other one back for better balance. This will be your starting posición.

As you contract the triceps, move the single handle attachment down to your side until your arm is straight. Respira out as you perform this movement. Tip: Only the forearms should move. Your upper brazos should remain stationary at all times.
Squeeze the triceps and Sostén for a second in this contracted posición.
Lentamente Regresa the handle to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform the same movement with the other arm.

name: en Cable Preacher Curl
instructions: Place a preacher Banco about 2 feet in front of a pulley machine.
Attach a straight bar to the low pulley.
Siéntate at the preacher Banco with your elbow and upper brazos firmly on top of the Banco pad and have someone hand you the bar from the low pulley.
Grab the bar and fully extend your brazos on top of the preacher Banco pad. This will be your starting posición.
Now start pilling the peso up towards your shoulders and squeeze the biceps hard at the top of the movement. Exhala as you perform this motion. Also, Sostén for a second at the top.
Now Lentamente Baja the peso to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Adjust the pulleys to the appropriate height and adjust the peso. The pulleys should be above your head.
Grab the left pulley with your right hand and the right pulley with your left hand, crossing them in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by moving your brazos back and outward, keeping your brazos straight as you execute the movement.
Pause at the end of the motion before returning the handles to the start posición.

name: en Cable Reverse Crunch
instructions: Connect an ankle strap attachment to a low pulley cable and posición a mat on the suelo in front of it.
Siéntate down with your feet toward the pulley and attach the cable to your ankles.
Recuéstate, elevate your piernas and bend your rodillas at a 90-degree angle. Your piernas and the cable should be aligned. If not, adjust the pulley up or down until they are.
With your manos behind your head, bring your rodillas inward to your torso and elevate your hips off the suelo.
Pause for a moment and in a slow and controlled manner drop your hips and bring your piernas back to the starting 90-degree angle. You should still have tension on your abs in the resting posición.
Repite the same movement to failure.

name: en Cable Rope Overhead Triceps Extension
instructions: Attach a rope to the bottom pulley of the pulley machine.

Grasping the rope with both manos, extend your brazos with your manos directly above your head using a neutral grip (palms facing each other). Your elbows should be in close to your head and the brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo with the knuckles aimed at the ceiling. This will be your starting posición.
Lentamente Baja the rope behind your head as you Sostén the upper brazos stationary. Inhala as you perform this movement and pause when your triceps are fully stretched.
Regresa to the starting posición by flexing your triceps as you Respira out.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Rope Rear-Delt Rows
instructions: Siéntate in the same posición on a low pulley Remo station as you would if you were doing seated cable rows for the back.
Attach a rope to the pulley and grasp it with an overhand grip. Your brazos should be extended and parallel to the suelo with the elbows flared out.
Mantén your Baja back upright and slide your hips back so that your rodillas are slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Tira the cable attachment towards your upper chest, just below the neck, as you Mantén your elbows up and out to the sides. Continue this motion as you Exhala until the elbows travel slightly behind the back. Tip: Mantén your upper brazos horizontal, perpendicular to the torso and parallel to the suelo throughout the motion.
Go back to the initial posición where the brazos are extended and the shoulders are stretched forward. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Russian Twists
instructions: Connect a standard handle attachment, and posición the cable to a middle pulley posición.
Lie on a stability ball perpendicular to the cable and grab the handle with one hand. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the peso on the cable.
Grab the handle with both manos and fully extend your brazos above your chest. You manos should be directly in-line with the pulley. If not, adjust the pulley up or down until they are.
Mantén your hips elevated and abs engaged. Rotate your torso away from the pulley for a full-quarter rotation. Your cuerpo should be flat from head to rodillas.
Pause for a moment and in a slow and controlled manner reset to the starting posición. You should still have side tension on the cable in the resting posición.
Repite the same movement to failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: en Cable Seated Crunch
instructions: Seat on a flat Banco with your back facing a high pulley.

Grasp the cable rope attachment with both manos (with the palms of the manos facing each other) and place your manos securely over both shoulders. Tip: Allow the peso to hyperextend the Baja back slightly. This will be your starting posición.
With the hips stationary, flex the waist so the elbows travel toward the hips. Respira out as you perform this step.
As you Inhala, go back to the initial posición Lentamente.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Seated Lateral Raise
instructions: Párate in the middle of two low pulleys that are opposite to each other and place a flat Banco right behind you (in perpendicular fashion to you; the narrow edge of the Banco should be the one behind you). Selecciona the peso to be used on each pulley.
Now Siéntate at the edge of the flat Banco behind you with your feet placed in front of your rodillas.
Bend forward while keeping your back flat and rest your torso on the thighs.

Have someone give you the single handles attached to the pulleys. Grasp the left pulley with the right hand and the right pulley with the left after you Selecciona your peso. The pulleys should run under your rodillas and your brazos will be extended with palms facing each other and a slight bend at the elbows. This will be the starting posición.

While keeping the brazos stationary, raise the upper brazos to the sides until they are parallel to the suelo and at shoulder height. Exhala during the execution of this movement and Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Baja your brazos to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions. Tip: Maintain upper brazos perpendicular to torso and a fixed elbow posición (10 degree to 30 degree angle) throughout exercise.

name: en Cable Shoulder Press
instructions: Move the cables to the bottom of the towers and Selecciona an appropriate peso.
Párate directly in between the uprights. Grasp the cables and Sostén them at shoulder height, palms facing forward. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your head and chest up, extend through the elbow to Press the handles directly over head.
After pausing at the top, Regresa to the starting posición and Repite.

name: en Cable Shrugs
instructions: Grasp a cable bar attachment that is attached to a low pulley with a shoulder width or slightly wider overhand (palms facing down) grip.
Párate erect close to the pulley with your brazos extended in front of you holding the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Levanta the bar by elevating the shoulders as high as possible as you Exhala. Sostén the contraction at the top for a second. Tip: The brazos should remain extended at all times. Refrain from using the biceps to help Levanta the bar. Only the shoulders should be moving up and down.
Baja the bar back to the original posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: en Cable Wrist Curl
instructions: Start out by placing a flat Banco in front of a low pulley cable that has a straight bar attachment.

Use your brazos to grab the cable bar with a narrow to shoulder width supinated grip (palms up) and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against the top of your thighs. Your wrists should be hanging just beyond your rodillas.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling. Mantén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Calf-Machine Shoulder Shrug
instructions: posición yourself on the calf machine so that the shoulder pads are above your shoulders. Your torso should be straight with the brazos extended normally by your side. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your shoulders up towards your ears as you Exhala and Sostén the contraction for a full second.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Calf Press
instructions: Adjust the seat so that your piernas are only slightly bent in the start posición. The balls of your feet should be firmly on the platform.
Selecciona an appropriate peso, and grasp the handles. This will be your starting posición.

Straighten the piernas by extending the rodillas, just barely lifting the peso from the stack. Your ankle should be fully flexed, toes pointing up. Execute the movement by pressing downward through the balls of your feet as far as possible.
After a brief pause, reverse the motion and Repite.

name: Calf Press On The Leg Press Machine
instructions: Using a leg Press machine, Siéntate down on the machine and place your piernas on the platform directly in front of you at a medium (shoulder width) foot stance.

Baja the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and Press the platform all the way up until your piernas are fully extended in front of you without locking your rodillas. (Note: In some leg Press units you can leave the safety bars on for increased safety. If your leg Press unit allows for this, then this is the preferred method of performing the exercise.) Your torso and the piernas should make perfect 90-degree angle. Now carefully place your toes and balls of your feet on the Baja portion of the platform with the heels extending off. Toes should be facing forward, outwards or inwards as described at the beginning of the chapter. This will be your starting posición.

Press on the platform by raising your heels as you Respira out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Sostén the contracted posición by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Calf Raise On A con Mancuerna
instructions: Hang on to a sturdy object for balance and Párate on a dumbbell handle, preferably one with round plates so that it rolls as in this manner you have to work harder to stabilize yourself; thus increasing the effectiveness of the exercise.
Now roll your foot slightly forward so that you can get a nice stretch of the calf. This will be your starting posición.

Levanta the calf as you roll your foot over the top of the handle so that you get a full Extensión. Exhala during the execution of this movement. Contract the calf hard at the top and Sostén for a second. Tip: As you come up, roll the dumbbell slightly backward.
Now Inhala as you roll the dumbbell slightly forward as you come down to get a better stretch.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Calf Raises - With con Bandas
instructions: Grab an exercise band and Párate on it with your toes making sure that the length of the band between the foot and the brazos is the same for both sides.

While holding the handles of the band, raise the brazos to the side of your head as if you were getting ready to perform a shoulder Press. The palms should be facing forward with the elbows bent and to the sides. This movement will create tension on the band. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the manos by your shoulder, Párate up on your toes as you Exhala and contract the calves hard at the top of the movement.
After a one second contraction, Lentamente go back down to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Calf Stretch Elbows Against Wall
instructions: Párate facing a wall from a couple feet away.
Lean against the wall, placing your peso on your forearms.
Attempt to Mantén your heels on the suelo. Sostén for 10-20 seconds. You may move further or closer the wall, making it more or less difficult, respectively.

name: Calf Stretch Hands Against Wall
instructions: Párate facing a wall from several feet away. Stagger your stance, placing one foot forward.
Lean forward and rest your manos on the wall, keeping your heel, hip and head in a straight line.
Attempt to Mantén your heel on the suelo. Sostén for 10-20 seconds and then Cambia sides.

name: Calves-SMR
instructions: Begin seated on the suelo. Place a foam roller underneath your Baja leg. Your other leg can either be crossed over the opposite or be placed on the suelo, supporting some of your peso. This will be your starting posición.

Place your manos to your side or just behind you, and Press down to raise your hips off of the suelo, placing much of your peso against your calf muscle. Roll from below the knee to above the ankle, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite for the other leg.

name: Car Deadlift
instructions: This event apparatus typically has neutral grip handles, however some have a straight bar that you can approach like a normal Peso Muerto. The apparatus can be loaded with a vehicle or other heavy objects such as tractor tires or kegs.

Center yourself between the handles if you are a strong squatter, or back a couple inches if you are a strong deadlifter. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hip to grip the handles. With your feet and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and flex the rodillas.

Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward. As the peso comes up, Tira your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward.
Baja the peso by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Car Drivers
instructions: While standing upright, Sostén a barra plate in both manos at the 3 and 9 o'clock positions. Your palms should be facing each other and your brazos should be extended straight out in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by rotating the plate as far to one side as possible. Use the same type of movement you would use to turn a steering wheel to one side.
Reverse the motion, turning it all the way to the opposite side.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Carioca Quick Step
instructions: Begin with your feet a few inches apart and your left arm up in a relaxed, athletic posición.
With your right foot, quick step behind and Tira the knee up.
Fire your brazos back up when you Tira the right knee, being sure that your knee goes straight up and down. Avoid turning your feet as you move and continue to look forward as you move to the side.

name: Cat Stretch
instructions: posición yourself on the suelo on your manos and rodillas.
Tira your belly in and round your spine, Baja back, shoulders, and neck, letting your head drop.
Sostén for 15 seconds.

name: Catch and Overhead Throw
instructions: Begin standing while facing a wall or a partner.
Using both manos, posición the ball behind your head, stretching as much as possible, and forcefully throw the ball forward.

Ensure that you follow your throw through, being prepared to receive your rebound from your throw. If you are throwing against the wall, make sure that you Párate close enough to the wall to receive the rebound, and aim a little higher than you would with a partner.

name: Chain Handle Extension
instructions: You will need two cable handle attachments and a flat Banco, as well as chains, for this exercise. Clip the middle of the chains to the handles, and posición yourself on the flat Banco. Your elbows should be pointing straight up.
Begin by extending through the elbow, keeping your upper arm still, with your wrists pronated.
Pause at the lockout, and reverse the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Chain Press
instructions: Begin by connecting the chains to the cable handle attachments. posición yourself on the flat Banco in the same posición as for a dumbbell Press. Your wrists should be pronated and brazos perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the chains by flexing the elbows, unloading some of the chain onto the suelo.
Continue until your elbow forms a 90 degree angle, and then reverse the motion by extending through the elbow to lockout.

name: Chair Leg Extended Stretch
instructions: Siéntate upright in a chair and grip the seat on the sides.
Raise one leg, extending the knee, flexing the ankle as you do so.
Lentamente move that leg outward as far as you can, and then back to the center and down.
Repite for your other leg.

name: Chair Lower Back Stretch
instructions: Siéntate upright on a chair.
Bend to one side with your arm over your head. You can Sostén onto the chair with your free hand.
Sostén for 10 seconds, and Repite for your other side.

name: Chair Squat
instructions: To begin, first set the bar to a posición that best matches your height. Once the bar is loaded, step under it and posición it across the back of your shoulders.
Take the bar with your manos facing forward, unlock it and Levanta it off the rack by extending your piernas.

Move your feet forward about 18 inches in front of the bar. posición your piernas using a shoulder width stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Look forward at all times and maintain a neutral or slightly arched spine. This will be your starting posición.
Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper and Baja leg breaks 90 degrees.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heels of your feet, extending the rodillas and returning to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Chair Upper Body Stretch
instructions: Siéntate on the edge of a chair, gripping the back of it.
Straighten your brazos, keeping your back straight, and Tira your upper cuerpo forward so you feel a stretch. Sostén for 20-30 seconds.

name: Chest And Front Of Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Start off by standing with your piernas together, holding a bodybar or a broomstick.
Take a slightly wider than shoulder width grip on the pole and Sostén it in front of you with your palms facing down.
Carefully Levanta the pole up and behind your head.

name: Chest Push from 3 point stance
instructions: Begin in a three point stance, squatted down with your back flat and one hand on the suelo. Place the medicine ball directly in front of you.
To begin, take your first step as you Tira the ball to your chest, positioning both manos to prepare for the throw.
As you execute the second step, explosively release the ball forward as hard as possible.

name: Chest Push (multiple response)
instructions: Begin in a kneeling posición facing a wall or utilize a partner. Sostén the ball with both manos tight into the chest.
Execute the pass by exploding forward and outward with the hips while pushing the ball as hard as possible.
Follow through by falling forward, catching yourself with your manos.
Immediately Regresa to an upright posición. Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Chest Push (single response)
instructions: Begin in a kneeling posición holding the medicine ball with both manos tightly into the chest.
Execute the pass by exploding forward and outward with the hips while pushing the ball as far as possible.
Follow through by falling forward, catching yourself with your manos.

name: Chest Push with Run Release
instructions: Begin in an athletic stance with the rodillas bent, hips back, and back flat. Sostén the medicine ball near your piernas. This will be your starting posición.
While taking your first step draw the medicine ball into your chest.
As you take the second step, explosively Empuja the ball forward, immediately sprinting for 10 yards after the release. If you are really fast, you can catch your own pass!

name: Chest Stretch on Stability Ball
instructions: Get on your manos and rodillas next to an exercise ball.
Place your elbows on top of the ball, keeping your arm out to your side. This will be your starting posición.
Baja your torso towards the suelo, keeping your elbow on top of the ball. Sostén the stretch for 20-30 seconds, and Repite with the other arm.

name: Child's Pose
instructions: Get on your manos and rodillas, walk your manos in front of you.
Baja your buttocks down to Siéntate on your heels. Let your brazos drag along the suelo as you Siéntate back to stretch your entire spine.
Once you settle onto your heels, bring your manos next to your feet and relax. "Respira" into your back. Rest your forehead on the suelo. Avoid this posición if you have knee problems.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms facing your torso and a grip closer than the shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, Mantén your torso as straight as possible while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición. Tip: Keeping the torso as straight as possible maximizes biceps stimulation while minimizing back involvement.

As you Respira out, Tira your torso up until your head is around the level of the Tira-up bar. Concentrate on using the biceps muscles in order to perform the movement. Mantén the elbows close to your cuerpo. Tip: The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.

After a second of squeezing the biceps in the contracted posición, Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición; when your brazos are fully extended. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Chin To Chest Stretch
instructions: Get into a seated posición on the suelo.
Place both manos at the rear of your head, fingers interlocked, thumbs pointing down and elbows pointing straight ahead. Lentamente Tira your head down to your chest. Sostén for 20-30 seconds.

name: Circus Bell
instructions: The circus bell is an oversized dumbbell with a thick handle. Begin with the dumbbell between your feet, and grip the handle with both manos.
Clean the dumbbell by extending through your hips and rodillas to deliver the implement to the desired shoulder, letting go with the extra hand.

Ensure that you get one of the dumbbell heads behind the shoulder to Mantén from being thrown off balance. To raise it overhead, dip by flexing the rodillas, and the drive upwards as you extend the dumbbell overhead, leaning slightly away from it as you do so.
Carefully guide the bell back to the suelo, keeping it under control as much as possible. It is best to perform this event on a thick rubber mat to prevent damage to the suelo.

name: Clean
instructions: With a barra on the suelo close to the shins, take an overhand (or hook) grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight. Move the peso with control as you continue to above the rodillas.

Next comes the second Tira, the main source of acceleration for the clean. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips. In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward. There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso; at the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back, with the brazos still extended.

As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the third Tira by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out. At peak Extensión, aggressively Tira yourself down, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so. Receive the bar in a front Sentadilla posición, the depth of which is dependent upon the height of the bar at the end of the third Tira. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed. Continue to descend to the bottom Sentadilla posición, which will help in the recovery.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición.

name: Clean Deadlift
instructions: Begin standing with a barra close to your shins. Your feet should be directly under your hips with your feet turned out slightly. Grip the bar with a double overhand grip or hook grip, about shoulder width apart. Sentadilla down to the bar. Your spine should be in full Extensión, with a back angle that places your shoulders in front of the bar and your back as vertical as possible.

Begin by driving through the suelo through the front of your heels. As the bar travels upward, maintain a constant back angle. Flare your rodillas out to the side to help Mantén them out of the bar's path.
After the bar crosses the rodillas, complete the Levanta by driving the hips into the bar until your hips and rodillas are extended.

name: Clean Pull
instructions: With a barra on the suelo close to the shins, take an overhand or hook grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight and elbows out. Move the peso with control as you continue to above the rodillas.

Next comes the second Tira, the main source of acceleration for the clean. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips. In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward. There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso; at the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back, with the brazos still extended. Full Extensión should be violent and abrupt, and ensure that you do not prolong the Extensión for longer than necessary.

name: Clean Shrug
instructions: Begin with a shoulder width, double overhand or hook grip, with the bar hanging at the mid thigh posición. Your back should be straight and inclined slightly forward.
Shrug your shoulders towards your ears. While this exercise can usually by loaded with heavier peso than a clean, avoid overloading to the point that the execution slows down.

name: Clean and Jerk
instructions: With a barra on the suelo close to the shins, take an overhand or hook grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight. Move the peso with control as you continue to above the rodillas.

Next comes the second Tira, the main source of acceleration for the clean. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips. In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward. There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso; at the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back, with the brazos still extended.

As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the third Tira by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out. At peak Extensión, aggressively Tira yourself down, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so. Receive the bar in a front Sentadilla posición, the depth of which is dependent upon the height of the bar at the end of the third Tira. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed. Continue to descend to the bottom Sentadilla posición, which will help in the recovery.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición.

The second phase is the jerk, which raises the peso overhead. Standing with the peso racked on the front of the shoulders, begin with the dip. With your feet directly under your hips, flex the rodillas without moving the hips backward. Go down only slightly, and reverse direction as powerfully as possible.
Drive through the heels create as much speed and force as possible, and be sure to move your head out of the way as the bar leaves the shoulders.

At this moment as the feet leave the suelo, the feet must be placed into the receiving posición as quickly as possible. In the brief moment the feet are not actively driving against the platform, the athletes effort to Empuja the bar up will drive them down. The feet should be split, with one foot forward, and one foot back. Receive the bar with the brazos locked out overhead. Regresa to a standing posición.

name: Clean and Press
instructions: Assume a shoulder-width stance, with rodillas inside the brazos. Now while keeping the back flat, bend at the rodillas and hips so that you can grab the bar with the brazos fully extended and a pronated grip that is slightly wider than shoulder width. Point the elbows out to sides. The bar should be close to the shins. posición the shoulders over or slightly ahead of the bar. Establish a flat back posture. This will be your starting posición.

Begin to Tira the bar by extending the rodillas. Move your hips forward and raise the shoulders at the same rate while keeping the angle of the back constant; continue to Levanta the bar straight up while keeping it close to your cuerpo.

As the bar passes the knee, extend at the ankles, rodillas, and hips forcefully, similar to a jumping motion. As you do so, continue to guide the bar with your manos, shrugging your shoulders and using the momentum from your movement to Tira the bar as high as possible. The bar should travel close to your cuerpo, and you should Mantén your elbows out.

At maximum elevation, your feet should clear the suelo and you should start to Tira yourself under the bar. The mechanics of this could change slightly, depending on the peso used. You should descend into a squatting posición as you Tira yourself under the bar.

As the bar hits terminal height, rotate your elbows around and under the bar. Rack the bar across the front of the shoulders while keeping the torso erect and flexing the hips and rodillas to absorb the peso of the bar.
Párate to full height, holding the bar in the clean posición.
Without moving your feet, Press the bar overhead as you Exhala. Baja the bar under control .

name: Clean from Blocks
instructions: With a barra on boxes or stands of the desired height, take an overhand or hook grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight with the elbows pointed out.

As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the receiving posición by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out. Aggressively Tira yourself down, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so. Receive the bar in a front Sentadilla posición, the depth of which is dependent upon the height of the bar at the end of the third Tira. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed. Continue to descend to the bottom Sentadilla posición, which will help in the recovery.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición. Regresa the peso to the boxes for the next rep.

name: Clock Push-Up
instructions: Move into a prone posición on the suelo, supporting your peso on your manos and toes.
Your brazos should be fully extended with the manos around shoulder width. Mantén your cuerpo straight throughout the movement. This will be your starting posición.
Descend by flexing at the elbow, lowering your chest toward the suelo.
At the bottom, reverse the motion by pushing yourself up through elbow Extensión as quickly as possible until you are air borne. Aim to "jump" 12-18 inches to one side.
As you accelerate up, move your outside foot away from your direction of travel. Leaving the suelo, shift your cuerpo about 30 degrees for the next repetition.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite the exercise, working all the way around until you are back where you started.

name: Close-Grip con Barra Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat Banco. Using a close grip (around shoulder width), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your middle chest. Tip: Make sure that - as opposed to a regular Banco Press - you Mantén the elbows close to the torso at all times in order to maximize triceps involvement.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your triceps muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Close-Grip con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Place a dumbbell standing up on a flat Banco.

Ensuring that the dumbbell stays securely placed at the top of the Banco, lie perpendicular to the Banco with only your shoulders lying on the surface. Hips should be below the Banco and your piernas bent with your feet firmly on the suelo.

Grasp the dumbbell with both manos and Sostén it straight over your chest at arm's length. Both palms should be pressing against the underside of the sides of the dumbbell. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by lowering the dumbbell to your chest.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the elbows.

name: Close-Grip EZ-Bar Curl with con Banda
instructions: Attach a band to each end of the bar. Take the bar, placing a foot on the middle of the band. Párate upright with a narrow, supinated grip on the EZ bar. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the upper brazos in place, flex the elbows to execute the Curl. Exhala as the peso is lifted.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Close-Grip EZ-Bar Press
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco with an EZ bar loaded to an appropriate peso.
Using a narrow grip Levanta the bar and Sostén it straight over your torso with your elbows in. The brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Now Baja the bar down to your Baja chest as you Respira in. Mantén the elbows in as you perform this movement.
Using the triceps to Empuja the bar back up, Press it back to the starting posición by extending the elbows as you Exhala.
Repite.

name: Close-Grip EZ Bar Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding an E-Z Curl Bar at the closer inner handle. The palm of your manos should be facing forward and they should be slightly tilted inwards due to the shape of the bar. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting posición.
While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Close-Grip Front Lat Pulldown
instructions: Siéntate down on a Tira-down machine with a wide bar attached to the top pulley. Make sure that you adjust the knee pad of the machine to fit your height. These pads will prevent your cuerpo from being raised by the resistance attached to the bar.

Grab the bar with the palms facing forward using the prescribed grip. Note on grips: For a wide grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance wider than your shoulder width. For a medium grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance equal to your shoulder width and for a close grip at a distance smaller than your shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you - while holding the bar at the chosen grip width - bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

As you Respira out, bring the bar down until it touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary (only the brazos should move). The forearms should do no other work except for holding the bar; therefore do not try to Tira the bar down using the forearms.

After a second in the contracted posición, while squeezing your shoulder blades together, Lentamente raise the bar back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched. Inhala during this portion of the movement.
6. Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Close-Grip Push-Up off of a con Mancuerna
instructions: Lie on the suelo and place your manos on an upright dumbbell. Supporting your peso on your toes and manos, Mantén your torso rigid and your elbows in with your brazos straight. This will be your starting posición.
Baja your cuerpo, allowing the elbows to flex while you Inhala. Mantén your cuerpo straight, not allowing your hips to rise or sag.
Press yourself back up to the starting posición by extending the elbows. Respira out as you perform this step.
After a pause at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Close-Grip Standing con Barra Curl
instructions: Sostén a barra with both manos, palms up and a few inches apart.

Párate with your torso straight and your head up. Your feet should be about shoulder width and your elbows close to your torso. This will be your starting posición. Tip: You will Mantén your upper brazos and elbows stationary throughout the movement.

Curl the bar up in a semicircular motion until the forearms touch your biceps. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement and contract your biceps hard for a second at the top. Tip: Avoid bending the back or using swinging motions as you Levanta the peso. Only the forearms should move.
Lentamente go back down to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Cocoons
instructions: Begin by lying on your back on the suelo. Your piernas should be straight and your brazos extended behind your head. This will be your starting posición.

To perform the movement, tuck the rodillas toward your chest, rotating your pelvis to Levanta your glutes from the suelo. As you do so, flex the spine, bringing your brazos back over your head to perform a simultaneous crunch motion.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Conan's Wheel
instructions: With the peso loaded, take a zurcher Sostén on the end of the implement. Place the bar in the crook of the elbow and Sostén onto your wrist. Try to Mantén the peso off of the forearms.

Begin by lifting the peso from the suelo. Mantén a tight, upright posture as you being to walk, taking short, fast steps. Look up and away as you turn in a circle. Do not Sostén your breath during the event. Continue walking until you complete one or more complete turns.

name: Concentration Curls
instructions: Siéntate down on a flat Banco with one dumbbell in front of you between your piernas. Your piernas should be spread with your rodillas bent and feet on the suelo.

Use your right arm to pick the dumbbell up. Place the back of your right upper arm on the top of your inner right thigh. Rotate the palm of your hand until it is facing forward away from your thigh. Tip: Your arm should be extended and the dumbbell should be above the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Tip: At the top of the movement make sure that the little finger of your arm is higher than your thumb. This guarantees a good contraction. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to starting posición as your Respira in. Caution: Avoid swinging motions at any time.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions. Then Repite the movement with the left arm.

name: Cross-Body Crunch
instructions: Lie flat on your back and bend your rodillas about 60 degrees.
Mantén your feet flat on the suelo and place your manos loosely behind your head. This will be your starting posición.

Now Curl up and bring your right elbow and shoulder across your cuerpo while bring your left knee in toward your left shoulder at the same time. Reach with your elbow and try to touch your knee. Exhala as you perform this movement. Tip: Try to bring your shoulder up towards your knee rather than just your elbow and remember that the key is to contract the abs as you perform the movement; not just to move the elbow.
Now go back down to the starting posición as you Inhala and Repite with the left elbow and the right knee.
Continue alternating in this manner until all prescribed repetitions are done.

name: Cross Body Hammer Curl
instructions: Párate up straight with a dumbbell in each hand. Your manos should be down at your side with your palms facing in.

While keeping your palms facing in and without twisting your arm, Curl the dumbbell of the right arm up towards your left shoulder as you Exhala. Touch the top of the dumbbell to your shoulder and Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Baja the dumbbell along the same path as you Inhala and then Repite the same movement for the left arm.
Continue alternating in this fashion until the recommended amount of repetitions is performed for each arm.

name: Cross Over - With con Bandas
instructions: Secure an exercise band around a stationary post.
While facing away from the post, grab the handles on both ends of the band and step forward enough to create tension on the band.

Raise your brazos to the sides, parallel to the suelo, perpendicular to your torso (your torso and the brazos should resemble the letter "T") and with the palms facing forward. Have them extended with a slight bend at the elbows. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping your brazos straight, bring them across your chest in a semicircular motion to the front as you Exhala and flex your pecs. Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Perform for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Crossover Reverse Lunge
instructions: Párate with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Perform a rear Zancada by stepping back with one foot and flexing the hips and front knee. As you do so, rotate your torso across the front leg.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición and Repite on the other side, continuing in an alternating fashion.

name: Crucifix
instructions: In the crucifix, you statically Sostén weights out to the side for time. While the event can be practiced using mancuernas, it is best to practice with one of the various implements used, such as axes and hammers, as it feels different.

Begin standing, and raise your brazos out to the side holding the implements. Your brazos should be parallel to the suelo. In competition, judges or sensors are used to let you know when you break parallel. Sostén for as long as you can. Typically, the weights should be heavy enough that you fail in 30-60 seconds.

name: Crunch - Hands Overhead
instructions: Lie on the suelo with your back flat and rodillas bent with around a 60-degree angle between the hamstrings and the calves.
Mantén your feet flat on the suelo and stretch your brazos overhead with your palms crossed. This will be your starting posición.

Curl your upper cuerpo forward and bring your shoulder blades just off the suelo. At all times, Mantén your brazos aligned with your head, neck and shoulder. Don't move them forward from that posición. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement and Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Baja down to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Crunch - Legs On Exercise Ball
instructions: Lie flat on your back with your feet resting on an exercise ball and your rodillas bent at a 90 degree angle.
Place your feet three to four inches apart and point your toes inward so they touch.
Place your manos lightly on either side of your head keeping your elbows in. Tip: Don't lock your fingers behind your head.
Empuja the small of your back down in the suelo in order to better isolate your abdominal muscles. This will be your starting posición.

Begin to roll your shoulders off the suelo and continue to Empuja down as hard as you can with your Baja back. Your shoulders should come up off the suelo only about four inches, and your Baja back should remain on the suelo. Respira out as you execute this portion of the movement. Squeeze your abdominals hard at the top of the contraction and Sostén for a second. Tip: Focus on a slow, controlled movement. Refrain from using momentum at any time.
Lentamente go back down to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Crunches
instructions: Lie flat on your back with your feet flat on the suelo, or resting on a Banco with your rodillas bent at a 90 degree angle. If you are resting your feet on a Banco, place them three to four inches apart and point your toes inward so they touch.
Now place your manos lightly on either side of your head keeping your elbows in. Tip: Don't lock your fingers behind your head.
While pushing the small of your back down in the suelo to better isolate your abdominal muscles, begin to roll your shoulders off the suelo.

Continue to Empuja down as hard as you can with your Baja back as you contract your abdominals and Exhala. Your shoulders should come up off the suelo only about four inches, and your Baja back should remain on the suelo. At the top of the movement, contract your abdominals hard and Mantén the contraction for a second. Tip: Focus on slow, controlled movement - don't cheat yourself by using momentum.
After the one second contraction, begin to come down Lentamente again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Cuban Press
instructions: Take a dumbbell in each hand with a pronated grip in a standing posición. Raise your upper brazos so that they are parallel to the suelo, allowing your Baja brazos to hang in the "scarecrow" posición. This will be your starting posición.

To initiate the movement, externally rotate the shoulders to move the upper arm 180 degrees. Mantén the upper brazos in place, rotating the upper brazos until the wrists are directly above the elbows, the forearms perpendicular to the suelo.
Now Press the mancuernas by extending at the elbows, straightening your brazos overhead.
Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in by reversing the steps.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Dancer's Stretch
instructions: Siéntate up on the suelo.
Cross your right leg over your left, keeping the knee bent. Your left leg is straight and down on the suelo.
Place your left arm on your right leg and your right hand on the suelo.
Rotate your upper cuerpo to the right, and Sostén for 10-20 seconds. Cambia sides.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Begin lying on your back with your manos extended above you toward the ceiling.
Bring your feet, rodillas, and hips up to 90 degrees.

Exhala hard to bring your ribcage down and flatten your back onto the suelo, rotating your pelvis up and squeezing your glutes. Sostén this posición throughout the movement. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the exercise by extending one leg, straightening the knee and hip to bring the leg just above the suelo.
Maintain the posición of your lumbar and pelvis as you perform the movement, as your back is going to want to arch.
Stay tight and Regresa the working leg to the starting posición.
Repite on the opposite side, alternating until the set is complete.

name: Deadlift with con Bandas
instructions: To Peso Muerto with short bands, simply loop them over the bar before you start, and step into them to set up. For long bands, they will need to be anchored to a secure base, such as heavy mancuernas or a rack.

With your feet, and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and bend the rodillas until your shins contact the bar. Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward. After the bar passes the rodillas, aggressively Tira the bar back, pulling your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward into the bar.
Baja the bar by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Deadlift with Chains
instructions: You can attach the chains to the sleeves of the bar, or just drape the middle over the bar so there is a greater peso increase as you Levanta.

Approach the bar so that it is centered over your feet. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hip to grip the bar at shoulder width, allowing your shoulder blades to protract. Typically, you would use an overhand grip or an over/under grip on heavier sets. With your feet, and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and bend the rodillas until your shins contact the bar.

Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward. After the bar passes the rodillas, aggressively Tira the bar back, pulling your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward into the bar.
Baja the bar by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Decline con Barra Bench Press
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Lentamente lay down on the Banco.

Using a medium width grip (a grip that creates a 90-degree angle in the middle of the movement between the forearms and the upper brazos), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. The brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición. Tip: In order to protect your rotator cuff, it is best if you have a spotter help you Levanta the barra off the rack.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your Baja chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up).
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Decline Close-Grip Bench To Skull Crusher
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Lentamente lay down on the Banco.

Using a close grip (a grip that is slightly less than shoulder width), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked and elbows in. The brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición. Tip: In order to protect your rotator cuff, it is best if you have a spotter help you Levanta the barra off the rack.
Now Baja the bar down to your Baja chest as you Respira in. Mantén the elbows in as you perform this movement.
Using the triceps to Empuja the bar back up, Press it back to the starting posición as you Exhala.

As you Respira in and you Mantén the upper brazos stationary, bring the bar down Lentamente by moving your forearms in a semicircular motion towards you until you feel the bar slightly touch your forehead. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Levanta the bar back to the starting posición by contracting the triceps and exhaling.
Repite steps 3-6 until the recommended amount of repetitions is performed.

name: Decline Crunch
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Recuéstate.
Now place your manos lightly on either side of your head keeping your elbows in. Tip: Don't lock your fingers behind your head.
While pushing the small of your back down in the Banco to better isolate your abdominal muscles, begin to roll your shoulders off it.

Continue to Empuja down as hard as you can with your Baja back as you contract your abdominals and Exhala. Your shoulders should come up off the Banco only about four inches, and your Baja back should remain on the Banco. At the top of the movement, contract your abdominals hard and Mantén the contraction for a second. Tip: Focus on slow, controlled movement - don't cheat yourself by using momentum.
After the one second contraction, begin to come down Lentamente again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Decline con Mancuerna Bench Press
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Recuéstate with a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.
Once you are laying down, move the mancuernas in front of you at shoulder width.
Once at shoulder width, rotate your wrists forward so that the palms of your manos are facing away from you. This will be your starting posición.

Bring down the weights Lentamente to your side as you Respira out. Mantén full control of the mancuernas at all times. Tip: Throughout the motion, the forearms should always be perpendicular to the suelo.

As you Respira out, Empuja the mancuernas up using your pectoral muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, squeeze your chest, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up..
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.

name: Decline con Mancuerna Flyes
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Recuéstate with a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.

Once you are laying down, move the mancuernas in front of you at shoulder width. The palms of the manos should be facing each other and the brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo and fully extended. This will be your starting posición.

With a slight bend on your elbows in order to prevent stress at the biceps tendon, Baja your brazos out at both sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch on your chest. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén in mind that throughout the movement, the brazos should remain stationary; the movement should only occur at the shoulder joint.
Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición as you squeeze your chest muscles and Respira out. Tip: Make sure to use the same arc of motion used to Baja the weights.
Sostén for a second at the contracted posición and Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Decline con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Recuéstate with a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.

Once you are laying down, move the mancuernas in front of you at shoulder width. The palms of the manos should be facing each other and the brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo and fully extended. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in and you Mantén the upper brazos stationary (and elbows in), bring the mancuernas down Lentamente by moving your forearms in a semicircular motion towards you until your thumbs are next to your ears. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Levanta the mancuernas back to the starting posición by contracting the triceps and exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Decline EZ Bar Triceps Extension
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Lentamente lay down on the Banco.

Using a close grip (a grip that is slightly less than shoulder width), Levanta the EZ bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked and elbows in. The brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición. Tip: In order to protect your rotator cuff, it is best if you have a spotter help you Levanta the barra off the rack.

As you Respira in and you Mantén the upper brazos stationary, bring the bar down Lentamente by moving your forearms in a semicircular motion towards you until you feel the bar slightly touch your forehead. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement.
Levanta the bar back to the starting posición by contracting the triceps and exhaling.
Repite until the recommended amount of repetitions is performed.

name: Decline Oblique Crunch
instructions: Secure your piernas at the end of the decline Banco and Lentamente lay down on the Banco.
Raise your upper cuerpo off the Banco until your torso is about 35-45 degrees if measured from the suelo.
Put one hand beside your head and the other on your thigh. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your upper cuerpo Lentamente from the starting posición while turning your torso to the left. Continue crunching up as you Exhala until your right elbow touches your left knee. Sostén this contracted posición for a second. Tip: Focus on keeping your abs tight and keeping the movement slow and controlled.
Baja your cuerpo back down Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala.

After completing one set on the right for the recommended amount of repetitions, Cambia to your left side. Tip: Focus on really twisting your torso and feeling the contraction when you are in the up posición.

name: Decline Push-Up
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and place your manos about 36 inches apart while holding your torso up at brazos length. Move your feet up to a box or Banco. This will be your starting posición.
Next, Baja yourself downward until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Now Respira out and Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición while squeezing your chest.
After a brief pause at the top contracted posición, you can begin to Baja yourself downward again for as many repetitions as needed.

name: Decline Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back on a decline Banco and Sostén on to the top of the Banco with both manos. Don't let your cuerpo slip down from this posición.

Sostén your piernas parallel to the suelo using your abs to Sostén them there while keeping your rodillas and feet together. Tip: Your piernas should be fully extended with a slight bend on the knee. This will be your starting posición.
While exhaling, move your piernas towards the torso as you roll your pelvis backwards and you raise your hips off the Banco. At the end of this movement your rodillas will be touching your chest.
Sostén the contraction for a second and move your piernas back to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Decline Smith Press
instructions: Place a decline Banco underneath the Smith machine. Now place the barra at a height that you can reach when lying down and your brazos are almost fully extended. Using a pronated grip that is wider than shoulder width, unlock the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos extended. This will be your starting posición.
As you Inhala, Baja the bar under control by allowing the elbows to flex, lightly contacting the torso.
After a brief pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición by extending the elbows, exhaling as you do so.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When the set is complete, lock the bar back in the rack.

name: Deficit Deadlift
instructions: Begin by having a platform or peso plates that you can Párate on, usually 1-3 inches in height. Approach the bar so that it is centered over your feet. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hip to grip the bar at shoulder width, allowing your shoulder blades to protract. Typically, you would use an overhand grip or an over/under grip on heavier sets.

With your feet, and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and bend the rodillas until your shins contact the bar. Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward. After the bar passes the rodillas, aggressively Tira the bar back, pulling your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward into the bar.
Baja the bar by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Depth Jump Leap
instructions: For this drill you will need two boxes or benches, one 12 to 16 inches high and the other 22 to 26 inches high.

Párate on one of the two boxes with brazos at the sides; feet should be together and slightly off the edge as in the depth jump. Place the other box approximately two or three feet in front of and facing the performer.
Begin by dropping off the initial box, landing and simultaneously taking off with both feet.
Rebound by driving upward and outward as intensely as possible, using the brazos and full Extensión of the cuerpo to jump onto the higher box. Again, allow the piernas to absorb the impact.

name: Dip Machine
instructions: Siéntate securely in a dip machine, Selecciona the peso and firmly grasp the handles.
Now Mantén your elbows in at your sides in order to place emphasis on the triceps. The elbows should be bent at a 90 degree angle.
As you contract the triceps, extend your brazos downwards as you Exhala. Tip: At the bottom of the movement, focus on keeping a little bend in your brazos to Mantén tension on the triceps muscle.
Now Lentamente let your brazos come back up to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Dips - Chest Version
instructions: For this exercise you will need access to parallel bars. To get yourself into the starting posición, Sostén your cuerpo at brazos length (brazos locked) above the bars.
While breathing in, Baja yourself Lentamente with your torso leaning forward around 30 degrees or so and your elbows flared out slightly until you feel a slight stretch in the chest.
Once you feel the stretch, use your chest to bring your cuerpo back to the starting posición as you Respira out. Tip: Remember to squeeze the chest at the top of the movement for a second.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Dips - Triceps Version
instructions: To get into the starting posición, Sostén your cuerpo at arm's length with your brazos nearly locked above the bars.

Now, Inhala and Lentamente Baja yourself downward. Your torso should remain upright and your elbows should stay close to your cuerpo. This helps to better focus on tricep involvement. Baja yourself until there is a 90 degree angle formed between the upper arm and forearm.
Then, Exhala and Empuja your torso back up using your triceps to bring your cuerpo back to the starting posición.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Donkey Calf Raises
instructions: For this exercise you will need access to a donkey calf raise machine. Start by positioning your Baja back and hips under the padded lever provided. The tailbone area should be the one making contact with the pad.

Place both of your brazos on the side handles and place the balls of your feet on the calf block with the heels extending off. Align the toes forward, inward or outward, depending on the area you wish to target, and straighten the rodillas without locking them. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your heels as you Respira out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Sostén the contracted posición by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Double con Pesa Rusa Alternating Hang Clean
instructions: Place two kettlebells between your feet. To get in the starting posición, Empuja your butt back and look straight ahead.
Clean one kettlebell to your shoulder and Sostén on to the other kettlebell.
With a fluid motion, Baja the top kettlebell while driving the bottom kettlebell up.

name: Double con Pesa Rusa Jerk
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle in each hand.

Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so, so that the palms face forward. This will be your starting posición.
Dip your cuerpo by bending the rodillas, keeping your torso upright.
Immediately reverse direction, driving through the heels, in essence jumping to create momentum.
As you do so, Press the kettlebells overhead to lockout by extending the brazos, using your cuerpo's momentum to move the weights.
Regresa your feet to the suelo in a split fashion, with one foot forward and one foot back.
Keeping the weights overhead, Regresa to a standing posición, bringing your feet together. Baja the weights to perform the next repetition.

name: Double con Pesa Rusa Push Press
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders.
Sentadilla down a few inches and reverse the motion rapidly. Use the momentum from the piernas to drive the kettlebells overhead.
Once the kettlebells are locked out, Baja the kettlebells to your shoulders and Repite.

name: Double con Pesa Rusa Snatch
instructions: Place two kettlebells behind your feet. Bend your rodillas and Siéntate back to pick up the kettlebells.
Swing the kettlebells between your piernas forcefully and reverse the direction.
Drive through with your hips and lock the ketttlebells overhead in one uninterrupted motion.

name: Double con Pesa Rusa Windmill
instructions: Place a kettlebell in front of your front foot and clean and Press a kettlebell overhead with your opposite arm. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward.

Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, Empuja your butt out in the direction of the locked out kettlebell. Turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the locked out kettlebell.

Bending at the hip to one side, sticking your butt out, Lentamente lean until you can retrieve the kettlebell from the suelo. Mantén your eyes on the kettlebell that you Sostén over your head at all times.
Pause for a second after retrieving the kettlebell from the suelo and reverse the motion back to the starting posición.

name: Double Leg Butt Kick
instructions: Begin standing with your rodillas slightly bent.
Quickly Sentadilla a short distance, flexing the hips and rodillas, and immediately extend to jump for maximum vertical height.
As you go up, tuck your heels by flexing the rodillas, attempting to touch the buttocks.
Finish the motion by landing with the rodillas only partially bent, using your piernas to absorb the impact.

name: Downward Facing Balance
instructions: Lie facedown on top of an exercise ball.
While resting on your stomach on the ball, walk your manos forward along the suelo and Levanta your piernas, extending your elbows and rodillas.

name: Drag Curl
instructions: Grab a barra with a supinated grip (palms facing forward) and get your elbows close to your torso and back. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala, Curl the bar up while keeping the elbows to the back as you "Drag" the bar up by keeping it in contact with your torso. Tip: As you can see, you will not be keeping the elbows pinned to your sides, but instead you will be bringing them back. Also, do not Levanta your shoulders.
Lentamente go back to the starting posición as you Mantén the bar in contact with the torso at all times.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Drop Push
instructions: posición low boxes or other platforms 2-3 feet apart.
Move to a pushup posición between them, supporting yourself by placing your manos on the boxes.
With good posture, drop from the platforms by pressing up and moving your manos to shoulder width, cushioning your landing by absorbing the impact through the arm.

name: con Mancuerna Alternate Bicep Curl
instructions: Párate (torso upright) with a dumbbell in each hand held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso and the palms of your hand should be facing your thighs.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the right peso as you rotate the palm of the manos until they are facing forward. At this point continue contracting the biceps as you Respira out until your biceps is fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Lentamente begin to bring the dumbbell back to the starting posición as your Respira in. Tip: Remember to twist the palms back to the starting posición (facing your thighs) as you come down.
Repite the movement with the left hand. This equals one repetition.
Continue alternating in this manner for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Bench Press
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in each hand resting on top of your thighs. The palms of your manos will be facing each other.
Then, using your thighs to help raise the mancuernas up, Levanta the mancuernas one at a time so that you can Sostén them in front of you at shoulder width.

Once at shoulder width, rotate your wrists forward so that the palms of your manos are facing away from you. The mancuernas should be just to the sides of your chest, with your upper arm and forearm creating a 90 degree angle. Be sure to maintain full control of the mancuernas at all times. This will be your starting posición.

Then, as you Respira out, use your chest to Empuja the mancuernas up. Lock your brazos at the top of the Levanta and squeeze your chest, Sostén for a second and then begin coming down Lentamente. Tip: Ideally, lowering the peso should take about twice as long as raising it.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.

name: con Mancuerna Bench Press with Neutral Grip
instructions: Take a dumbbell in each hand and lay back onto a flat Banco. Your feet should be flat on the suelo and your shoulder blades retracted.
Maintaining a neutral grip, palms facing each other, begin with your brazos extended directly above you, perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing the elbow, lowering the upper brazos to the side. Descend until the mancuernas are to your torso.
Pause, then extend the elbow and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Mancuerna Bicep Curl
instructions: Párate up straight with a dumbbell in each hand at arm's length. Mantén your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your manos until they are facing forward. This will be your starting posición.
