Now, keeping the upper brazos stationary, Exhala and Curl the weights while contracting your biceps. Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Then, Inhala and Lentamente begin to Baja the mancuernas back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Clean
instructions: Begin standing with a dumbbell in each hand with your feet shoulder width apart.
Baja the weights to the suelo by flexing at the hips and rodillas, pushing your hips back until the mancuernas reach the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

To initiate the movement, violently jump upward by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles to acclerate the weights upward. Maintaining a neutral grip on the mancuernas, Mantén the brazos straight until full Extensión is reached.
After full Extensión, rebend the hips and rodillas to receive the peso in a Sentadilla posición. Allow the brazos to bend, guiding the mancuernas to your shoulders.
Upon receiving the peso in the Sentadilla posición, extend the hips and rodillas to finish in a standing posición with the weights on your shoulders.

name: con Mancuerna Floor Press
instructions: Lay on the suelo holding mancuernas in your manos. Your rodillas can be bent. Begin with the weights fully extended above you.
Baja the weights until your upper arm comes in contact with the suelo. You can tuck your elbows to emphasize triceps size and strength, or to focus on your chest angle your brazos to the side.
Pause at the bottom, and then bring the peso together at the top by extending through the elbows.

name: con Mancuerna Flyes
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell on each hand resting on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.

Then using your thighs to help raise the mancuernas, Levanta the mancuernas one at a time so you can Sostén them in front of you at shoulder width with the palms of your manos facing each other. Raise the mancuernas up like you're pressing them, but stop and Sostén just before you lock out. This will be your starting posición.

With a slight bend on your elbows in order to prevent stress at the biceps tendon, Baja your brazos out at both sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch on your chest. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén in mind that throughout the movement, the brazos should remain stationary; the movement should only occur at the shoulder joint.
Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición as you squeeze your chest muscles and Respira out. Tip: Make sure to use the same arc of motion used to Baja the weights.
Sostén for a second at the contracted posición and Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Incline Row
instructions: Using a neutral grip, lean into an incline Banco.
Take a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip, beginning with the brazos straight. This will be your starting posición.
Retract the shoulder blades and flex the elbows to Remo the mancuernas to your side.
Pause at the top of the motion, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Mancuerna Incline Shoulder Raise
instructions: Siéntate on an Incline Banco while holding a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs.

Levanta your piernas up to kick the weights to your shoulders and lean back. posición the mancuernas above your shoulders with your brazos extended. The brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo with your palms facing forward and knuckles pointing towards the ceiling. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the brazos straight and locked, Levanta the mancuernas by raising the shoulders from the Banco as you Respira out.
Bring back the mancuernas to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Lunges
instructions: Párate with your torso upright holding two mancuernas in your manos by your sides. This will be your starting posición.

Step forward with your right leg around 2 feet or so from the foot being left stationary behind and Baja your upper cuerpo down, while keeping the torso upright and maintaining balance. Inhala as you go down. Note: As in the other exercises, do not allow your knee to go forward beyond your toes as you come down, as this will put undue stress on the knee joint. Make sure that you Mantén your front shin perpendicular to the suelo.
Using mainly the heel of your foot, Empuja up and go back to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite the movement for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform with the left leg.

name: con Mancuerna Lying One-Arm Rear Lateral Raise
instructions: While holding a dumbbell in one hand, lay with your chest down on a slightly inclined (around 15 degrees when measured from the suelo) adjustable Banco. The other hand can be used to Sostén to the leg of the Banco for stability.

posición the palm of the hand that is holding the dumbbell in a neutral manner (palms facing your torso) as you Mantén the arm extended with the elbow slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Now raise the arm with the dumbbell to the side until your elbow is at shoulder height and your arm is roughly parallel to the suelo as you Exhala. Tip: Maintain your arm perpendicular to the torso while keeping your arm extended throughout the movement. Also, Mantén the contraction at the top for a second.
Lentamente Baja the dumbbell to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Lying Pronation
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco face down with one arm holding a dumbbell and the other hand on top of the Banco folded so that you can rest your head on it.
Bend the elbows of the arm holding the dumbbell so that it creates a 90-degree angle between the upper arm and the forearm.

Now raise the upper arm so that the forearm is perpendicular to the suelo and the upper arm is perpendicular to your torso. Tip: The upper arm should be parallel to the suelo and also creating a 90-degree angle with your torso. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, externally rotate your forearm so that the dumbbell is lifted forward as you maintain the 90 degree angle bend between the upper brazos and the forearm. You will continue this external rotation until the forearm is parallel to the suelo. At this point you will Sostén the contraction for a second.
As you Respira in, Lentamente go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Lying Rear Lateral Raise
instructions: While holding a dumbbell in each hand, lay with your chest down on a slightly inclined (around 15 degrees when measured from the suelo) adjustable Banco.
posición the palms of the manos in a neutral manner (palms facing your torso) as you Mantén the brazos extended with the elbows slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Now raise the brazos to the side until your elbows are at shoulder height and your brazos are roughly parallel to the suelo as you Exhala. Tip: Maintain your brazos perpendicular to the torso while keeping them extended throughout the movement. Also, Mantén the contraction at the top for a second.
Lentamente Baja the mancuernas to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Cambia to the other arm.

name: con Mancuerna Lying Supination
instructions: Lie sideways on a flat Banco with one arm holding a dumbbell and the other hand on top of the Banco folded so that you can rest your head on it.
Bend the elbows of the arm holding the dumbbell so that it creates a 90-degree angle between the upper arm and the forearm.

Now raise the upper arm so that the forearm is parallel to the suelo and perpendicular to your torso (Tip: So the forearm will be directly in front of you). The upper arm will be stationary by your torso and should be parallel to the suelo (aligned with your torso at all times). This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, externally rotate your forearm so that the dumbbell is lifted up in a semicircle motion as you maintain the 90 degree angle bend between the upper brazos and the forearm. You will continue this external rotation until the forearm is perpendicular to the suelo and the torso pointing towards the ceiling. At this point you will Sostén the contraction for a second.
As you Respira in, Lentamente go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Cambia to the other arm.

name: con Mancuerna One-Arm Shoulder Press
instructions: Grab a dumbbell and either Siéntate on a military Press Banco or a utility Banco that has a back support on it as you place the mancuernas upright on top of your thighs or Párate up straight.
Clean the dumbbell up to bring it to shoulder height. The other hand can be kept fully extended to the side, by the waist or grabbing a fixed surface.
Rotate the wrist so that the palm of your hand is facing forward. This is your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Empuja the dumbbell up until your arm is fully extended.
After a second pause, Lentamente come down back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Cambia brazos.

name: con Mancuerna One-Arm Triceps Extension
instructions: Grab a dumbbell and either Siéntate on a military Press Banco or a utility Banco that has a back support on it as you place the mancuernas upright on top of your thighs or Párate up straight.

Clean the dumbbell up to bring it to shoulder height and then extend the arm over your head so that the whole arm is perpendicular to the suelo and next to your head. The dumbbell should be on top of you. The other hand can be kept fully extended to the side, by the waist, supporting the upper arm that has the dumbbell or grabbing a fixed surface.
Rotate the wrist so that the palm of your hand is facing forward and the pinkie is facing the ceiling. This will be your starting posición.
Lentamente Baja the dumbbell behind your head as you Sostén the upper arm stationary. Inhala as you perform this movement and pause when your triceps are fully stretched.
Regresa to the starting posición by flexing your triceps as you Respira out. Tip: It is imperative that only the forearm moves. The upper arm should remain at all times stationary next to your head.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and Cambia brazos.

name: con Mancuerna One-Arm Upright Row
instructions: Grab a dumbbell and Párate up straight with your arm extended in front of you with a slight bend at the elbows and your back straight. This will be your starting posición. Tip: The dumbbell should be resting on top of your thigh with the palm of your manos facing your thighs.
Mantén the other hand can be kept fully extended to the side, by the waist or grabbing a fixed surface. This will be your starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the dumbbell as you Exhala. The dumbbell should be close to the cuerpo as you move it up. Continue to Levanta it until the dumbbell is nearly in line with your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the dumbbell, your elbow should always be higher than your forearm. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the dumbbell back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and Cambia brazos.

name: con Mancuerna Prone Incline Curl
instructions: Grab a dumbbell on each hand and lie face down on an incline Banco with your shoulders near top of the incline. Your rodillas can rest on the seat or your piernas can be straddled to the sides (my preferred way).
Let your brazos extend and hang naturally in front of you so that they are perpendicular to the suelo.
Now Mantén your elbows in by your side and face the palms forward. This will be your starting posición.

Raise the mancuernas by contracting the biceps until your brazos are fully flexed. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement and ensure that only the forearms move. The upper brazos should remain stationary at all times.
Baja the mancuernas until your brazos are fully extended.
Repite for the recommended amount of times.

name: con Mancuerna Raise
instructions: Grab a dumbbell in each arm and Párate up straight with your brazos extended by your sides with a slight bend at the elbows and your back straight. This will be your starting posición. Tip: The dumbbell should be next to your thighs with the palm of your manos facing back.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the mancuernas as you Exhala. The mancuernas should be to the side of the cuerpo as you move them up. Continue to Levanta it until the mancuernas are nearly in line with your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the dumbbell, your elbow should always be higher than your forearm. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the mancuernas back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Rear Lunge
instructions: Párate with your torso upright holding two mancuernas in your manos by your sides. This will be your starting posición.

Step backward with your right leg around two feet or so from the left foot and Baja your upper cuerpo down, while keeping the torso upright and maintaining balance. Inhala as you go down. Tip: As in the other exercises, do not allow your knee to go forward beyond your toes as you come down, as this will put undue stress on the knee joint. Make sure that you Mantén your front shin perpendicular to the suelo. Mantén the torso upright during the Zancada; flexible hip flexors are important. A long Zancada emphasizes the Gluteus Maximus; a short Zancada emphasizes Quadriceps.
Empuja up and go back to the starting posición as you Exhala. Tip: Use the ball of your feet to Empuja in order to accentuate the quadriceps. To focus on the glutes, Press with your heels.
Now Repite with the opposite leg.

name: con Mancuerna Scaption
instructions: This corrective exercise strengthens the muscles that stabilize your shoulder blade. Sostén a light peso in each hand, hanging at your sides. Your thumbs should pointing up.
Begin the movement raising your brazos out in front of you, about 30 degrees off center. Your brazos should be fully extended as you perform the movement.
Continue until your brazos are parallel to the suelo, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Mancuerna Seated Box Jump
instructions: posición a box a couple feet to the side of a Banco. Sostén a dumbbell to your chest with both manos and seat yourself on the Banco facing the box. This will be your starting posición.
Plant your feet firmly on the suelo as you lean forward, extending through the hips and rodillas to jump up and forward.
Land on the box with both feet, absorbing the impact by allowing the hips and rodillas to bend.
Step down and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Mancuerna Seated One-Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Place a block on the suelo about 12 inches from a flat Banco.
Siéntate on a flat Banco and place a dumbbell on your upper left thigh about 3 inches above your knee.
Now place the ball of your left foot on the block. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your toes up as high as possible as you Exhala and you contract your calf muscle. Sostén the contraction for a second.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición, stretching as far down as possible.
Repite for your prescribed number of repetitions and then Repite with the right leg.

name: con Mancuerna Shoulder Press
instructions: While holding a dumbbell in each hand, Siéntate on a military Press Banco or utility Banco that has back support. Place the mancuernas upright on top of your thighs.
Now raise the mancuernas to shoulder height one at a time using your thighs to help propel them up into posición.
Make sure to rotate your wrists so that the palms of your manos are facing forward. This is your starting posición.
Now, Exhala and Empuja the mancuernas upward until they touch at the top.
Then, after a brief pause at the top contracted posición, Lentamente Baja the weights back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Shrug
instructions: Párate erect with a dumbbell on each hand (palms facing your torso), brazos extended on the sides.

Levanta the mancuernas by elevating the shoulders as high as possible while you Exhala. Sostén the contraction at the top for a second. Tip: The brazos should remain extended at all times. Refrain from using the biceps to help Levanta the mancuernas. Only the shoulders should be moving up and down.
Baja the mancuernas back to the original posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Side Bend
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a dumbbell on the left hand (palms facing the torso) as you have the right hand holding your waist. Your feet should be placed at shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping your back straight and your head up, bend only at the waist to the right as far as possible. Respira in as you bend to the side. Then Sostén for a second and come back up to the starting posición as you Exhala. Tip: Mantén the rest of the cuerpo stationary.
Now Repite the movement but bending to the left instead. Sostén for a second and come back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then change manos.

name: con Mancuerna Squat
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a dumbbell on each hand (palms facing the side of your piernas).

posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section.

Begin to Lentamente Baja your torso by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until your thighs are parallel to the suelo. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise your torso as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Squat To A Bench
instructions: Párate up straight with a flat Banco behind you while holding a dumbbell on each hand (palms facing the side of your piernas).

posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section.

Begin to Lentamente Baja your torso by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until you slightly touch the Banco behind you. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: con Mancuerna Step Ups
instructions: Párate up straight while holding a dumbbell on each hand (palms facing the side of your piernas).

Place the right foot on the elevated platform. Step on the platform by extending the hip and the knee of your right leg. Use the heel mainly to Levanta the rest of your cuerpo up and place the foot of the left leg on the platform as well. Respira out as you execute the force required to come up.

Step down with the left leg by flexing the hip and knee of the right leg as you Inhala. Regresa to the original standing posición by placing the right foot of to next to the left foot on the initial posición.
Repite with the right leg for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform with the left leg.

name: con Mancuerna Tricep Extension -Pronated Grip
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco holding two mancuernas directly above your shoulders. Your brazos should be fully extended and form a 90 degree angle from your torso and the suelo.
The palms of your manos should be facing forward, and your elbows should be tucked in. This will be your starting posición.
Now, Inhala and Lentamente Baja the mancuernas until they are near your ears. Be sure to Mantén your upper brazos stationary and your elbows tucked in.
Then, Exhala and use your triceps to Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: Dynamic Back Stretch
instructions: Párate with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your brazos straight, swing them straight up in front of you 5-10 times, increasing the range of motion each time until your brazos are above your head.

name: Dynamic Chest Stretch
instructions: Párate with your manos together, brazos extended directly in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your brazos straight, quickly move your brazos back as far as possible and back in again, similar to an exaggerated clapping motion. Repite 5-10 times, increasing speed as you do so.

name: EZ-Bar Curl
instructions: Párate up straight while holding an EZ Curl bar at the wide outer handle. The palms of your manos should be facing forward and slightly tilted inward due to the shape of the bar. Mantén your elbows close to your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Now, while keeping your upper brazos stationary, Exhala and Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps. Focus on only moving your forearms.
Continue to raise the peso until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the top contracted posición for a moment and squeeze the biceps.
Then Inhala and Lentamente Baja the bar back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: EZ-Bar Skullcrusher
instructions: Using a close grip, Levanta the EZ bar and Sostén it with your elbows in as you lie on the Banco. Your brazos should be perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the upper brazos stationary, Baja the bar by allowing the elbows to flex. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Pause once the bar is directly above the forehead.
Levanta the bar back to the starting posición by extending the elbow and exhaling.
Repite.

name: Elbow Circles
instructions: Siéntate or Párate with your feet slightly apart.
Place your manos on your shoulders with your elbows at shoulder level and pointing out.
Lentamente make a circle with your elbows. Respira out as you start the circle and Respira in as you complete the circle.

name: Elbow to Knee
instructions: Lie on the suelo, crossing your right leg across your bent left knee. Clasp your manos behind your head, beginning with your shoulder blades on the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the motion by flexing the spine and rotating your torso to bring the left elbow to the right knee.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite the movement for the desired number of repetitions before switching sides.

name: Elbows Back
instructions: Párate up straight.
Place both manos on your Baja back, fingers pointing downward and elbows out.
Then gently Tira your elbows back aiming to touch them together.

name: Elevated Back Lunge
instructions: posición a bar onto a rack at shoulder height loaded to an appropriate peso. Place a short, raised platform behind you.
Rack the bar onto your upper back, keeping your back arched and tight. Step onto your raised platform with both feet. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by stepping backwards with one leg. Descend by flexing your hips and rodillas until your knee touches the suelo.
Pause, and extend through the hips and rodillas to rise up, returning all the way to the starting posición before alternating.

name: Elevated en Cable Rows
instructions: Get a platform of some sort (it can be an aerobics or calf raise platform) that is around 4-6 inches in height.
Place it on the seat of the cable Remo machine.
Siéntate down on the machine and place your feet on the front platform or crossbar provided making sure that your rodillas are slightly bent and not locked.
Lean over as you Mantén the natural alignment of your back and grab the V-bar handles.

With your brazos extended Tira back until your torso is at a 90-degree angle from your piernas. Your back should be slightly arched and your chest should be sticking out. You should be feeling a nice stretch on your lats as you Sostén the bar in front of you. This is the starting posición of the exercise.

Keeping the torso stationary, Tira the handles back towards your torso while keeping the brazos close to it until you touch the abdominals. Respira out as you perform that movement. At that point you should be squeezing your back muscles hard. Sostén that contraction for a second and Lentamente go back to the original posición while breathing in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Elliptical Trainer
instructions: To begin, step onto the elliptical and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. Most ellipticals have a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. Elevation can be adjusted to change the intensity of the workout.
The handles can be used to monitor your heart rate to help you stay at an appropriate intensity.

name: Exercise Ball Crunch
instructions: Lie on an exercise ball with your Baja back curvature pressed against the spherical surface of the ball. Your feet should be bent at the knee and pressed firmly against the suelo. The upper torso should be hanging off the top of the ball. The brazos should either be kept alongside the cuerpo or crossed on top of your chest as these positions avoid neck strains (as opposed to the manos behind the back of the head posición).
Baja your torso into a stretch posición keeping the neck stationary at all times. This will be your starting posición.

With the hips stationary, flex the waist by contracting the abdominals and Curl the shoulders and trunk upward until you feel a nice contraction on your abdominals. The brazos should simply slide up the side of your piernas if you have them at the side or just stay on top of your chest if you have them crossed. The Baja back should always stay in contact with the ball. Exhala as you perform this movement and Sostén the contraction for a second.
As you Inhala, go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Exercise Ball Pull-In
instructions: Place an exercise ball nearby and lay on the suelo in front of it with your manos on the suelo shoulder width apart in a Empuja-up posición.

Now place your Baja shins on top of an exercise ball. Tip: At this point your piernas should be fully extended with the shins on top of the ball and the upper cuerpo should be in a Empuja-up type of posición being supported by your two extended brazos in front of you. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping your back completely straight and the upper cuerpo stationary, Tira your rodillas in towards your chest as you Exhala, allowing the ball to roll forward under your ankles. Squeeze your abs and Sostén that posición for a second.
Now Lentamente straighten your piernas, rolling the ball back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Extended Range One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Floor Press
instructions: Lie on the suelo and posición a kettlebell for one arm to Press. The kettlebell should be held by the handle. The leg on the same side that you are pressing should be bent, with the knee crossing over the midline of the cuerpo.
Press the kettlebell by extending the elbow and adducting the arm, pressing it above your cuerpo. Regresa to the starting posición.

name: External Rotation
instructions: Lie sideways on a flat Banco with one arm holding a dumbbell and the other hand on top of the Banco folded so that you can rest your head on it.
Bend the elbows of the arm holding the dumbbell so that it creates a 90-degree angle between the upper arm and the forearm. Tip: Mantén the arm parallel to your torso.

Now bend the elbow while keeping the upper arm stationary. In this manner, the forearm will be parallel to the suelo and perpendicular to your torso (Tip: So the forearm will be directly in front of you). The upper arm will be stationary by your torso and should be parallel to the suelo (aligned with your torso at all times). This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, externally rotate your forearm so that the dumbbell is lifted up in a semicircle motion as you maintain the 90 degree angle bend between the upper brazos and the forearm. You will continue this external rotation until the forearm is perpendicular to the suelo and the torso pointing towards the ceiling. At this point you will Sostén the contraction for a second.
As you Respira in, Lentamente go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Cambia to the other arm.

name: External Rotation with con Banda
instructions: Choke the band around a post. The band should be at the same height as your elbow. Párate with your left side to the band a couple of feet away.
Grasp the end of the band with your right hand, and Mantén your elbow pressed firmly to your side. We recommend you Sostén a pad or foam roll in place with your elbow to Mantén it firmly in posición.
With your upper arm in posición, your elbow should be flexed to 90 degrees with your hand reaching across the front of your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Execute the movement by rotating your arm in a backhand motion, keeping your elbow in place.
Continue as far as you are able, pause, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: External Rotation with en Cable
instructions: Adjust the cable to the same height as your elbow. Párate with your left side to the band a couple of feet away.
Grasp the handle with your right hand, and Mantén your elbow pressed firmly to your side. We recommend you Sostén a pad or foam roll in place with your elbow to Mantén it firmly in posición.
With your upper arm in posición, your elbow should be flexed to 90 degrees with your hand reaching across the front of your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Execute the movement by rotating your arm in a backhand motion, keeping your elbow in place.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Facing a high pulley with a rope or dual handles attached, Tira the peso directly towards your face, separating your manos as you do so. Mantén your upper brazos parallel to the suelo.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: There are various implements that can be used for the farmers walk. These can also be performed with heavy mancuernas or short bars if these implements aren't available. Begin by standing between the implements.
After gripping the handles, Levanta them up by driving through your heels, keeping your back straight and your head up.
Walk taking short, quick steps, and don't forget to Respira. Move for a given distance, typically 50-100 feet, as fast as possible.

name: Fast Skipping
instructions: Start in a relaxed posición with one leg slightly forward. This will be your starting posición.
Skip by executing a step-hop pattern of right-right-step to left-left-step, and so on, alternating back and forth.
Perform fast skips by maintaining close contact with the suelo and reduce air time, moving as quickly as possible.

name: Finger Curls
instructions: Sostén a barra with both manos and your palms facing up; manos spaced about shoulder width.
Place your feet flat on the suelo, at a distance that is slightly wider than shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the bar as far as possible by extending the fingers. Allowing the bar to roll down the manos, catch the bar with the final joint in the fingers.
Now Curl bar up as high as possible by closing your manos while exhaling. Sostén the contraction at the top.

name: Flat Bench en Cable Flyes
instructions: posición a flat Banco between two low pulleys so that when you are laying on it, your chest will be lined up with the cable pulleys.
Lay flat on the Banco and Mantén your feet on the suelo.
Have someone hand you the handles on each hand. You will grab each single handle attachment with a palms up grip.

Extend your brazos by your side with a slight bend on your elbows. Tip: You will Mantén this bend constant through the whole movement. Your brazos should be parallel to the suelo. This is your starting posición.

Now start lifting the brazos in a semi-circle motion directly in front of you by pulling the cables together until both manos meet at the top of the movement. Squeeze your chest as you perform this motion and Respira out during this movement. Also, Sostén the contraction for a second at the top. Tip: When performed correctly, at the top posición of this movement, your brazos should be perpendicular to your torso and the suelo touching above your chest.
Lentamente come back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Flat Bench Leg Pull-In
instructions: Lie on an exercise mat or a flat Banco with your piernas off the end.

Place your manos either under your glutes with your palms down or by the sides holding on to the Banco (or with palms down by the side on an exercise mat). Also extend your piernas straight out. This will be your starting posición.
Bend your rodillas and Tira your upper thighs into your midsection as you Respira out. Continue this movement until your rodillas are near your chest. Sostén the contracted posición for a second.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Flat Bench Lying Leg Raise
instructions: Lie with your back flat on a Banco and your piernas extended in front of you off the end.
Place your manos either under your glutes with your palms down or by the sides holding on to the Banco. This will be your starting posición.

As you Mantén your piernas extended, straight as possible with your rodillas slightly bent but locked raise your piernas until they make a 90-degree angle with the suelo. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement and Sostén the contraction at the top for a second.
Now, as you Inhala, Lentamente Baja your piernas back down to the starting posición.

name: Flexor Incline con Mancuerna Curls
instructions: Sostén the dumbbell towards the side farther from you so that you have more peso on the side closest to you. (This can be done for a good effect on all bicep dumbbell exercises). Now do a normal incline dumbbell Curl, but Mantén your wrists as far back as possible so as to neutralize any stress that is placed on them.
Siéntate on an incline Banco that is angled at 45-degrees while holding a dumbbell on each hand.

Let your brazos hang down on your sides, with the elbows in, and turn the palms of your manos forward with the thumbs pointing away from the cuerpo. Tip: You will Mantén this hand posición throughout the movement as there should not be any twisting of the manos as they come up. This will be your starting posición.

Curl up the two mancuernas at the same time until your biceps are fully contracted and Exhala. Tip: Do not swing the brazos or use momentum. Mantén a controlled motion at all times. Sostén the contracted posición for a second at the top.
As you Inhala, Lentamente go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Floor Glute-Ham Raise
instructions: You can use a partner for this exercise or brace your feet under something stable.
Begin on your rodillas with your upper piernas and torso upright. If using a partner, they will firmly Sostén your feet to Mantén you in posición. This will be your starting posición.
Baja yourself by extending at the knee, taking care to NOT flex the hips as you go forward.

Place your manos in front of you as you reach the suelo. This movement is very difficult and you may be unable to do it unaided. Use your brazos to lightly Empuja off the suelo to aid your Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Floor Press
instructions: Adjust the j-hooks so they are at the appropriate height to rack the bar. Begin lying on the suelo with your head near the end of a power rack. Keeping your shoulder blades pulled together; Tira the bar off of the hooks.

Baja the bar towards the bottom of your chest or upper stomach, squeezing the bar and attempting to Tira it apart as you do so. Ensure that you tuck your elbows throughout the movement. Baja the bar until your upper arm contacts the suelo and pause, preventing any slamming or bouncing of the peso.
Press the bar back up as fast as you can, keeping the bar, your wrists, and elbows in line as you do so.

name: Floor Press with Chains
instructions: Adjust the j-hooks so they are at the appropriate height to rack the bar. For this exercise, drape the chains directly over the end of the bar, trying to Mantén the ends away from the plates.
Begin lying on the suelo with your head near the end of a power rack. Keeping your shoulder blades pulled together, Tira the bar off of the hooks.

Baja the bar towards the bottom of your chest or upper stomach, squeezing the bar and attempting to Tira it apart as you do so. Ensure that you tuck your elbows throughout the movement. Baja the bar until your upper arm contacts the suelo and pause, preventing any slamming or bouncing of the peso.
Press the bar back up as fast as you can, keeping the bar, your wrists, and elbows in line as you do so.

name: Flutter Kicks
instructions: On a flat Banco lie facedown with the hips on the edge of the Banco, the piernas straight with toes high off the suelo and with the brazos on top of the Banco holding on to the front edge.
Squeeze your glutes and hamstrings and straighten the piernas until they are level with the hips. This will be your starting posición.
Start the movement by lifting the left leg higher than the right leg.
Then Baja the left leg as you Levanta the right leg.

Continue alternating in this manner (as though you are doing a flutter kick in water) until you have done the recommended amount of repetitions for each leg. Make sure that you Mantén a controlled movement at all times. Tip: You will Respira normally as you perform this movement.

name: Foot-SMR
instructions: This exercise stretches the fascia of the muscles in the feet. Start off seated with your shoes removed. Using a foot roller or a similar object, such as a small section of pvc pipe, place your foot against the roller across the arch of your foot. This will be your starting posición.
Press down firmly, rolling across the arch of your foot. Sostén for 10-30 seconds, and then Cambia feet.

name: Forward Drag with Press
instructions: Attach a dual handled chain or rope attachment to the sled. You should be facing away from the sled, holding a handle in each hand.

Begin the movement by moving forward for one step. Leaning forward, extend through the piernas and hips to move, pausing with each step to extend through the elbows, pressing your manos forward. Step forward until you Regresa to the start posición prepared to Press.

name: Frankenstein Squat
instructions: This drill teaches you the proper positioning of both the bar and your cuerpo during the clean and front Sentadilla.

Place the barra on the front of the shoulders, releasing your grip and extending your brazos out in front of you. The shoulders should be pushed forward to create a shelf, and the bar should be in contact with the throat. Ensure that you only move your shoulder blades forward; don't round the thoracic spine.

Sentadilla by flexing the rodillas and hips, sitting in between your piernas. Mantén the torso upright, the brazos up, and the shoulders forward, and the bar should stay in place. Go to the bottom of the Sentadilla, until your hamstrings contact your calves.
Regresa to the upright posición by driving through the front of the heel and extending the rodillas and hips.

name: Freehand Jump Squat
instructions: Cross your brazos over your chest.
With your head up and your back straight, posición your feet at shoulder width.
Keeping your back straight and chest up, Sentadilla down as you Inhala until your upper thighs are parallel, or Baja, to the suelo.
Now pressing mainly with the ball of your feet, jump straight up in the air as high as possible, using the thighs like springs. Exhala during this portion of the movement.
When you touch the suelo again, immediately Sentadilla down and jump again.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Frog Hops
instructions: Párate with your manos behind your head, and Sentadilla down keeping your torso upright and your head up. This will be your starting posición.
Jump forward several feet, avoiding jumping unnecessarily high. As your feet contact the suelo, absorb the impact through your piernas, and jump again. Repite this action 5-10 times.

name: Frog Sit-Ups
instructions: Lie with your back flat on the suelo (or exercise mat) and your piernas extended in front of you.
Now bend at the rodillas and place your outer thighs by the suelo (or mat) as you make the soles of your feet touch each other.

Now try pushing both soles and bringing them up as near you as possible while you Mantén the outer thighs on the suelo (or at least almost touching it). Tip: In this posición your piernas should create a diamond shape.
Now, cross your brazos in front of you by touching the opposite shoulders. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala flatten your Baja back to the suelo while curling the torso upwards. Tip: This will be like performing the first 1/4 movement of a Siéntate up. Sostén at the top posición for a second.
As you Inhala, Lentamente Baja back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front con Barra Squat
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, bring your brazos up under the bar while keeping the elbows high and the upper arm slightly above parallel to the suelo. Rest the bar on top of the deltoids and cross your brazos while grasping the bar for total control.
Levanta the bar off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances described in the foot positioning section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo mainly with the middle of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front con Barra Squat To A Bench
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set a flat Banco behind you and set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, bring your brazos up under the bar while keeping the elbows high and the upper arm slightly above parallel to the suelo. Rest the bar on top of the deltoids and cross your brazos while grasping the bar for total control.
Levanta the bar off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances described in the foot positioning section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until you touch the Banco with your glutes. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo mainly with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front Box Jump
instructions: Begin with a box of an appropriate height 1-2 feet in front of you. Párate with your feet should width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Perform a short Sentadilla in preparation for jumping, swinging your brazos behind you.
Rebound out of this posición, extending through the hips, rodillas, and ankles to jump as high as possible. Swing your brazos forward and up.
Land on the box with the rodillas bent, absorbing the impact through the piernas. You can jump from the box back to the suelo, or preferably step down one leg at a time.

name: Front en Cable Raise
instructions: Selecciona the peso on a low pulley machine and grasp the single hand cable attachment that is attached to the low pulley with your left hand.

Face away from the pulley and put your arm straight down with the hand cable attachment in front of your thighs at brazos' length with the palms of the hand facing your thighs. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso stationary (no swinging), Levanta the left arm to the front with a slight bend on the elbow and the palms of the hand always faces down. Continue to go up until you arm is slightly above parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this portion of the movement and pause for a second at the top.
Now as you Inhala Baja the arm back down Lentamente to the starting posición.
Once all of the recommended amount of repetitions have been performed for this arm, Cambia brazos and perform the exercise with the right one.

name: Front Cone Hops (or hurdle hops)
instructions: Set up a Remo of cones or other small barriers, placing them a few feet apart.
Párate in front of the first cone with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by jumping with both feet over the first cone, swinging both brazos as you jump.
Absorb the impact of landing by bending the rodillas, rebounding out of the first leap by jumping over the next cone.
Continue until you have jumped over all of the cones.

name: Front con Mancuerna Raise
instructions: Pick a couple of mancuernas and Párate with a straight torso and the mancuernas on front of your thighs at brazos length with the palms of the hand facing your thighs. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso stationary (no swinging), Levanta the left dumbbell to the front with a slight bend on the elbow and the palms of the manos always facing down. Continue to go up until you arm is slightly above parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this portion of the movement and pause for a second at the top. Inhala after the second pause.
Now Baja the dumbbell back down Lentamente to the starting posición as you simultaneously Levanta the right dumbbell.
Continue alternating in this fashion until all of the recommended amount of repetitions have been performed for each arm.

name: Front Incline con Mancuerna Raise
instructions: Siéntate down on an incline Banco with the incline set anywhere between 30 to 60 degrees while holding a dumbbell on each hand. Tip: You can change the angle to hit the muscle a little differently each time.
Extend your brazos straight in front of you and have your palms facing down with the mancuernas raised about 1 inch above your thighs. This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente raise the mancuernas straight up until they are slightly above your shoulders, while keeping your elbows locked. Squeeze at the top for a second and make sure you Respira out during this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén your head resting down against the Banco and your piernas on the suelo at all times.
Baja the brazos back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front Leg Raises
instructions: Párate next to a chair or other support, holding on with one hand.
Swing your leg forward, keeping the leg straight. Continue with a downward swing, bringing the leg as far back as your flexibility allows. Repite 5-10 times, and then Cambia piernas.

name: Front Plate Raise
instructions: While standing straight, Sostén a barra plate in both manos at the 3 and 9 o'clock positions. Your palms should be facing each other and your brazos should be extended and locked with a slight bend at the elbows and the plate should be down near your waist in front of you as far as you can go. Tip: The brazos will remain in this posición throughout the exercise. This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente raise the plate as you Exhala until it is a little above shoulder level. Sostén the contraction for a second. Tip: make sure that you do not swing the peso or bend at the elbows. Your torso should remain stationary throughout the movement as well.
As you Inhala, Lentamente Baja the plate back down to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front Raise And Pullover
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco while holding a barra using a palms down grip that is about 15 inches apart.
Place the bar on your upper thighs, extend your brazos and lock them while keeping a slight bend on the elbows. This will be your starting posición.

Now raise the peso using a semicircular motion and keeping your brazos straight as you Inhala. Continue the same movement until the bar is on the other side above your head . (Tip: the bar will travel approximately 180-degrees). At this point your brazos should be parallel to the suelo with the palms of your manos facing the ceiling.
Now Regresa the barra to the starting posición by reversing the motion as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Front Squat (Clean Grip)
instructions: To begin, first set the bar in a rack slightly below shoulder level. Rest the bar on top of the deltoids, pushing into the clavicles, and lightly touching the throat. Your manos should be in a clean grip, touching the bar only with your fingers to help Mantén it in posición.

Levanta the bar off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso. Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head and elbows up at all times. This will be your starting posición.

Bend at the rodillas, sitting down between your piernas. Continue down until your hamstrings are on your calves. Mantén your rodillas aligned with your feet by consciously using your abductors to Empuja your rodillas out as you Sentadilla.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo mainly with the heel or middle of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Front Squats With Two con Pesa Rusas
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders. Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so.

Looking straight ahead at all times, Sentadilla as low as you can and pause at the bottom. As you Sentadilla down, Empuja your rodillas out. You should Sentadilla between your piernas, keeping an upright torso, with your head and chest up.
Rise back up by driving through your heels and Repite.

name: Front Two-con Mancuerna Raise
instructions: Pick a couple of mancuernas and Párate with a straight torso and the mancuernas on front of your thighs at brazos length with the palms of the hand facing your thighs. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso stationary (no swinging), Levanta the mancuernas to the front with a slight bend on the elbow and the palms of the manos always facing down. Continue to go up until you brazos are slightly above parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this portion of the movement and pause for a second at the top.
As you Inhala, Baja the mancuernas back down Lentamente to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Full Range-Of-Motion Lat Pulldown
instructions: Either standing or seated on a high Banco, grasp two stirrup cables that are attached to the high pulleys. Grab with the opposing hand so your brazos are crisscrossed about you and your palms are facing forward.

Keeping your chest up and maintaining a slight arch in your Baja back, Tira the handles down as if you were doing a regular pulldown. The range of motion will be more of an arc. During the movement, rotate your manos so that in the bottom posición your palms face each other rather than forward. Regresa Lentamente to the starting posición and Repite.

name: Gironda Sternum Chins
instructions: Grasp the Tira-up bar with a shoulder width underhand grip.
Now hang with your brazos fully extended and stick your chest out and lean back. Tip: You will be leaning back throughout the entire movement. This will be your starting posición.

Start pulling yourself towards the bar with your spine arched throughout the movement and your head leaning back as far away from the bar as possible. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: At the upper end of the movement, your hips and piernas will be at about a 45-degree angle to the suelo.

Mantén pulling until your collarbone passes the bar and your Baja chest or sternum area touches it. Sostén that contraction for a second. Tip: By the time you've completed this portion of the movement; your head will be parallel to the suelo.
Lentamente start going back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Glute Ham Raise
instructions: Begin by adjusting the equipment to fit your cuerpo. Place your feet against the footplate in between the rollers as you lie facedown. Your rodillas should be just behind the pad.

Start from the bottom of the movement. Mantén your back arched as you begin the movement by flexing the rodillas. Drive your toes into the foot plate as you do so. Mantén your upper cuerpo straight, and continue until your cuerpo is upright.
Regresa to the starting posición, keeping your descent under control.

name: Glute Kickback
instructions: Kneel on the suelo or an exercise mat and bend at the waist with your brazos extended in front of you (perpendicular to the torso) in order to get into a kneeling Empuja-up posición but with the brazos spaced at shoulder width. Your head should be looking forward and the bend of the rodillas should create a 90-degree angle between the hamstrings and the calves. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala, Levanta up your right leg until the hamstrings are in line with the back while maintaining the 90-degree angle bend. Contract the glutes throughout this movement and Sostén the contraction at the top for a second. Tip: At the end of the movement the upper leg should be parallel to the suelo while the calf should be perpendicular to it.
Go back to the initial posición as you Inhala and now Repite with the left leg.
Continue to alternate piernas until all of the recommended repetitions have been performed.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Párate holding a light kettlebell by the horns close to your chest. This will be your starting posición.
Sentadilla down between your piernas until your hamstrings are on your calves. Mantén your chest and head up and your back straight.
At the bottom posición, pause and use your elbows to Empuja your rodillas out. Regresa to the starting posición, and Repite for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Good Morning
instructions: Begin with a bar on a rack at shoulder height. Rack the bar across the rear of your shoulders as you would a power Sentadilla, not on top of your shoulders. Mantén your back tight, shoulder blades pinched together, and your rodillas slightly bent. Step back from the rack.
Begin by bending at the hips, moving them back as you bend over to near parallel. Mantén your back arched and your cervical spine in proper alignment.
Reverse the motion by extending through the hips with your glutes and hamstrings. Continue until you have returned to the starting posición.

name: Good Morning off Pins
instructions: Begin with a bar on a rack at about the same height as your stomach. Bend over underneath the bar and rack the bar across the rear of your shoulders as you would a power Sentadilla, not on top of your shoulders. At the proper height, you should be near parallel to the suelo when bent over. Mantén your back tight, shoulder blades pinched together, and your rodillas slightly bent. Mantén your back arched and your cervical spine in proper alignment.
Begin the motion by extending through the hips with your glutes and hamstrings, and you are standing with the peso. Lentamente Baja the peso back to the pins returning to the starting posición.

name: Gorilla Chin/Crunch
instructions: Hang from a chin-up bar using an underhand grip (palms facing you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width.
Now bend your rodillas at a 90 degree angle so that the calves are parallel to the suelo while the thighs remain perpendicular to it. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala, Tira yourself up while crunching your rodillas up at the same time until your rodillas are at chest level. You will stop going up as soon as your nose is at the same level as the bar. Tip: When you get to this point you should also be finishing the crunch at the same time.
Lentamente start to Inhala as you Regresa to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Groin and Back Stretch
instructions: Siéntate on the suelo with your rodillas bent and feet together.
Interlock your fingers behind your head. This will be your starting posición.
Curl downwards, bringing your elbows to the inside of your thighs. After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición with your head up and your back straight. Repite for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Groiners
instructions: Begin in a pushup posición on the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Using both piernas, jump forward landing with your feet next to your manos. Mantén your head up as you do so.
Regresa to the starting posición and immediately Repite the movement, continuing for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Hack Squat
instructions: Place the back of your torso against the back pad of the machine and hook your shoulders under the shoulder pads provided.

posición your piernas in the platform using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Tip: Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain the back on the pad at all times.
Place your brazos on the side handles of the machine and disengage the safety bars (which on most designs is done by moving the side handles from a facing front posición to a diagonal posición).

Now straighten your piernas without locking the rodillas. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances described in the foot positioning section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the unit by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up (back on the pad at all times). Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the unit as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with mainly with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright and a dumbbell on each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
The palms of the manos should be facing your torso. This will be your starting posición.

Now, while holding your upper arm stationary, Exhala and Curl the peso forward while contracting the biceps. Continue to raise the peso until the biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a brief moment as you squeeze the biceps. Tip: Focus on keeping the elbow stationary and only moving your forearm.
After the brief pause, Inhala and Lentamente begin the Baja the mancuernas back down to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hammer Grip Incline DB Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on an incline Banco with a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.
By using your thighs to help you get the mancuernas up, clean the mancuernas one arm at a time so that you can Sostén them at shoulder width.

Once at shoulder width, Mantén the palms of your manos with a neutral grip (palms facing each other). Mantén your elbows flared out with the upper brazos in line with the shoulders (perpendicular to the torso) and the elbows bent creating a 90-degree angle between the upper arm and the forearm. This will be your starting posición.
Now bring down the weights Lentamente to your side as you Respira in. Mantén full control of the mancuernas at all times.

As you Respira out, Empuja the mancuernas up using your pectoral muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the mancuernas back in your thighs and then on the suelo. This is the safest manner to dispose of the mancuernas.

name: Hamstring-SMR
instructions: In a seated posición, extend your piernas over a foam roll so that it is posición on the back of the upper piernas. Place your manos to the side or behind you to help support your peso. This will be your starting posición.
Using your manos, Levanta your hips off of the suelo and shift your peso on the foam roll to one leg. Relax the hamstrings of the leg you are stretching.
Roll over the foam from below the hip to above the back of the knee, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite for the other leg.

name: Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Lie on your back with one leg extended above you, with the hip at ninety degrees. Mantén the other leg flat on the suelo.
Loop a belt, band, or rope over the ball of your foot. This will be your starting posición.
Tira on the belt to create tension in the calves and hamstrings. Sostén this stretch for 10-30 seconds, and Repite with the other leg.

name: Handstand Push-Ups
instructions: With your back to the wall bend at the waist and place both manos on the suelo at shoulder width.

Kick yourself up against the wall with your brazos straight. Your cuerpo should be upside down with the brazos and piernas fully extended. Mantén your whole cuerpo as straight as possible. Tip: If doing this for the first time, have a spotter help you. Also, make sure that you Mantén facing the wall with your head, rather than looking down.
Lentamente Baja yourself to the suelo as you Inhala until your head almost touches the suelo. Tip: It is of utmost importance that you come down slow in order to avoid head injury.
Empuja yourself back up Lentamente as you Exhala until your elbows are nearly locked.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hang Clean
instructions: Begin with a shoulder width, double overhand or hook grip, with the bar hanging at the mid thigh posición. Your back should be straight and inclined slightly forward.
Begin by aggressively extending through the hips, rodillas and ankles, driving the peso upward. As you do so, shrug your shoulders towards your ears.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición.

name: Hang Clean - Below the Knees
instructions: Begin with a shoulder width, double overhand or hook grip, with the bar hanging just below the rodillas. Your back should be straight and inclined slightly forward.

Begin by aggressively extending through the hips, rodillas and ankles, driving the peso upward. As you do so, shrug your shoulders towards your ears. As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the third Tira by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out.

At peak Extensión, aggressively Tira yourself down, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so. Receive the bar in a front Sentadilla posición, the depth of which is dependent upon the height of the bar at the end of the third Tira. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed. Continue to descend to the bottom Sentadilla posición, which will help in the recovery.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición.

name: Hang Snatch
instructions: Begin with a wide grip on the bar, with an overhand or hook grip. The feet should be directly below the hips with the feet turned out. Your rodillas should be slightly bent, and the torso inclined forward. The spine should be fully extended and the head facing forward. The bar should be at the hips. This will be your starting posición.
Aggressively extend through the piernas and hips. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, forcefully Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. Receive the bar with your cuerpo as low as possible and the brazos fully extended overhead.
Regresa to a standing posición with the peso overhead. Follow by returning the peso to the suelo under control.

name: Hang Snatch - Below Knees
instructions: Begin with a wide grip on the bar, with an overhand or hook grip. The feet should be directly below the hips with the feet turned out. Your rodillas should be slightly bent, and the torso inclined forward. The spine should be fully extended and the head facing forward. The bar should be just below the rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Aggressively extend through the piernas and hips. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, forcefully Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. Receive the bar with your cuerpo as low as possible and the brazos fully extended overhead.
Regresa to a standing posición with the peso overhead, and then Regresa the peso to the suelo under control.

name: Hanging Bar Good Morning
instructions: Begin with a bar on a rack at about the same height as your stomach. Suspend the bar using chains or suspension straps.

Bend over underneath the bar and rack the bar across the rear of your shoulders as you would a power Sentadilla, not on top of your traps. At the proper height, you should be near parallel to the suelo when bent over. Mantén your back tight, shoulder blades pinched together, and your rodillas slightly bent. Mantén your back arched and your cervical spine in proper alignment.
Begin the motion by extending through the hips with your glutes and hamstrings, and you are standing with the peso.
Lentamente Baja the peso back to the starting posición, where it is supported by the chains.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a chin-up bar with both brazos extended at brazos length in top of you using either a wide grip or a medium grip. The piernas should be straight down with the pelvis rolled slightly backwards. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your piernas until the torso makes a 90-degree angle with the piernas. Exhala as you perform this movement and Sostén the contraction for a second or so.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hanging Pike
instructions: Hang from a chin-up bar with your piernas and feet together using an overhand grip (palms facing away from you) that is slightly wider than shoulder width. Tip: You may use wrist wraps in order to facilitate holding on to the bar.

Now bend your rodillas at a 90 degree angle and bring the upper piernas forward so that the calves are perpendicular to the suelo while the thighs remain parallel to it. This will be your starting posición.
Tira your piernas up as you Exhala until you almost touch your shins with the bar above you. Tip: Try to straighten your piernas as much as possible while at the top.
Baja your piernas as Lentamente as possible until you reach the starting posición. Tip: Avoid swinging and using momentum at all times.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Heaving Snatch Balance
instructions: This drill helps you learn the snatch. Begin by holding a light peso across the back of the shoulders. Your feet should be slightly wider than hip width apart with the feet turned out, the same posición that you would perform a Sentadilla with.
Begin by dipping with the rodillas slightly, and popping back up to briefly unload the bar. Drive yourself underneath the bar, elevating it overhead as you descend into a full Sentadilla.
Regresa to a standing posición.

name: Heavy Bag Thrust
instructions: Utilize a heavy bag for this exercise. Assume an upright stance next to the bag, with your feet staggered, fairly wide apart. Place your hand on the bag at about chest height. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by twisting at the waist, pushing the bag forward as hard as possible. Perform this move quickly, pushing the bag away from your cuerpo.
Receive the bag as it swings back by reversing these steps.

name: High en Cable Curls
instructions: Párate between a couple of high pulleys and grab a handle in each arm. posición your upper brazos in a way that they are parallel to the suelo with the palms of your manos facing you. This will be your starting posición.

Curl the handles towards you until they are next to your ears. Make sure that as you do so you flex your biceps and Exhala. The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Sostén for a second in the contracted posición as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente bring back the brazos to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hip Circles (prone)
instructions: posición yourself on your manos and rodillas on the suelo. Maintaining good posture, raise one bent knee off of the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the knee in a bent posición, rotate the femur in an arc, attempting to make a big circle with your knee.
Perform this Lentamente for a number of repetitions, and Repite on the other side.

name: Hip Extension with con Bandas
instructions: Secure one end of the band to the Baja portion of a post and attach the other to one ankle.
Facing the attachment point of the band, Sostén on to the column to stabilize yourself.
Keeping your head and your chest up, move the resisted leg back as far as you can while keeping the knee straight.
Regresa the leg to the starting posición.

name: Hip Flexion with con Banda
instructions: Secure one end of the band to the Baja portion of a post and attach the other to one ankle.
Face away from the attachment point of the band.
Keeping your head and your chest up, raise your knee up to 90 degrees and pause.
Regresa the leg to the starting posición.

name: Hip Lift with con Banda
instructions: After choosing a suitable band, lay down in the middle of the rack, after securing the band on either side of you. If your rack doesn't have pegs, the band can be secured using heavy mancuernas or similar objects, just ensure they won't move.
Adjust your posición so that the band is directly over your hips. Bend your rodillas and place your feet flat on the suelo. Your manos can be on the suelo or holding the band in posición.
Keeping your shoulders on the suelo, drive through your heels to raise your hips, pushing into the band as high as you can.
Pause at the top of the motion, and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Hug A Ball
instructions: Seat yourself on the suelo.
Straddle an exercise ball between both piernas and Baja your hips down toward the suelo.

Hug your brazos around the ball to support your cuerpo. Adjust your piernas so that your feet are flat on the suelo and your rodillas line up over your ankles. Mantén a good grip on the ball so it doesn't roll away from you and send you back onto your buttocks.

name: Hug Knees To Chest
instructions: Recuéstate on your back and Tira both rodillas up to your chest.
Sostén your brazos under the rodillas, not over (that would put to much pressure on your knee joints).
Lentamente Tira the rodillas toward your shoulders. This also stretches your buttocks muscles.

name: Hurdle Hops
instructions: Set up a Remo of hurdles or other small barriers, placing them a few feet apart.
Párate in front of the first hurdle with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by jumping with both feet over the first hurdle, swinging both brazos as you jump.
Absorb the impact of landing by bending the rodillas, rebounding out of the first leap by jumping over the next hurdle. Continue until you have jumped over all of the hurdles.

name: Hyperextensions (Back Extensions)
instructions: Lie face down on a hyperextension Banco, tucking your ankles securely under the footpads.
Adjust the upper pad if possible so your upper thighs lie flat across the wide pad, leaving enough room for you to bend at the waist without any restriction.

With your cuerpo straight, cross your brazos in front of you (my preference) or behind your head. This will be your starting posición. Tip: You can also Sostén a peso plate for extra resistance in front of you under your crossed brazos.

Start bending forward Lentamente at the waist as far as you can while keeping your back flat. Inhala as you perform this movement. Mantén moving forward until you feel a nice stretch on the hamstrings and you can no longer Mantén going without a rounding of the back. Tip: Never round the back as you perform this exercise. Also, some people can go farther than others. The key thing is that you go as far as your cuerpo allows you to without rounding the back.

Lentamente raise your torso back to the initial posición as you Inhala. Tip: Avoid the temptation to arch your back past a straight line. Also, do not swing the torso at any time in order to protect the back from injury.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Hyperextensions With No Hyperextension Bench
instructions: With someone holding down your piernas, slide yourself down to the edge a flat Banco until your hips hang off the end of the Banco. Tip: Your entire upper cuerpo should be hanging down towards the suelo. Also, you will be in the same posición as if you were on a hyperextension Banco but the range of motion will be shorter due to the height of the flat Banco vs. that of the hyperextension Banco.

With your cuerpo straight, cross your brazos in front of you (my preference) or behind your head. This will be your starting posición. Tip: You can also Sostén a peso plate for extra resistance in front of you under your crossed brazos.

Start bending forward Lentamente at the waist as far as you can while keeping your back flat. Inhala as you perform this movement. Mantén moving forward until you almost touch the suelo or you feel a nice stretch on the hamstrings (whichever comes first). Tip: Never round the back as you perform this exercise.

Lentamente raise your torso back to the initial posición as you Exhala. Tip: Avoid the temptation to arch your back past a straight line. Also, do not swing the torso at any time in order to protect the back from injury.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: IT con Banda and Glute Stretch
instructions: Loop a belt, rope, or band around one of your feet, and swing that leg across your cuerpo to the opposite side, keeping the leg extended as you lay on the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
