Keeping your foot off of the suelo, Tira on the belt, using the tension to Tira the toes up. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and Repite on the other side.

name: Iliotibial Tract-SMR
instructions: Lay on your side, with the bottom leg placed onto a foam roller between the hip and the knee. The other leg can be crossed in front of you.
Place as much of your peso as is tolerable onto your bottom leg; there is no need to Mantén your bottom leg in contact with the suelo. Be sure to relax the muscles of the leg you are stretching.
Roll your leg over the foam from you hip to your knee, pausing for 10-30 seconds at points of tension. Repite with the opposite leg.

name: Inchworm
instructions: Párate with your feet close together. Keeping your piernas straight, stretch down and put your manos on the suelo directly in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by walking your manos forward Lentamente, alternating your left and your right. As you do so, bend only at the hip, keeping your piernas straight.
Mantén going until your cuerpo is parallel to the suelo in a pushup posición.
Now, Mantén your manos in place and Lentamente take short steps with your feet, moving only a few inches at a time.
Continue walking until your feet are by hour manos, keeping your piernas straight as you do so.

name: Incline con Barra Triceps Extension
instructions: Sostén a barra with an overhand grip (palms down) that is a little closer together than shoulder width.
Lie back on an incline Banco set at any angle between 45-75-degrees.
Bring the bar overhead with your brazos extended and elbows in. The brazos should be in line with the torso above the head. This will be your starting posición.

Now Baja the bar in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Inhala as you perform this movement. Tip: Mantén your upper brazos stationary and close to your head at all times. Only the forearms should move.
Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira out and you contract the triceps. Sostén the contraction for a second.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline Bench Pull
instructions: Grab a dumbbell in each hand and lie face down on an incline Banco that is set to an incline that is approximately 30 degrees.
Let the brazos hang to your sides fully extended as they point to the suelo.
Turn the wrists until your manos have a pronated (palms down) grip.
Now flare the elbows out. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, start to Tira the mancuernas up as if you are doing a reverse Banco Press. You will do this by bending at the elbows and bringing the upper brazos up as you let the forearms hang. Continue this motion until the upper brazos are at the same level as your back. Tip: The elbows will come out to the side and your upper brazos and torso should make the letter "T" at the top of the movement. Sostén the contraction at the top for a second.
Lentamente go back down to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline en Cable Chest Press
instructions: Adjust the peso to an appropriate amount and be seated, grasping the handles. Your upper brazos should be about 45 degrees to the cuerpo, with your head and chest up. The elbows should be bent to about 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by extending through the elbow, pressing the handles together straight in front of you. Mantén your shoulder blades retracted as you execute the movement.
After pausing at full Extensión, Regresa to the starting posición, keeping tension on the cables.

name: Incline en Cable Flye
instructions: To get yourself into the starting posición, set the pulleys at the suelo level (lowest level possible on the machine that is below your torso).
Place an incline Banco (set at 45 degrees) in between the pulleys, Selecciona a peso on each one and grab a pulley on each hand.
With a handle on each hand, lie on the incline Banco and bring your manos together at brazos length in front of your face. This will be your starting posición.

With a slight bend of your elbows (in order to prevent stress at the biceps tendon), Baja your brazos out at both sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch on your chest. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén in mind that throughout the movement, the brazos should remain stationary. The movement should only occur at the shoulder joint.

Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición as you squeeze your chest muscles and Exhala. Sostén the contracted posición for a second. Tip: Make sure to use the same arc of motion used to Baja the weights.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Incline con Mancuerna Bench With Palms Facing In
instructions: Lie back on an incline Banco with a dumbbell on each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.
By using your thighs to help you get the mancuernas up, clean the mancuernas one arm at a time so that you can Sostén them at shoulder width.

Once at shoulder width, Mantén the palms of your manos with a neutral grip (palms facing each other). Mantén your elbows flared out with the upper brazos in line with the shoulders (perpendicular to the torso) and the elbows bent creating a 90-degree angle between the upper arm and the forearm. This will be your starting posición.
Now bring down the weights Lentamente to your side as you Respira in. Mantén full control of the mancuernas at all times.

As you Respira out, Empuja the mancuernas up using your pectoral muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the mancuernas back in your thighs and then on the suelo. This is the safest manner to dispose of the mancuernas.

name: Incline con Mancuerna Curl
instructions: Siéntate back on an incline Banco with a dumbbell in each hand held at brazos length. Mantén your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your manos until they are facing forward. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline con Mancuerna Flyes
instructions: Sostén a dumbbell on each hand and lie on an incline Banco that is set to an incline angle of no more than 30 degrees.
Extend your brazos above you with a slight bend at the elbows.
Now rotate the wrists so that the palms of your manos are facing you. Tip: The pinky fingers should be next to each other. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in, start to Lentamente Baja the brazos to the side while keeping the brazos extended and while rotating the wrists until the palms of the hand are facing each other. Tip: At the end of the movement the brazos will be by your side with the palms facing the ceiling.

As you Exhala start to bring the mancuernas back up to the starting posición by reversing the motion and rotating the manos so that the pinky fingers are next to each other again. Tip: Mantén in mind that the movement will only happen at the shoulder joint and at the wrist. There is no motion that happens at the elbow joint.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline con Mancuerna Flyes - With A Twist
instructions: Sostén a dumbbell in each hand and lie on an incline Banco that is set to an incline angle of no more than 30 degrees.
Extend your brazos above you with a slight bend at the elbows.
Now rotate the wrists so that the palms of your manos are facing you. Tip: The pinky fingers should be next to each other. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in, start to Lentamente Baja the brazos to the side while keeping the brazos extended and while rotating the wrists until the palms of the hand are facing each other. Tip: At the end of the movement the brazos will be by your side with the palms facing the ceiling.

As you Exhala start to bring the mancuernas back up to the starting posición by reversing the motion and rotating the manos so that the pinky fingers are next to each other again. Tip: Mantén in mind that the movement will only happen at the shoulder joint and at the wrist. There is no motion that happens at the elbow joint.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Lie back on an incline Banco with a dumbbell in each hand atop your thighs. The palms of your manos will be facing each other.
Then, using your thighs to help Empuja the mancuernas up, Levanta the mancuernas one at a time so that you can Sostén them at shoulder width.
Once you have the mancuernas raised to shoulder width, rotate your wrists forward so that the palms of your manos are facing away from you. This will be your starting posición.
Be sure to Mantén full control of the mancuernas at all times. Then Respira out and Empuja the mancuernas up with your chest.
Lock your brazos at the top, Sostén for a second, and then start Lentamente lowering the peso. Tip Ideally, lowering the weights should take about twice as long as raising them.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the mancuernas back on your thighs and then on the suelo. This is the safest manner to release the mancuernas.

name: Incline Hammer Curls
instructions: Seat yourself on an incline Banco with a dumbbell in each hand. You should pressed firmly against he back with your feet together. Allow the mancuernas to hang straight down at your side, holding them with a neutral grip. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by flexing at the elbow, attempting to Mantén the upper arm stationary.
Continue to the top of the movement and pause, then Lentamente Regresa to the start posición.

name: Incline Inner Biceps Curl
instructions: Sostén a dumbbell in each hand and lie back on an incline Banco.
The mancuernas should be at arm's length hanging at your sides and your palms should be facing out. This will be your starting posición.

Now as you Exhala Curl the peso outward and up while keeping your forearms in line with your side deltoids. Continue the Curl until the mancuernas are at shoulder height and to the sides of your deltoids. Tip: The end of the movement should look similar to a double biceps pose.
After a second contraction at the top of the movement, start to Inhala and Lentamente Baja the weights back to the starting posición using the same path used to bring them up.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Incline Push-Up
instructions: Párate facing Banco or sturdy elevated platform. Place manos on edge of Banco or platform, slightly wider than shoulder width.

posición forefoot back from Banco or platform with brazos and cuerpo straight. brazos should be perpendicular to cuerpo. Keeping cuerpo straight, Baja chest to edge of box or platform by bending brazos.
Empuja cuerpo up until brazos are extended. Repite.

name: Incline Push-Up Close-Grip
instructions: Párate facing a Smith machine bar or sturdy elevated platform at an appropriate height.
Place your manos next to one another on the bar.
posición your feet back from the bar with brazos and cuerpo straight. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, Baja your chest to the bar by bending the brazos.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the elbows, pressing yourself back up.

name: Incline Push-Up Depth Jump
instructions: For this drill you will need a box about 12 inches high, and two thick mats or aerobics steps.

Place the steps just outside of your shoulders, and place your feet on top of the box so that you are in an incline pushup posición, your manos just inside the steps. This will be your starting posición.

Begin by bending at the elbows to Baja your cuerpo, quickly reversing posición to Empuja your cuerpo off of the suelo. As you leave the suelo, move your manos onto the steps, bending your elbows to absorb the impact.
Repite the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Incline Push-Up Medium
instructions: Párate facing a Smith machine bar or sturdy elevated platform at an appropriate height.
Place your manos on the bar, with your manos about shoulder width apart.
posición your feet back from the bar with brazos and cuerpo straight. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, Baja your chest to the bar by bending the brazos.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the elbows, pressing yourself back up.

name: Incline Push-Up Reverse Grip
instructions: Párate facing a Smith machine bar or sturdy elevated platform at an appropriate height.
Place your manos on the bar palms up, with your manos about shoulder width apart.
posición your feet back from the bar with brazos and cuerpo straight. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, Baja your chest to the bar by bending the brazos.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the elbows, pressing yourself back up.

name: Incline Push-Up Wide
instructions: Párate facing a Smith machine bar or sturdy elevated platform at an appropriate height.
Place your manos on the bar, with your manos wider than shoulder width.
posición your feet back from the bar with brazos and cuerpo straight. Your brazos should be perpendicular to the cuerpo. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, Baja your chest to the bar by bending the brazos.
Regresa to the starting posición by extending the elbows, pressing yourself back up.

name: Intermediate Groin Stretch
instructions: Lie on your back with your piernas extended. Loop a belt, rope, or band around one of your feet, and swing that leg as far to the side as you can. This will be your starting posición.
Tira gently on the belt to create tension in your groin and hamstring muscles. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and Repite on the other side.

name: Intermediate Hip Flexor and Quad Stretch
instructions: Lie face down on the suelo, with a rope, belt, or band looped around one foot.

Flex the knee and extend the hip of the leg to be stretched, using both manos to Tira on the belt. Your knee and your hip should come off of the suelo, creating tension in the hip flexors and quadriceps. Sostén the stretch for 10-20 seconds, and Repite on the other leg.

name: Internal Rotation with con Banda
instructions: Choke the band around a post. The band should be at the same height as your elbow. Párate with your right side to the band a couple of feet away.
Grasp the end of the band with your right hand, and Mantén your elbow pressed firmly to your side. We recommend you Sostén a pad or foam roll in place with your elbow to Mantén it firmly in posición.
With your upper arm in posición, your elbow should be flexed to 90 degrees with your hand reaching away from your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Execute the movement by rotating your arm in a forehand motion, keeping your elbow in place.
Continue as far as you are able, pause, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: posición a bar in a rack to about waist height. You can also use a smith machine.

Take a wider than shoulder width grip on the bar and posición yourself hanging underneath the bar. Your cuerpo should be straight with your heels on the suelo with your brazos fully extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by flexing the elbow, pulling your chest towards the bar. Retract your shoulder blades as you perform the movement.
Pause at the top of the motion, and Regresa yourself to the start posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Inverted Row with Straps
instructions: Hang a rope or suspension straps from a rack or other stable object. Grasp the ends and posición yourself in a supine posición hanging from the ropes. Your cuerpo should be straight with your heels on the suelo with your brazos fully extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by flexing the elbow, pulling your chest to your manos. Retract your shoulder blades as you perform the movement.
Pause at the top of the motion, and Regresa yourself to the start posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Iron Crosses (stretch)
instructions: Lie face down on the suelo, with your brazos extended out to your side, palms pressed to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
To begin, flex one knee and bring that leg across the back of your cuerpo, attempting to touch it to the suelo near the opposite hand.
Promptly Regresa the leg to the starting postion, and quickly Repite with the other leg. Continue alternating for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Isometric Chest Squeezes
instructions: While either seating or standing, bend your brazos at a 90-degree angle and place the palms of your manos together in front of your chest. Tip: Your manos should be open with the palms together and fingers facing forward (perpendicular to your torso).
Empuja both manos against each other as you contract your chest. Start with slow tension and increase Lentamente. Mantén breathing normally as you execute this contraction.
Sostén for the recommended number of seconds.
Now release the tension Lentamente.
Rest for the recommended amount of time and Repite.

name: Isometric Neck Exercise - Front And Back
instructions: With your head and neck in a neutral posición (normal posición with head erect facing forward), place both of your manos on the front side of your head.

Now gently Empuja forward as you contract the neck muscles but resisting any movement of your head. Start with slow tension and increase Lentamente. Mantén breathing normally as you execute this contraction.
Sostén for the recommended number of seconds.
Now release the tension Lentamente.
Rest for the recommended amount of time and Repite with your manos placed on the back side of your head.

name: Isometric Neck Exercise - Sides
instructions: With your head and neck in a neutral posición (normal posición with head erect facing forward), place your left hand on the left side of your head.

Now gently Empuja towards the left as you contract the left neck muscles but resisting any movement of your head. Start with slow tension and increase Lentamente. Mantén breathing normally as you execute this contraction.
Sostén for the recommended number of seconds.
Now release the tension Lentamente.
Rest for the recommended amount of time and Repite with your right hand placed on the right side of your head.

name: Isometric Wipers
instructions: Assume a Empuja-up posición, supporting your peso on your manos and toes while keeping your cuerpo straight. Your manos should be just outside of shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by shifting your cuerpo peso as far to one side as possible, allowing the elbow on that side to flex as you Baja your cuerpo.
Reverse the motion by extending the flexed arm, pushing yourself up and then dropping to the other side.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: JM Press
instructions: Start the exercise the same way you would a close grip Banco Press. You will lie on a flat Banco while holding a barra at brazos length (fully extended) with the elbows in. However, instead of having the brazos perpendicular to the torso, make sure the bar is set in a direct line above the upper chest. This will be your starting posición.

Now beginning from a fully extended posición Baja the bar down as if performing a lying triceps Extensión. Inhala as you perform this movement. When you reach the half way point, let the bar roll back about one inch by moving the upper brazos towards your piernas until they are perpendicular to the torso. Tip: Mantén the bend at the elbows constant as you bring the upper brazos forward.
As you Exhala, Press the bar back up by using the triceps to perform a close grip Banco Press.
Now go back to the starting posición and start over.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Jackknife Sit-Up
instructions: Lie flat on the suelo (or exercise mat) on your back with your brazos extended straight back behind your head and your piernas extended also. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala, bend at the waist while simultaneously raising your piernas and brazos to meet in a jackknife posición. Tip: The piernas should be extended and lifted at approximately a 35-45 degree angle from the suelo and the brazos should be extended and parallel to your piernas. The upper torso should be off the suelo.
While inhaling, Baja your brazos and piernas back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Janda Sit-Up
instructions: posición your cuerpo on the suelo in the basic Siéntate-up posición; rodillas to a ninety degree angle with feet flat on the suelo and brazos either crossed over your chest or to the sides. This will be your starting posición.

As you strongly tighten your glutes and hamstrings, fill your lungs with air and in a slow (three to six second count) ascent, Lentamente Exhala. Tip: It is important to tighten the glutes and hamstrings as this will cause the hip flexors to be inactivated in a process called reciprocal inhibition, which basically means that opposite muscles to the contracted ones will relax.
As you Inhala, Lentamente go back in a controlled manner to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Jefferson Squats
instructions: Place a barra on the suelo.
Párate in the middle of the bar length wise.
Bend down by bending at the rodillas and keeping your back straight and grasp the front of the bar with your right hand. Your palm should be in (neutral grip) facing the left side.

Grasp the rear of the bar with your left hand. The palm of your hand should be in neutral grip alignment (palms facing the right side). Tip: Ensure that your grip is even on the bar. Your torso should be positioned right in the middle of the bar and the distance between your torso and your right hand (which should be at the front) should be the same as the distance between your torso and your left hand (which should be to your back).
Now Párate straight up with the peso. Tip: Your feet should be shoulder width apart and your toes slightly pointed out.

Sentadilla down by bending at the rodillas and keeping your back straight until your upper thighs are parallel with the suelo. Tip: Mantén your back as vertical as possible with the suelo and your head up. Also remember to not let your rodillas go past your toes. Inhala during this portion of the movement.

Now drive yourself back up to the starting posición by pushing with the feet . Tip: Mantén the bar hanging at arm's length and your elbows locked with a slight bend. The brazos only serve as hooks. Avoid doing any lifting with them. Do the lifting with your thighs; not your brazos.

name: Jerk Balance
instructions: This drill helps you learn to drive yourself low enough during the jerk and corrects those who move backward during the movement. Begin with the bar racked in the jerk posición, with the shoulders forward, torso upright, and the feet split slightly apart.
Initiate the movement as you would a normal jerk, dipping at the rodillas while keeping your torso vertical, and driving back up forcefully, using momentum and not your brazos to elevate the peso.
Mantén the rear foot in place, using it to drive your cuerpo forward into a full split as you jerk the peso. Recover by standing up with the peso overhead.

name: Jerk Dip Squat
instructions: This movement strengthens the dip portion of the jerk. Begin with the bar racked in the jerk posición, with the shoulders forward to create a shelf and the bar lightly contacting the throat. The feet should be directly under the hips, with the feet turned out as is comfortable.

Keeping the torso vertical, dip by flexing the rodillas, allowing them to travel forward and without moving the hips to the rear. The dip should not be excessive. Regresa the peso to the starting posición by driving forcefully though the feet.

name: Jogging, Treadmill
instructions: To begin, step onto the treadmill and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. Most treadmills have a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. Elevation can be adjusted to change the intensity of the workout.

Treadmills offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and usually have less impact than jogging outside. A 150 lb person will burn almost 250 calories jogging for 30 minutes, compared to more than 450 calories running. Maintain proper posture as you jog, and only Sostén onto the handles when necessary, such as when dismounting or checking your heart rate.

name: Keg Load
instructions: To load kegs, place the desired number a distance from the loading platform, typically 30-50 feet.
Begin by grabbing the close handle of the first keg, tilting it onto its side to grab the opposite edge of the bottom of the keg. Levanta the keg up to your chest.

The higher you can place the keg, the faster you should be able to move to the platform. Shouldering is usually not allowed. Be sure to Mantén a firm Sostén on the keg. Move as quickly as possible to the platform, and load it, extending through your hips, rodillas, and ankles to get it as high as possible.
Regresa to the starting posición to retrieve the next keg, and Repite until the event is completed.

name: con Pesa Rusa Arnold Press
instructions: Clean a kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulder. The palm should be facing inward.
Looking straight ahead, Press the kettlebell out and overhead, rotating your wrist so that your palm faces forward at the top of the motion.
Regresa the kettlebell to the starting posición, with the palm facing in.

name: con Pesa Rusa Dead Clean
instructions: Place kettlebell between your feet. To get in the starting posición, Empuja your butt back and look straight ahead.

Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulder. The wrist should rotate as you do so.
Baja the kettlebell, keeping the hamstrings loaded by keeping your back straight and your butt out.

name: con Pesa Rusa Figure 8
instructions: Place one kettlebell between your piernas and take a wider than shoulder width stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your back flat.
Pick up a kettlebell and pass it to your other hand between your piernas. The receiving hand should reach from behind the piernas. Go back and forth for several repetitions.

name: con Pesa Rusa Hang Clean
instructions: Place kettlebell between your feet. To get in the starting posición, Empuja your butt back and look straight ahead.

Clean kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulder. The wrist should rotate as you do so.
Baja kettlebell to a hanging posición between your piernas while keeping the hamstrings loaded. Mantén your head up at all times.

name: con Pesa Rusa One-Legged Deadlift
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle in one hand. Párate on one leg, on the same side that you Sostén the kettlebell.
Keeping that knee slightly bent, perform a stiff legged Peso Muerto by bending at the hip, extending your free leg behind you for balance.
Continue lowering the kettlebell until you are parallel to the suelo, and then Regresa to the upright posición.

name: con Pesa Rusa Pass Between The Legs
instructions: Place one kettlebell between your piernas and take a comfortable stance. Bend over by pushing your butt out and keeping your back flat.
Pick up a kettlebell and pass it to your other hand between your piernas, in the fashion of a "W". Go back and forth for several repetitions.

name: con Pesa Rusa Pirate Ships
instructions: With a wide stance, Sostén a kettlebell with both manos. Allow it to hang at waist level with your brazos extended. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by turning to one side, swinging the kettlebell to head height. Briefly pause at the top of the motion.
Allow the bell to drop as you rotate to the opposite side, again raising the kettlebell to head height.
Repite for the desired amount of repetitions.

name: con Pesa Rusa Pistol Squat
instructions: Pick up a kettlebell with two manos and Sostén it by the horns. Sostén one leg off of the suelo and Sentadilla down on the other.
Sentadilla down by flexing the knee and sitting back with the hips, holding the kettlebell up in front of you.
Sostén the bottom posición for a second and then reverse the motion, driving through the heel and keeping your head and chest up.
Baja yourself again and Repite.

name: con Pesa Rusa Seated Press
instructions: Siéntate on the suelo and spread your piernas out comfortably.
Clean one kettlebell to your shoulder.
Press the kettlebell up and out until it is locked out overhead. Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Pesa Rusa Seesaw Press
instructions: Clean two kettlebells two your shoulders.
Press one kettlebell.
Baja the kettlebell and immediately Press the other kettlebell. Make sure to do the same amount of reps on both sides.

name: con Pesa Rusa Sumo High Pull
instructions: Place a kettlebell on the suelo between your feet. posición your feet in a wide stance, and grasp the kettlebell with two manos. Set your hips back as far as possible, with your rodillas bent. Mantén your chest and head up. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by extending the hips and rodillas, simultaneously pulling the kettlebell to your shoulders, raising your elbows as you do so. Reverse the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: con Pesa Rusa Thruster
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders. Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so. This will be your starting posición.
Begin to Sentadilla by flexing your hips and rodillas, lowering your hips between your piernas. Maintain an upright, straight back as you descend as low as you can.

At the bottom, reverse direction and Sentadilla by extending your rodillas and hips, driving through your heels. As you do so, Press both kettlebells overhead by extending your brazos straight up, using the momentum from the Sentadilla to help drive the weights upward.
As you begin the next repetition, Regresa the weights to the shoulders.

name: con Pesa Rusa Turkish Get-Up (Lunge style)
instructions: Lie on your back on the suelo and Press a kettlebell to the top posición by extending the elbow. Bend the knee on the same side as the kettlebell.

Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, pivot to the opposite side and use your non- working arm to assist you in driving forward to the Zancada posición. Using your free hand, Empuja yourself to a seated posición, then progressing to one knee.
While looking up at the kettlebell, Lentamente Párate up. Reverse the motion back to the starting posición and Repite.

name: con Pesa Rusa Turkish Get-Up (Squat style)
instructions: Lie on your back on the suelo and Press a kettlebell to the top posición by extending the elbow. Bend the knee on the same side as the kettlebell.
Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, pivot to the opposite side and use your non- working arm to assist you in driving forward to the Zancada posición.

Using your free hand, Empuja yourself to a seated posición, then progressing to your feet. While looking up at the kettlebell, Lentamente Párate up. Reverse the motion back to the starting posición and Repite.

name: con Pesa Rusa Windmill
instructions: Place a kettlebell in front of your lead foot and clean and Press it overhead with your opposite arm. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. Press it overhead by extending the elbow.

Keeping the kettlebell locked out at all times, Empuja your butt out in the direction of the locked out kettlebell. Turn your feet out at a forty-five degree angle from the arm with the locked out kettlebell. Bending at the hip to one side, sticking your butt out, Lentamente lean until you can touch the suelo with your free hand. Mantén your eyes on the kettlebell that you Sostén over your head at all times.
Pause for a second after reaching the suelo and reverse the motion back to the starting posición.

name: Kipping Muscle Up
instructions: Grip the rings using a false grip, with the base of your palms on top of the rings.
Begin with a movement swinging your piernas backward slightly.

Counter that movement by swinging your piernas forward and up, jerking your chin and chest back, pulling yourself up with both brazos as you do so. As you reach the top posición of the Tira-up, Tira the rings to your armpits as you roll your shoulders forward, allowing your elbows to move straight back behind you. This puts you into the proper posición to continue into the dip portion of the movement.
Maintaining control and stability, extend through the elbow to complete the motion.
Use care when lowering yourself to the suelo.

name: Knee Across The Body
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo with your right leg straight. Bend your left leg and Baja it across your cuerpo, holding the knee down toward the suelo with your right hand. (The knee doesn't need to touch the suelo if you're tight.)

Place your left arm comfortably beside you and turn your head to the left. Imagine you have a peso tied to your tailbone. let your tailbone fall back toward the suelo as your chest reaches in the opposite direction to stretch your Baja back. Cambia sides.

name: Knee Circles
instructions: Párate with your piernas together and manos by your waist.
Now move your rodillas in a circular motion as you Respira normally.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Knee/Hip Raise On Parallel Bars
instructions: posición your cuerpo on the vertical leg raise Banco so that your forearms are resting on the pads next to the torso and holding on to the handles. Your brazos will be bent at a 90 degree angle.
The torso should be straight with the Baja back pressed against the pad of the machine and the piernas extended pointing towards the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

Now as you Respira out, Levanta your piernas up as you Mantén them extended. Continue this movement until your piernas are roughly parallel to the suelo and then Sostén the contraction for a second. Tip: Do not use any momentum or swinging as you perform this exercise.
Lentamente go back to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Knee Tuck Jump
instructions: Begin in a comfortable standing posición with your rodillas slightly bent. Sostén your manos in front of you, palms down with your fingertips together at chest height. This will be your starting posición.
Rapidly dip down into a quarter Sentadilla and immediately explode upward. Drive the rodillas towards the chest, attempting to touch them to the palms of the manos.
Jump as high as you can, raising your rodillas up, and then ensure a good land be re-extending your piernas, absorbing impact through be allowing the rodillas to rebend.

name: Kneeling Arm Drill
instructions: This drill helps increase arm efficiency during the run. Begin kneeling, left foot in front, right knee down. Apply pressure through the front heel to Mantén your glutes and hamstrings activated.
Begin by blocking the brazos in long, pendulum like swings. Close the arm angle, blocking with the brazos as you would when jogging, progressing to a run and finally a sprint.
As soon as your manos pass the hip, accelerate them forward during the sprinting motion to move them as quickly as possible.
Cambia rodillas and Repite.

name: Kneeling en Cable Crunch With Alternating Oblique Twists
instructions: Connect a rope attachment to a high pulley cable and posición a mat on the suelo in front of it.
Grab the rope with both manos and kneel approximately two feet back from the tower.
posición the rope behind your head with your manos by your ears.
Mantén your manos in the same place, contract your abs and Tira downward on the rope in a crunching movement until your elbows reach your rodillas.
Pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting posición.
Repite the same downward movement until you're halfway down, at which time you'll begin rotating one of your elbows to the opposite knee.
Again, pause briefly at the bottom and rise up in a slow and controlled manner until you reach the starting posición.
Repite the same movement as before, but alternate the other elbow to the opposite knee.
Continue this series of movements to failure.

name: Kneeling en Cable Triceps Extension
instructions: Place a Banco sideways in front of a high pulley machine.
Sostén a straight bar attachment above your head with your manos about 6 inches apart with your palms facing down.
Face away from the machine and kneel.
Place your head and the back of your upper brazos on the Banco. Your elbows should be bent with the forearms pointing towards the high pulley. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping your upper brazos close to your head at all times with the elbows in, Press the bar out in a semicircular motion until the elbows are locked and your brazos are parallel to the suelo. Contract the triceps hard and Mantén this posición for a second. Exhala as you perform this movement.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Kneeling Forearm Stretch
instructions: Start by kneeling on a mat with your palms flat and your fingers pointing back toward your rodillas.
Lentamente lean back keeping your palms flat on the suelo until you feel a stretch in your wrists and forearms. Sostén for 20-30 seconds.

name: Kneeling High Pulley Row
instructions: Selecciona the appropriate peso using a pulley that is above your head. Attach a rope to the cable and kneel a couple of feet away, holding the rope out in front of you with both brazos extended. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by flexing the elbows and fully retracting your shoulders, pulling the rope toward your upper chest with your elbows out.
After pausing briefly, Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Kneeling Hip Flexor
instructions: Kneel on a mat and bring your right knee up so the bottom of your foot is on the suelo and extend your left leg out behind you so the top of your foot is on the suelo.
Shift your peso forward until you feel a stretch in your hip. Sostén for 15 seconds, then Repite for your other side.

name: Kneeling Jump Squat
instructions: Begin kneeling on the suelo with a barra racked across the back of your shoulders, or you can use your cuerpo peso for this exercise. This can be done inside of a power rack to make unracking easier.
Siéntate back with your hips until your glutes touch your feet, keeping your head and chest up.
Explode up with your hips, generating enough power to land with your feet flat on the suelo.
Continue with the Sentadilla by driving through your heels and extending the rodillas to come to a standing posición.

name: Kneeling Single-Arm High Pulley Row
instructions: Attach a single handle to a high pulley and make your peso selection.
Kneel in front of the cable tower, taking the cable with one hand with your arm extended. This will be your starting posición.

Starting with your palm facing forward, Tira the peso down to your torso by flexing the elbow and retract the shoulder blade. As you do so, rotate the wrist so that at the completion of the movement, your palm is now facing you.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Kneeling Squat
instructions: Set the bar to the proper height in a power rack. Kneel behind the bar; it may be beneficial to put a mat down to pad your rodillas. Slide under the bar, racking it across the back of your shoulders. Your shoulder blades should be retracted and the bar tight across your back. Unrack the peso.
With your head looking forward, Siéntate back with your butt until you touch your calves.
Reverse the motion, returning the torso to an upright posición.

name: Landmine 180's
instructions: posición a bar into a landmine or securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate peso.
Raise the bar from the suelo, taking it to shoulder height with both manos with your brazos extended in front of you. Adopt a wide stance. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by rotating the trunk and hips as you swing the peso all the way down to one side. Mantén your brazos extended throughout the exercise.
Reverse the motion to swing the peso all the way to the opposite side.
Continue alternating the movement until the set is complete.

name: Landmine Linear Jammer
instructions: posición a bar into landmine or, lacking one, securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate peso and posición the handle attachment on the bar.
Raise the bar from the suelo, taking the handles to your shoulders. This will be your starting posición.
In an athletic stance, Sentadilla by flexing your hips and setting your hips back, keeping your brazos flexed.

Reverse the motion by powerfully extending through the hips, rodillas, and ankles, while also extending the elbows to straighten the brazos. This movement should be done explosively, coming out of the Sentadilla to full Extensión as powerfully as possible.
Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Lateral Bound
instructions: Assume a half Sentadilla posición facing 90 degrees from your direction of travel. This will be your starting posición.
Allow your lead leg to do a countermovement inward as you shift your peso to the outside leg.
Immediately Empuja off and extend, attempting to bound to the side as far as possible.
Upon landing, immediately Empuja off in the opposite direction, returning to your original start posición.
Continue back and forth for several repetitions.

name: Lateral Box Jump
instructions: Assume a comfortable standing posición, with a short box positioned next to you. This will be your starting posición.
Quickly dip into a quarter Sentadilla to initiate the stretch reflex, and immediately reverse direction to jump up and to the side.
Bring your rodillas high enough to ensure your feet have good clearance over the box.
Land on the center of the box, using your piernas to absorb the impact.
Carefully jump down to the other side of the box, and continue going back and forth for several repetitions.

name: Lateral Cone Hops
instructions: posición a number of cones in a Remo several feet apart.
Párate next to the end of the cones, facing 90 degrees to the direction of travel. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the jump by dipping with the rodillas to initiate a stretch reflex, and immediately reverse direction to Empuja off the suelo, jumping up and sideways over the cone.
Use your piernas to absorb impact upon landing, and rebound into the next jump, continuing down the Remo of cones.

name: Lateral Raise - With con Bandas
instructions: To begin, Párate on an exercise band so that tension begins at arm's length. Grasp the handles using a pronated (palms facing your thighs) grip that is slightly less than shoulder width. The handles should be resting on the sides of your thighs. Your brazos should be extended with a slight bend at the elbows and your back should be straight. This will be your starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the handles to the sides as you Exhala. Continue to Levanta the handles until they are slightly above parallel. Tip: As you Levanta the handles, slightly tilt the hand as if you were pouring water and Mantén your brazos extended. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the handles back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Latissimus Dorsi-SMR
instructions: While lying on the suelo, place a foam roll under your back and to one side, just behind your arm pit. This will be your starting posición.
Mantén the arm of the side being stretched behind and to the side of you as you shift your peso onto your lats, keeping your upper cuerpo off of the suelo. Sostén for 10-30 seconds, and Cambia sides.

name: Leg-Over Floor Press
instructions: Lie on the suelo with one kettlebell in place on your chest, holding it by the handle. Extend leg on working side over leg on non-working side.Your free arm can be extended out to your side for support.
Press the kettlebll into a locked out posición.
Baja the peso until the elbow touches the suelo, keeping the kettlebell above the elbow. Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Leg-Up Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Lie flat on your back, bend one knee, and put that foot flat on the suelo to stabilize your spine.

Extend the other leg in the air. If you're tight, you wont be able to straighten it. That's okay. Extend the knee so that the sole of the lifted foot faces the ceiling (or as close as you can get it).
Lentamente straighten the piernas as much as possible and then Tira the leg toward your nose. Cambia sides.

name: Leg Extensions
instructions: For this exercise you will need to use a leg Extensión machine. First choose your peso and Siéntate on the machine with your piernas under the pad (feet pointed forward) and the manos holding the side bars. This will be your starting posición. Tip: You will need to adjust the pad so that it falls on top of your Baja leg (just above your feet). Also, make sure that your piernas form a 90-degree angle between the Baja and upper leg. If the angle is less than 90-degrees then that means the knee is over the toes which in turn creates undue stress at the knee joint. If the machine is designed that way, either look for another machine or just make sure that when you start executing the exercise you stop going down once you hit the 90-degree angle.
Using your quadriceps, extend your piernas to the maximum as you Exhala. Ensure that the rest of the cuerpo remains stationary on the seat. Pause a second on the contracted posición.
Lentamente Baja the peso back to the original posición as you Inhala, ensuring that you do not go past the 90-degree angle limit.
Repite for the recommended amount of times.

name: Leg Lift
instructions: While standing up straight with both feet next to each other at around shoulder width, grab a sturdy surface such as the sides of a Sentadilla rack or the top of a chair to brace yourself and Mantén balance.
With or without an ankle peso, Levanta one leg behind you as if performing a leg Curl but standing up while keeping the other leg straight. Respira out as you perform this movement.
Lentamente bring the raised leg back to the suelo as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Repite the movement with the opposite leg.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Using a leg Press machine, Siéntate down on the machine and place your piernas on the platform directly in front of you at a medium (shoulder width) foot stance. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances described in the foot positioning section).

Baja the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and Press the platform all the way up until your piernas are fully extended in front of you. Tip: Make sure that you do not lock your rodillas. Your torso and the piernas should make a perfect 90-degree angle. This will be your starting posición.
As you Inhala, Lentamente Baja the platform until your upper and Baja piernas make a 90-degree angle.
Pushing mainly with the heels of your feet and using the quadriceps go back to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and ensure to lock the safety pins properly once you are done. You do not want that platform falling on you fully loaded.

name: Leg Pull-In
instructions: Lie on an exercise mat with your piernas extended and your manos either palms facing down next to you or under your glutes. Tip: My preference is with the manos next to me. This will be your starting posición.

Bend your rodillas and Tira your upper thighs into your midsection as you Respira out. Continue the motion until your rodillas are around chest level. Contract your abs as you execute this movement and Sostén for a second at the top. Tip: As you perform the motion, the Baja piernas (calves) should always remain parallel to the suelo.
Regresa to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Leverage Chest Press
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat for your height. The handles should be near the bottom or middle of the pectorals at the beginning of the motion.
Your chest and head should be up and your shoulder blades retracted. This will be your starting posición.
Press the handles forward by extending through the elbow.
After a brief pause at the top, Regresa the peso just above the start posición, keeping tension on the muscles by not returning the peso to the stops until the set is complete.

name: Leverage Deadlift
instructions: Load the pins to an appropriate peso. posición yourself directly between the handles. Grasp the bottom handles with a comfortable grip, and then Baja your hips as you take a breath. Look forward with your head and Mantén your chest up. This will be your starting posición.
Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: Leverage Decline Chest Press
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat for your height. The handles should be near the bottom of the pectorals at the beginning of the motion. Your chest and head should be up and your shoulder blades retracted. This will be your starting posición.
Press the handles forward by extending through the elbow.
After a brief pause at the top, Regresa the peso just above the start posición, keeping tension on the muscles by not returning the peso to the stops until the set is complete.

name: Leverage High Row
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat height so that you can just reach the handles above you. Adjust the knee pad to help Mantén you down. Grasp the handles with a pronated grip. This will be your starting posición.
Tira the handles towards your torso, retracting your shoulder blades as you flex the elbow.
Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then Lentamente Regresa the handles to the starting posición.
For multiple repetitions, avoid completely returning the peso to the stops to Mantén tension on the muscles being worked.

name: Leverage Incline Chest Press
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat for your height. The handles should be near the top of the pectorals at the beginning of the motion. Your chest and head should be up and your shoulder blades retracted. This will be your starting posición.
Press the handles forward by extending through the elbow.
After a brief pause at the top, Regresa the peso just above the start posición, keeping tension on the muscles by not returning the peso to the stops until the set is complete.

name: Leverage Iso Row
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat height so that the handles are at chest level. Grasp the handles with either a neutral or pronated grip. This will be your starting posición.
Tira the handles towards your torso, retracting your shoulder blades as you flex the elbow.

Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then Lentamente Regresa the handles to the starting posición. For multiple repetitions, avoid completely returning the peso to the stops to Mantén tension on the muscles being worked.

name: Leverage Shoulder Press
instructions: Load an appropriate peso onto the pins and adjust the seat for your height. The handles should be near the top of the shoulders at the beginning of the motion. Your chest and head should be up and handles held with a pronated grip. This will be your starting posición.
Press the handles upward by extending through the elbow.
After a brief pause at the top, Regresa the peso to just above the start posición, keeping tension on the muscles by not returning the peso to the stops until the set is complete.

name: Leverage Shrug
instructions: Load the pins to an appropriate peso. posición yourself directly between the handles.
Grasp the top handles with a comfortable grip, and then Baja your hips as you take a breath. Look forward with your head and Mantén your chest up.

Drive through the suelo with your heels, extending your hips and rodillas as you rise to a standing posición. Mantén your brazos straight throughout the movement, finishing with your shoulders back. This will be your starting posición.
Raise the peso by shrugging the shoulders towards your ears, moving straight up and down.
Pause at the top of the motion, and then Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: Linear 3-Part Start Technique
instructions: This drill helps you accelerate as quickly as possible into a sprint from a dead stop. It helps to use a line to start from. Begin with two feet on the line. Place your left foot with the toe next to your right ankle. Place your right foot 4-6 inches behind the left.
Place your right hand onto the line, and thing bring your nose close to your left knee.
Sentadilla down as you lean foward, your head being Baja than your hips and your peso loaded onto the left leg. This will be your starting posición.
Take your left hand up so that it is parallel to the suelo, pointing behind you, and explode out when ready.

name: Linear Acceleration Wall Drill
instructions: Lean at around 45 degrees against a wall. Your feet should be together, glutes contracted.
Begin by lifting your right knee quickly, pausing, and then driving it straight down into the suelo.
Cambia piernas, raising the opposite knee, and then attacking the suelo straight down.
Repite once more with your right leg, and as soon as the right foot strikes the suelo hammer them out rapidly, alternating left and right as fast as you can.

name: Linear Depth Jump
instructions: You will need two boxes or benches spaced a few feet away from each other. Begin by standing on one box facing towards the other platform.
To initiate the movement, gently drop down to the suelo between your platforms, allowing the rodillas and hips to flex.
Reverse the motion by exploding, extending through the hips, rodillas, and ankles to jump onto the other platform.
Land softly, asborbing the impact through the piernas.

name: Log Lift
instructions: Begin standing with the log in front of you. Grasp the handles, and begin to clean the log. As you are bent over to start the clean, attempt to get the log as high as possible, pulling it into your chest. Extend through the hips and rodillas to bring it up to complete the clean.

Empuja your head back and look up, creating a shelf on your chest to rest the log. Begin the Press by dipping, flexing slightly through the rodillas and reversing the motion. This Empuja Press will generate momentum to start the log moving vertically. Continue by extending through the elbows to Press the log above your head. There are no strict rules on form, so use whatever techniques you are most efficient with. As the log is pressed, ensure that you Empuja your head through on each repetition, looking forward.
Repite as many times as possible. Attempt to control the descent of the log as it is returned to the suelo.

name: London Bridges
instructions: Attach a climbing rope to a high beam or cross member. Below it, ensure that the smith machine bar is locked in place with the safeties and cannot move. Alternatively, a secure box could also be utilized.
Párate on the bar, using the rope to balance yourself. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, lean back and Baja your cuerpo by Lentamente going hand over hand with the rope. Continue until you are perpendicular to the suelo.
Keeping your cuerpo straight, reverse the motion, going hand over hand back to the starting posición.

name: Looking At Ceiling
instructions: Kneel on the suelo, holding your heels with both manos.
Levanta your buttocks up and forward while bringing your head back to look up at the ceiling, to give an arch in your back.

name: Low en Cable Crossover
instructions: To move into the starting posición, place the pulleys at the low posición, Selecciona the resistance to be used and grasp a handle in each hand.
Step forward, gaining tension in the pulleys. Your palms should be facing forward, manos below the waist, and your brazos straight. This will be your starting posición.
With a slight bend in your brazos, draw your manos upward and toward the midline of your cuerpo. Your manos should come together in front of your chest, palms facing up.
Regresa your brazos back to the starting posición after a brief pause.

name: Low en Cable Triceps Extension
instructions: Selecciona the desired peso and lay down face up on the Banco of a seated Remo machine that has a rope attached to it. Your head should be pointing towards the attachment.
Grab the outside of the rope ends with your palms facing each other (neutral grip).

posición your elbows so that they are bent at a 90 degree angle and your upper brazos are perpendicular (90 degree angle) to your torso. Tip: Mantén the elbows in and make sure that the upper brazos point to the ceiling while your forearms point towards the pulley above your head. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, extend your Baja brazos until they are straight and vertical. The upper brazos and elbows remain stationary throughout the movement. Only the forearms should move. Contract the triceps hard for a second.
As you Respira in Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Low Pulley Row To Neck
instructions: Siéntate on a low pulley Remo machine with a rope attachment.

Grab the ends of the rope using a palms-down grip and Siéntate with your back straight and your rodillas slightly bent. Tip: Mantén your back almost completely vertical and your brazos fully extended in front of you. This will be your starting posición.

While keeping your torso stationary, Levanta your elbows and start bending them as you Tira the rope towards your neck while exhaling. Throughout the movement your upper brazos should remain parallel to the suelo. Tip: Continue this motion until your manos are almost next to your ears (the forearms will not be parallel to the suelo at the end of the movement as they will be angled a bit upwards) and your elbows are out away from your sides.
After holding for a second or so at the contracted posición, come back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala. Tip: Again, during no part of the movement should the torso move.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lower Back-SMR
instructions: In a seated posición, place a foam roll under your Baja back. Cross your brazos in front of you and protract your shoulders. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your hips off of the suelo and lean back, keeping your peso on your Baja back. Now shift your peso slightly to one side, keeping your peso off of the spine and on the muscles to the side of it. Roll over your Baja back, holding points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite on the other side.

name: Lower Back Curl
instructions: Lie on your stomach with your brazos out to your sides. This will be your starting posición.

Using your Baja back muscles, extend your spine lifting your chest off of the suelo. Do not use your brazos to Empuja yourself up. Mantén your head up during the movement. Repite for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Lunge Pass Through
instructions: Párate with your torso upright holding a kettlebell in your right hand. This will be your starting posición.
Step forward with your left foot and Baja your upper cuerpo down by flexing the hip and the knee, keeping the torso upright. Baja your back knee until it nearly touches the suelo.
As you Zancada, pass the kettlebell under your front leg to your opposite hand.
Pressing through the heel of your foot, Regresa to the starting posición.
Repite the movement for the recommended amount of repetitions, alternating piernas.

name: Lunge Sprint
instructions: Adjust a bar in a Smith machine to an appropriate height. posición yourself under the bar, racking it across the back of your shoulders. Unrack the bar, and then split your feet, moving one foot forward and one foot back. This will be your starting posición.
Baja your back knee nearly to the suelo, flexing the rodillas and lowering your hips as you do so.

At the bottom of the descent, immediately reverse direction. Explosively drive through the heel of your front foot with light pressure from your back foot. Jump up and reverse the posición of your piernas.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Bent Leg Groin
instructions: Lie on your back with your rodillas bent and the soles of the feet pressed together. Have your partner Sostén your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to squeeze your rodillas together, while your partner prevents any movement from occurring.
After 10-20 seconds, relax your muscles as your partner gently pushes your rodillas towards the suelo. Be sure to inform your helper when the stretch is adequate to prevent injury or overstretching.

name: Lying en Cable Curl
instructions: Grab a straight bar or E-Z bar attachment that is attached to the low pulley with both manos, using an underhand (palms facing up) shoulder-width grip.
Lie flat on your back on top of an exercise mat in front of the peso stack with your feet flat against the frame of the pulley machine and your piernas straight.
With your brazos extended and your elbows close to your cuerpo slightly bend your brazos. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping your upper brazos stationary and the elbows close to your cuerpo, Curl the bar up Lentamente toward your chest as you Respira out and you squeeze the biceps.
After a second squeeze at the top of the movement, Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Cambered con Barra Row
instructions: Place a cambered bar underneath an exercise Banco.
Lie face down on the exercise Banco and grab the bar using a palms down (pronated grip) that is wider than shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala Remo the bar up as you Mantén the elbows close to your cuerpo to either your chest, in order to target the upper mid back, or to your stomach if targeting the lats is your goal.
After a second Sostén at the top, Baja back down to the starting posición Lentamente as you Inhala.

name: Lying Close-Grip Bar Curl On High Pulley
instructions: Place a flat Banco in front of a high pulley or lat pulldown machine.
Sostén the straight bar attachment using an underhand grip (palms up) that is about shoulder width.
Lie on your back with your head over the end of the Banco.
Now extend your brazos straight above your shoulders. Your torso and your brazos should make a 90-degree angle and the elbows should be in. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, Curl the bar down in a semicircular motion until it touches your chin. Squeeze the biceps for a second at the top contracted posición. Tip: As you execute this motion only the forearms should move. At no time should the upper brazos be moving at all. They are to remain perpendicular throughout the movement.
Regresa to starting posición Lentamente.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Close-Grip con Barra Triceps Extension Behind The Head
instructions: While holding a barra or EZ Curl bar with a pronated grip (palms facing forward), lie on your back on a flat Banco with your head close to the end of the Banco. Tip: If you are holding a barra grab it using a shoulder-width grip and if you are using an E-Z Bar grab it on the inner handles.

Extend your brazos in front of you and Lentamente bring the bar back in a semi circular motion (while keeping the brazos extended) to a posición over your head. At the end of this step your brazos should be overhead and parallel to the suelo. This will be your starting posición. Tip: Mantén your elbows in at all times.
As you Inhala, Baja the bar by bending at the elbows and while keeping the upper arm stationary. Mantén lowering the bar until your forearms are perpendicular to the suelo.

As you Exhala bring the bar back up to the starting posición by pushing the bar up in a semi-circular motion until the Baja brazos are also parallel to the suelo. Contract the triceps hard at the top of the movement for a second. Tip: Again, only the forearms should move. The upper brazos should remain stationary at all times.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Close-Grip con Barra Triceps Press To Chin
instructions: While holding a barra or EZ Curl bar with a pronated grip (palms facing forward), lie on your back on a flat Banco with your head off the end of the Banco. Tip: If you are holding a barra grab it using a shoulder-width grip and if you are using an E-Z Bar grab it on the inner handles.
Extend your brazos in front of you as you Sostén the barra over your chest. The brazos should be perpendicular to your torso (90-degree angle). This will be your starting posición.
As you Inhala, Baja the bar in a semi-circular motion by bending at the elbows and while keeping the upper arm stationary and elbows in. Mantén lowering the bar until it lightly touches your chin.

As you Exhala bring the bar back up to the starting posición by pushing the bar up in a semi-circular motion. Contract the triceps hard at the top of the movement for a second. Tip: Again, only the forearms should move. The upper brazos should remain stationary at all times.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Crossover
instructions: Lie on your back with your piernas extended.

Cross one leg over your cuerpo with the knee bent, attempting to touch the knee to the suelo. Your partner should kneel beside you, holding your shoulder down with one hand and controlling the crossed leg with the other. this will be your starting posición.
Attempt to raise the bent knee off of the suelo as your partner prevents any actual movement.
After 10-20 seconds, relax the leg as your partner gently presses the knee towards the suelo. Repite with the other side.

name: Lying con Mancuerna Tricep Extension
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco while holding two mancuernas directly in front of you. Your brazos should be fully extended at a 90-degree angle from your torso and the suelo. The palms should be facing in and the elbows should be tucked in. This is the starting posición.
As you Respira in and you Mantén the upper brazos stationary with the elbows in, Lentamente Baja the peso until the mancuernas are near your ears.
At that point, while keeping the elbows in and the upper brazos stationary, use the triceps to bring the peso back up to the starting posición as you Respira out.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Face Down Plate Neck Resistance
instructions: Lie face down with your whole cuerpo straight on a flat Banco while holding a peso plate behind your head. Tip: You will need to posición yourself so that your shoulders are slightly above the end of a flat Banco in order for the upper chest, neck and face to be off the Banco. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the plate secure on the back of your head Lentamente Baja your head (as in saying "yes") as you Respira in.
Raise your head back up to the starting posición in a semi-circular motion as you Respira out. Sostén the contraction for a second.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Face Up Plate Neck Resistance
instructions: Lie face up with your whole cuerpo straight on a flat Banco while holding a peso plate on top of your forehead. Tip: You will need to posición yourself so that your shoulders are slightly above the end of a flat Banco in order for the traps, neck and head to be off the Banco. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the plate secure on your forehead Lentamente Baja your head back in a semi-circular motion as you Respira in.
Raise your head back up to the starting posición in a semi-circular motion as you Respira out. Sostén the contraction for a second.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Glute
instructions: Lie on your back with your partner kneeling beside you.

Flex the hip of one leg, raising it off of the suelo. Rotate the leg so the foot is over the opposite hip, the Baja leg perpendicular to your cuerpo. Your partner should Sostén the knee and ankle in place. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to Empuja your leg towards your partner, who should be preventing any actual movement of the leg.

After 10-20 seconds, completely relax as your partner gently pushes the ankle and knee towards your chest. Be sure to inform your helper when the stretch is adequate to prevent injury or overstretching.

name: Lying Hamstring
instructions: Lie on your back with your piernas extended. Your partner should be kneeling beside you. Raise one leg up towards the ceiling and have your partner Sostén the ankle. Your partner can use their shoulder to brace your leg if necessary. This will be your starting posición.
With your partner holding your leg in place, attempt to flex the knee, contracting the hamstrings for 10-20 seconds.

Then relax your leg, allowing your partner to gently Empuja the leg towards your head. Be sure to inform your helper when the stretch is adequate to prevent injury or overstretching. Cambia sides once complete.

name: Lying High Bench con Barra Curl
instructions: Lie face forward on a tall flat Banco while holding a barra with a supinated grip (palms facing up). Tip: If you are holding a barra grab it using a shoulder-width grip and if you are using an E-Z Bar grab it on the inner handles. Your upper cuerpo should be positioned in a way that the upper chest is over the end of the Banco and the barra is hanging in front of you with the brazos extended and perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
While keeping the elbows in and the upper brazos stationary, Curl the peso up in a semi-circular motion as you contract the biceps and Exhala. Sostén at the top of the movement for a second.

As you Inhala, Lentamente go back to the starting posición. Tip: Maintain full control of the peso at all times and avoid any swinging. Remember, only the forearms should move throughout the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Leg Curls
instructions: Adjust the machine lever to fit your height and lie face down on the leg Curl machine with the pad of the lever on the back of your piernas (just a few inches under the calves). Tip: Preferably use a leg Curl machine that is angled as opposed to flat since an angled posición is more favorable for hamstrings recruitment.

Keeping the torso flat on the Banco, ensure your piernas are fully stretched and grab the side handles of the machine. posición your toes straight (or you can also use any of the other two stances described on the foot positioning section). This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Curl your piernas up as far as possible without lifting the upper piernas from the pad. Once you hit the fully contracted posición, Sostén it for a second.
As you Inhala, bring the piernas back to the initial posición. Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Machine Squat
instructions: Adjust the leg machine to a height that will allow you to get inside it with your rodillas bent and the thighs slightly below parallel.

Once you Selecciona the peso, posición yourself inside the machine face up with the rodillas bent and thighs slightly below parallel to the platform. Make sure that the rodillas do not go past the toes. The angle created between the hamstrings and the calves should be one that is slightly less than 90 degrees (since your starting posición requires you to start slightly below parallel). Your back and your head should be resting on the machine while your shoulders are pressed under the shoulder pads.
Place your manos by the handles and posición your feet slightly pointing out at a shoulder width posición. This will be your starting posición.

While pressing with the balls of the feet as you Respira out, make your whole cuerpo erect as you squeeze the quads. Sostén the contracted posición for a second. Tip: Since you are starting below parallel, you can opt to use your manos to help you up by pressing on your thighs only on the first repetition.

Lentamente Sentadilla down as you Inhala but instead of going all the way down to the starting posición, just stop once your thighs are parallel to the platform. The angle between your hamstrings and calves should be a 90-degree angle.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying One-Arm Lateral Raise
instructions: While holding a dumbbell in one hand, lay with your chest down on a flat Banco. The other hand can be used to Sostén to the leg of the Banco for stability.

posición the palm of the hand that is holding the dumbbell in a neutral manner (palms facing your torso) as you Mantén the arm extended with the elbow slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Now raise the arm with the dumbbell to the side until your elbow is at shoulder height and your arm is roughly parallel to the suelo as you Exhala. Tip: Maintain your arm perpendicular to the torso while keeping your arm extended throughout the movement. Also, Mantén the contraction at the top for a second.
Lentamente Baja the dumbbell to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Prone Quadriceps
instructions: Lay face down on the suelo with your partner kneeling beside you. Flex one knee and raise that leg off the suelo, attempting to touch your glutes with your foot. Your partner should Sostén the knee and ankle. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to extend your knee while your partner prevents any actual movement.
After 10-20 seconds, relax your muscles as your partner gently pushes the foot towards your glutes, further stretching the quadriceps and hip flexors.
After 10-20 seconds, Cambia sides.

name: Lying Rear Delt Raise
instructions: While holding a dumbbell in each hand, lay with your chest down on a flat Banco.
posición the palms of the manos in a neutral manner (palms facing your torso) as you Mantén the brazos extended with the elbows slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.

Now raise the brazos to the side until your elbows are at shoulder height and your brazos are roughly parallel to the suelo as you Exhala. Tip: Maintain your brazos perpendicular to the torso while keeping them extended throughout the movement. Also, Mantén the contraction at the top for a second.
Lentamente Baja the mancuernas to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then Cambia to the other arm.

name: Lying Supine con Mancuerna Curl
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco face up while holding a dumbbell in each arm on top of your thighs.
Bring the mancuernas to the sides with the brazos extended and the palms of the manos facing your thighs (neutral grip).

While keeping the brazos close to your torso and elbows in, Lentamente Baja your brazos (as you Mantén them extended with a slight bend at the elbows) as far down towards the suelo as you can go. Once you cannot go down any further, lock your upper brazos in that posición and that will be your starting posición.

As you Respira out, Lentamente begin to Curl the weights up as you simultaneously rotate your wrists so that the palms of the manos face up. Continue curling the peso until your biceps are fully contracted and squeeze hard at the top posición for a second. Tip: Only the forearms should move. Upper brazos should remain stationary and elbows should stay in throughout the movement.
Regresa back to the starting posición very Lentamente.

name: Lying T-Bar Row
instructions: Load up the T-bar Remo Machine with the desired peso and adjust the leg height so that your upper chest is at the top of the pad. Tip: In some machines all you can do is Párate on the appropriate step that allows you to be at a height that has the upper chest at the top of the pad.
Lay face down on the pad and grab the handles. You can either use a palms down, palms up, or palms in posición depending on what part of your back you want to emphasize.
Levanta the bar off the rack and extend your brazos in front of you. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala Lentamente Tira the peso up and squeeze your back at the top of the movement. Tip: Mantén the upper brazos as close to the torso as possible throughout the movement in order to better engage the back muscles. Also, do not Levanta your cuerpo off of the pad at any time and refrain from using the biceps to Levanta the peso.
After a second contraction at the top of the movement, as you Inhala, Lentamente go back down to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Lying Triceps Press
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco with either an e-z bar (my preference) or a straight bar placed on the suelo behind your head and your feet on the suelo.

Grab the bar behind you, using a medium overhand (pronated) grip, and raise the bar in front of you at brazos length. Tip: The brazos should be perpendicular to the torso and the suelo. The elbows should be tucked in. This is the starting posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the peso until the bar lightly touches your forehead while keeping the upper brazos and elbows stationary.
At that point, use the triceps to bring the peso back up to the starting posición as you Respira out.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Machine Bench Press
instructions: Siéntate down on the Chest Press Machine and Selecciona the peso.
Step on the lever provided by the machine since it will help you to bring the handles forward so that you can grab the handles and fully extend the brazos.

Grab the handles with a palms-down grip and Levanta your elbows so that your upper brazos are parallel to the suelo to the sides of your torso.
