Tip: Your forearms will be pointing forward since you are grabbing the handles. Once you bring the handles forward and extend the brazos you will be at the starting posición.
Now bring the handles back towards you as you Respira in.
Empuja the handles away from you as you flex your pecs and you Respira out. Sostén the contraction for a second before going back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of reps.
When finished step on the lever again and Lentamente get the handles back to their original place.

name: Machine Bicep Curl
instructions: Adjust the seat to the appropriate height and make your peso selection. Place your upper brazos against the pads and grasp the handles. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by flexing the elbow, pulling your Baja arm towards your upper arm.
Pause at the top of the movement, and then Lentamente Regresa the peso to the starting posición.
Avoid returning the peso all the way to the stops until the set is complete to Mantén tension on the muscles being worked.

name: Machine Preacher Curls
instructions: Siéntate down on the Preacher Curl Machine and Selecciona the peso.

Place the back of your upper brazos (your triceps) on the preacher pad provided and grab the handles using an underhand grip (palms facing up). Tip: Make sure that when you place the brazos on the pad you Mantén the elbows in. This will be your starting posición.

Now Levanta the handles as you Exhala and you contract the biceps. At the top of the posición make sure that you Sostén the contraction for a second. Tip: Only the forearms should move. The upper brazos should remain stationary and on the pad at all times.
Baja the handles Lentamente back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Machine Shoulder (Military) Press
instructions: Siéntate down on the Shoulder Press Machine and Selecciona the peso.
Grab the handles to your sides as you Mantén the elbows bent and in line with your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Now Levanta the handles as you Exhala and you extend the brazos fully. At the top of the posición make sure that you Sostén the contraction for a second.
Baja the handles Lentamente back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Machine Triceps Extension
instructions: Adjust the seat to the appropriate height and make your peso selection. Place your upper brazos against the pads and grasp the handles. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by extending the elbow, pulling your Baja arm away from your upper arm.
Pause at the completion of the movement, and then Lentamente Regresa the peso to the starting posición.
Avoid returning the peso all the way to the stops until the set is complete to Mantén tension on the muscles being worked.

name: Medicine Ball Chest Pass
instructions: You will need a partner for this exercise. Lacking one, this movement can be performed against a wall.
Begin facing your partner holding the medicine ball at your torso with both manos.
Tira the ball to your chest, and reverse the motion by extending through the elbows. For sports applications, you can take a step as you throw.
Your partner should catch the ball, and throw it back to you.
Receive the throw with both manos at chest height.

name: Medicine Ball Full Twist
instructions: For this exercise you will need a medicine ball and a partner. Párate back to back with your partner, spaced 2-3 feet apart. This will be your starting posición.
Sostén the ball in front of the trunk. Open the hips and turn the shoulders at the same time as your partner.
For full rotation, you and your partner should twist in the same direction, i.e. counter-clockwise.
Pass the ball to your partner, and both of you can now twist in the opposite direction to Repite the procedure.

name: Medicine Ball Scoop Throw
instructions: Assume a semisquat stance with a medicine ball in your manos. Your brazos should hang so the ball is near your feet.
Begin by thrusting the hips forward as you extend through the piernas, jumping up.
As you do, swing your brazos up and over your head, keeping them extended, releasing the ball at the peak of your movement. The goal is to throw the ball the greatest distance behind you.

name: Middle Back Shrug
instructions: Lie facedown on an incline Banco while holding a dumbbell in each hand. Your brazos should be fully extended hanging down and pointing towards the suelo. The palms of your manos should be facing each other. This will be your starting posición.

As you Exhala, squeeze your shoulder blades together and Sostén the contraction for a full second. Tip: This movement is just like the reverse action of a hug, or trying to perform rear laterals as if you had no brazos.
As you Inhala go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Middle Back Stretch
instructions: Párate so your feet are shoulder width apart and your manos are on your hips.
Twist at your waist until you feel a stretch. Sostén for 10 to 15 seconds, then twist to the other side.

name: Mixed Grip Chin
instructions: Using a spacing that is just about 1 inch wider than shoulder width, grab a Tira-up bar with the palms of one hand facing forward and the palms of the other hand facing towards you. This will be your starting posición.

Now start to Tira yourself up as you Exhala. Tip: With the arm that has the palms facing up concentrate on using the back muscles in order to perform the movement. The elbow of that arm should remain close to the torso. With the other arm that has the palms facing forward, the elbows will be away but in line with the torso. You will concentrate on using the lats to Tira your cuerpo up.
After a second contraction at the top, start to Lentamente come down as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

On the following set, Cambia grips; so if you had the right hand with the palms facing you and the left one with the palms facing forward, on the next set you will have the palms facing forward for the right hand and facing you for the left.

name: Monster Walk
instructions: Place a band around both ankles and another around both rodillas. There should be enough tension that they are tight when your feet are shoulder width apart.
To begin, take short steps forward alternating your left and right foot.
After several steps, do just the opposite and walk backward to where you started.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Begin in a pushup posición, with your peso supported by your manos and toes. Flexing the knee and hip, bring one leg until the knee is approximately under the hip. This will be your starting posición.

Explosively reverse the positions of your piernas, extending the bent leg until the leg is straight and supported by the toe, and bringing the other foot up with the hip and knee flexed. Repite in an alternating fashion for 20-30 seconds.

name: Moving Claw Series
instructions: This move helps prepare your running form to help you excel at sprinting. As you run, be sure to flex the knee, aiming to kick your glutes as the hip extends.
Reload the quad as the leg moves back forward, attacking the suelo on the next step.
Ensure that as you run, you block with the brazos, punching through in a rapid 1-2 motion.

name: Muscle Snatch
instructions: Begin with a loaded barra held at the mid thigh posición with a wide grip. The feet should be directly below the hips, with the feet turned out as needed. Baja the hips, with the chest up and the head looking forward. The shoulders should be just in front of the bar. This will be the starting posición.

Begin the Tira by driving through the front of the heels, raising the bar. Transition into the second Tira by extending through the hips rodillas and ankles, driving the bar up as quickly as possible. The bar should be close to the cuerpo.
Continue raising the bar to the overhead posición, without rebending the rodillas.

name: Muscle Up
instructions: Grip the rings using a false grip, with the base of your palms on top of the rings. Initiate a Tira up by pulling the elbows down to your side, flexing the elbows.

As you reach the top posición of the Tira-up, Tira the rings to your armpits as you roll your shoulders forward, allowing your elbows to move straight back behind you. This puts you into the proper posición to continue into the dip portion of the movement.
Maintaining control and stability, extend through the elbow to complete the motion.
Use care when lowering yourself to the suelo.

name: Narrow Stance Hack Squats
instructions: Place the back of your torso against the back pad of the machine and hook your shoulders under the shoulder pads provided.

posición your piernas in the platform using a less than shoulder width narrow stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Your feet should be around 3 inches or less apart. Tip: Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain the back on the pad at all times.
Place your brazos on the side handles of the machine and disengage the safety bars (which on most designs is done by moving the side handles from a facing front posición to a diagonal posición).
Now straighten your piernas without locking the rodillas. This will be your starting posición.

Begin to Lentamente Baja the unit by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up (back on the pad at all times). Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Begin to raise the unit as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with mainly with the heels of your feet as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Narrow Stance Leg Press
instructions: Using a leg Press machine, Siéntate down on the machine and place your piernas on the platform directly in front of you at a less-than-shoulder-width narrow stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Your feet should be around 3 inches or less apart. Tip: Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain the back on the pad at all times.

Baja the safety bars holding the weighted platform in place and Press the platform all the way up until your piernas are fully extended in front of you. Tip: Make sure that you do not lock your rodillas. Your torso and the piernas should make a perfect 90-degree angle. This will be your starting posición.
As you Inhala, Lentamente Baja the platform until your upper and Baja piernas make a 90-degree angle.
Pushing mainly with the heels of your feet and using the quadriceps go back to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and ensure to lock the safety pins properly once you are done. You do not want that platform falling on you fully loaded.

name: Narrow Stance Squats
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a less-than-shoulder-width narrow stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Feet should be around 3-6 inches apart. Mantén your head up at all times (looking down will get you off balance) and maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Natural Glute Ham Raise
instructions: Using the leg pad of a lat pulldown machine or a preacher Banco, posición yourself so that your ankles are under the pads, rodillas on the seat, and you are facing away from the machine. You should be upright and maintaining good posture.
This will be your starting posición. Baja yourself under control until your rodillas are almost completely straight.
Remaining in control, raise yourself back up to the starting posición.
If you are unable to complete a rep, use a band, a partner, or Empuja off of a box to aid in completing a repetition.

name: Neck-SMR
instructions: Using a muscle roller or a rolling pin, place the roller behind your head and against your neck. Make sure that you do not place the roller directly against the spine, but turned slightly so that the roller is pressed against the muscles to either side of the spine. This will be your starting posición.
Starting at the top of your neck, Lentamente roll down the muscles of your neck, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds.

name: Neck Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat Banco. Using a medium-width grip (a grip that creates a 90-degree angle in the middle of the movement between the forearms and the upper brazos), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over your neck with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your neck.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up).
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Oblique Crunches
instructions: Lie flat on the suelo with your Baja back pressed to the suelo. For this exercise, you will need to put one hand beside your head and the other to the side against the suelo.
Make sure your feet are elevated and resting on a flat surface.
Now Levanta the shoulder in which your hand is touching your head.

Simply elevate your shoulder and cuerpo upward until you touch your knee. For example, if you have your right hand besides your head, then you want to elevate your cuerpo upwards until your right elbow touches your left knee. The same variation can be applied doing the inverse and using your left elbow to touch your right knee.
After your knee touches your elbow, Baja your cuerpo until you have reached the starting posición.
Remember to Respira in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to Respira out during the concentric (upward) part of the exercise.
Continue alternating in this manner until all of the recommended repetitions for each side have been completed.

name: Oblique Crunches - On The Floor
instructions: Start out by lying on your right side with your piernas lying on top of each other. Make sure your rodillas are bent a little bit.
Place your left hand behind your head.
Once you are in this set posición, begin by moving your left elbow up as you would perform a normal crunch except this time the main emphasis is on your obliques.
Crunch as high as you can, Sostén the contraction for a second and then Lentamente drop back down into the starting posición.
Remember to Respira in during the eccentric (lowering) part of the exercise and to Respira out during the concentric (elevation) part of the exercise.

name: Olympic Squat
instructions: Begin with a barra supported on top of the traps. The chest should be up, and the head facing forward. Adopt a hip width stance with the feet turned out as needed.

Descend by flexing the rodillas, refraining from moving the hips back as much as possible. This requires that the rodillas travel forward; ensure that they stay aligned with the feet. The goal is to Mantén the torso as upright as possible. Continue all the way down, keeping the peso on the front of the heel.
At the moment the upper piernas contact the Baja, reverse the motion, driving the peso upward.

name: On-Your-Back Quad Stretch
instructions: Lie on a flat Banco or step, and hang one leg and arm over the side.
Bend the knee and Sostén the top of the foot. As you do this, be careful not to arch your Baja back.
Tira the belly button to the spine to stay in neutral. Press your foot down and into your hand. To add the hip stretch, Levanta the hip of the leg you're holding up toward the ceiling.
Cambia sides.

name: On Your Side Quad Stretch
instructions: Start off by lying on your right side, with your right knee bent at a 90-degree angle resting on the suelo in front of you (this stabilizes the torso).
Bend your left knee behind you and Sostén your left foot with your left hand. To stretch your hip flexor, Press your left hip forward as you Empuja your left foot back into your hand. Cambia sides.

name: One-Arm con Mancuerna Row
instructions: Choose a flat Banco and place a dumbbell on each side of it.

Place the right leg on top of the end of the Banco, bend your torso forward from the waist until your upper cuerpo is parallel to the suelo, and place your right hand on the other end of the Banco for support.

Use the left hand to pick up the dumbbell on the suelo and Sostén the peso while keeping your Baja back straight. The palm of the hand should be facing your torso. This will be your starting posición.

Tira the resistance straight up to the side of your chest, keeping your upper arm close to your side and keeping the torso stationary. Respira out as you perform this step. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. Also, make sure that the force is performed with the back muscles and not the brazos. Finally, the upper torso should remain stationary and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work except for holding the dumbbell; therefore do not try to Tira the dumbbell up using the forearms.
Baja the resistance straight down to the starting posición. Respira in as you perform this step.
Repite the movement for the specified amount of repetitions.
Cambia sides and Repite again with the other arm.

name: One-Arm Flat Bench con Mancuerna Flye
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in one hand resting on top of your thigh. The palm of your hand with the dumbbell in it should be at a neutral grip.

By using your thighs to help you get the dumbbell up, clean the dumbbell so that you can Sostén it in front of you with your lifting arm being fully extended. Remember to maintain a neutral grip with this exercise. Your non lifting hand should be to the side holding the flat Banco for better support. This will be your starting posición.

Your arm with the peso should have a slight bend on your elbow in order to prevent stress at the biceps tendon. Begin by lowering your arm with the peso in it out in a wide arc until you feel a stretch on your chest. Respira in as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Mantén in mind that throughout the movement, your lifting arm should remain stationary; the movement should only occur at the shoulder joint.
Regresa your lifting arm back to the starting posición as you squeeze your chest muscles and Respira out. Tip: Make sure to use the same arc of motion used to Baja the weights.
Sostén for a second at the contracted posición and Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: One-Arm High-Pulley en Cable Side Bends
instructions: Connect a standard handle to a tower. Move cable to highest pulley posición.
Párate with side to cable. With one hand, reach up and grab handle with underhand grip.
Tira down cable until elbow touches your side and the handle is by your shoulder.
posición feet hip-width apart. Place free hand on hip to help gauge pivot point.
Mantén arm in static posición. Contract oblique to bring the peso down in a side crunch.
Once you reach maximum contraction, Lentamente release the peso to the starting posición. The peso stack should never be unloaded in a resting posición. The aim is constant tension during the set.
Repite to failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: One-Arm Incline Lateral Raise
instructions: Recuéstate sideways on an incline Banco Press with a dumbbell in the hand. Make sure the shoulder is pressing against the incline Banco and the arm is lying across your cuerpo with the palm around your navel.
Sostén a dumbbell in your uppermost arm while keeping it extended in front of you parallel to the suelo. This is your starting posición.

While keeping the dumbbell parallel to the suelo at all times, perform a lateral raise. Your arm should travel straight up until it is pointing at the ceiling. Tip: Exhala as you perform this movement. Sostén the dumbbell in the posición and feel the contraction in the shoulders for a second.
While inhaling Baja the peso across your cuerpo back into the starting posición.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Clean
instructions: Place a kettlebell between your feet. As you bend down to grab the kettlebell, Empuja your butt back and Mantén your eyes looking forward.
Clean the kettlebell to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulder. The wrist should rotate as you do so.
Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Clean and Jerk
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle.
Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward.
Dip your cuerpo by bending the rodillas, keeping your torso upright.

Immediately reverse direction, driving through the heels, in essence jumping to create momentum. As you do so, Press the kettlebell overhead to lockout by extending the brazos, using your cuerpo's momentum to move the peso.
Receive the peso overhead by returning to a Sentadilla posición underneath the peso.
Keeping the peso overhead, Regresa to a standing posición. Baja the peso to the suelo to perform the next repetition.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Floor Press
instructions: Lie on the suelo holding a kettlebell with one hand, with your upper arm supported by the suelo. The palm should be facing in.
Press the kettlebell straight up toward the ceiling, rotating your wrist.
Baja the kettlebell back to the starting posición and Repite.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Jerk
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. This will be your starting posición.
Dip your cuerpo by bending the rodillas, keeping your torso upright.

Immediately reverse direction, driving through the heels, in essence jumping to create momentum. As you do so, Press the kettlebell overhead to lockout by extending the brazos, using your cuerpo's momentum to move the peso. Receive the peso overhead by returning to a Sentadilla posición underneath the peso. Keeping the peso overhead, Regresa to a standing posición.
Baja the peso to perform the next repetition.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Military Press To The Side
instructions: Clean a kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces inward. This will be your starting posición.
Look at the kettlebell and Press it up and out until it is locked out overhead.
Baja the kettlebell back to your shoulder under control and Repite. Make sure to contract your lat, butt, and stomach forcefully for added stability and strength.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Para Press
instructions: Clean a kettlebell to your shoulder. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. This will be your starting posición.
Sostén the kettlebell with the elbow out to the side, and Press it up and out until it is locked out overhead.
Baja the kettlebell back to your shoulder under control and Repite. Make sure to contract your lat, butt, and stomach forcefully for added stability and strength.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Push Press
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. This will be your starting posición.
Dip your cuerpo by bending the rodillas, keeping your torso upright.

Immediately reverse direction, driving through the heels, in essence jumping to create momentum. As you do so, Press the kettlebell overhead to lockout by extending the brazos, using your cuerpo's momentum to move the peso. Baja the peso to perform the next repetition.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Row
instructions: Place a kettlebell in front of your feet. Bend your rodillas slightly and then Empuja your butt out as much as possible as you bend over to get in the starting posición. Grab the kettlebell and Tira it to your stomach, retracting your shoulder blade and flexing the elbow. Mantén your back straight. Baja and Repite.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Snatch
instructions: Place a kettlebell between your feet. Bend your rodillas and Empuja your butt back to get in the proper starting posición.
Look straight ahead and swing the kettlebell back between your piernas.

Immediately reverse the direction and drive through with your hips and rodillas, accelerating the kettlebell upward. As the kettlebell rises to your shoulder rotate your hand and punch straight up, using momentum to receive the peso locked out overhead.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Split Jerk
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell by the handle. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so, so that the palm faces forward. This will be your starting posición.
Dip your cuerpo by bending the rodillas, keeping your torso upright.

Immediately reverse direction, driving through the heels, in essence jumping to create momentum. As you do so, Press the kettlebell overhead to lockout by extending the brazos, using your cuerpo's momentum to move the peso.
Receive the peso overhead by returning to a Sentadilla posición underneath the peso, positioning one leg in front of you and one leg behind you.
Keeping the peso overhead, Regresa to a standing posición and bring your feet together. Baja the peso to perform the next repetition.

name: One-Arm con Pesa Rusa Split Snatch
instructions: Sostén a kettlebell in one hand by the handle.
Sentadilla towards the suelo, and then reverse the motion, extending the hips, rodillas, and finally the ankles, to raise the kettlebell overhead.

After fully extending the cuerpo, descend into a Zancada posición to receive the weights overhead, one leg forward and one leg back. Ensure you drive through with your hips and lock the ketttlebells overhead in one uninterrupted motion.
Regresa to a standing posición, holding the peso overhead, and bring the feet together. Baja the peso to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: One-Arm Long Bar Row
instructions: posición a bar into a landmine or in a corner to Mantén it from moving. Load an appropriate peso onto your end.
Párate next to the bar, and take a grip with one hand close to the collar. Using your hips and piernas, rise to a standing posición.
Assume a bent-knee stance with your hips back and your chest up. Your arm should be extended. This will be your starting posición.
Tira the peso to your side by retracting the shoulder and flexing the elbow. Do not jerk the peso or cheat during the movement.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: One-Arm Medicine Ball Slam
instructions: Start in a standing posición with a staggered, athletic stance. Sostén a medicine ball in one hand, on the same side as your back leg. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by winding the arm, raising the medicine ball above your head. As you do so, extend through the hips, rodillas, and ankles to load up for the slam.
At peak Extensión, flex the shoulders, spine, and hips to throw the ball hard into the suelo directly in front of you.
Catch the ball on the bounce and continue for the desired number of repetitions.

name: One-Arm Open Palm con Pesa Rusa Clean
instructions: Place one kettlebell between your feet.
Grab the handle with one hand and raise the kettlebell rapidly, let it flip so that the ball of the kettlebell lands in the palm of your hand.
Throw the kettlebell out in front of you and catch the handle with one hand.
Take the kettlebell to the suelo and Repite. Make sure to work both brazos.

name: One-Arm Overhead con Pesa Rusa Squats
instructions: Clean and Press a kettlebell with one arm. Clean the kettlebell to your shoulder by extending through the piernas and hips as you Tira the kettlebell towards your shoulder. Rotate your wrist as you do so. Press the peso overhead by extending through the elbow.This will be your starting posición.
Looking straight ahead and keeping a kettlebell locked out above you, flex the rodillas and hips and Baja your torso between your piernas, keeping your head and chest up.
Pause at the bottom posición for a second before rising back to the top, driving through the heels of your feet.

name: One-Arm Side Deadlift
instructions: Párate to the side of a barra next to its center. Bend your rodillas and Baja your cuerpo until you are able to reach the barra.

Grasp the bar as if you were grabbing a briefcase (palms facing you since the bar is sideways). You may need a wrist wrap if you are using a significant amount of peso. This is your starting posición.
Use your piernas to help Levanta the barra up while exhaling. Your brazos should extend fully as bring the barra up until you are in a standing posición.
Lentamente bring the barra back down while inhaling. Tip: Make sure to bend your rodillas while lowering the peso to avoid any injury from occurring.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One-Arm Side Laterals
instructions: Pick a dumbbell and place it in one of your manos. Your non lifting hand should be used to grab something steady such as an incline Banco Press. Lean towards your lifting arm and away from the hand that is gripping the incline Banco as this will allow you to Mantén your balance.
Párate with a straight torso and have the dumbbell by your side at arm's length with the palm of the hand facing you. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso stationary (no swinging), Levanta the dumbbell to your side with a slight bend on the elbow and your hand slightly tilted forward as if pouring water in a glass. Continue to go up until you arm is parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this movement and pause for a second at the top.
Baja the dumbbell back down Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: One-Legged en Cable Kickback
instructions: Hook a leather ankle cuff to a low cable pulley and then attach the cuff to your ankle.
Face the peso stack from a distance of about two feet, grasping the steel frame for support.

While keeping your rodillas and hips bent slightly and your abs tight, contract your glutes to Lentamente "kick" the working leg back in a semicircular arc as high as it will comfortably go as you Respira out. Tip: At full Extensión, squeeze your glutes for a second in order to achieve a peak contraction.
Now Lentamente bring your working leg forward, resisting the Tira of the cable until you reach the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia piernas and Repite the movement for the other side.

name: One Arm Against Wall
instructions: From a standing posición, place a bent arm against a wall or doorway.
Lentamente lean toward your arm until you feel a stretch in your lats.

name: One Arm Chin-Up
instructions: For this exercise, start out by placing a towel around a chin up bar.
Grab the chin-up bar with your palm facing you. One hand will be grabbing the chin-up bar and the other will be grabbing the towel.
Bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.v

Tira your torso up until the bar touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second on the contracted posición, start to Inhala and Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One Arm con Mancuerna Bench Press
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in one hand on top of your thigh.

By using your thigh to help you get the dumbbell up, clean the dumbbell up so that you can Sostén it in front of you at shoulder width. Use the hand you are not lifting with to help posición the dumbbell over you properly.
Once at shoulder width, rotate your wrist forward so that the palm of your hand is facing away from you. This will be your starting posición.

Bring down the weights Lentamente to your side as you Respira in. Mantén full control of the dumbbell at all times. Tip: Use the hand that you are not lifting with to help Mantén the dumbbell balance as you may struggle a bit at first. Only use your non-lifting hand if it is needed. Otherwise, Mantén it resting to the side.

As you Respira out, Empuja the mancuernas up using your pectoral muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, squeeze your chest, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One Arm con Mancuerna Preacher Curl
instructions: Grab a dumbbell with the right arm and place the upper arm on top of the preacher Banco or the incline Banco. The dumbbell should be held at shoulder length. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the dumbbell until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.

As you Exhala, use the biceps to Curl the peso up until your biceps is fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger higher than the thumb.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted posición and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One Arm Floor Press
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat surface with your back pressing against the suelo or an exercise mat. Make sure your rodillas are bent.

Have a partner hand you the bar on one hand. When starting, your arm should be just about fully extended, similar to the starting posición of a barra Banco Press. However, this time your grip will be neutral (palms facing your torso).
Make sure the hand you are not using to Levanta the peso is placed by your side.
Begin the exercise by lowering the barra until your elbow touches the suelo. Make sure to Respira in as this is the eccentric (lowering part of the exercise).
Then start lifting the barra back up to the original starting posición. Remember to Respira out during the concentric (lifting part of the exercise).
Repite until you have performed your recommended repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One Arm Lat Pulldown
instructions: Selecciona an appropriate peso and adjust the knee pad to help Mantén you down. Grasp the handle with a pronated grip. This will be your starting posición.
Tira the handle down, squeezing your elbow to your side as you flex the elbow.
Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then Lentamente Regresa the handle to the starting posición.
For multiple repetitions, avoid completely returning the peso to Mantén tension on the muscles being worked.

name: One Arm Pronated con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: Lie flat on a Banco while holding a dumbbell at brazos length. Your arm should be perpendicular to your cuerpo. The palm of your hand should be facing towards your feet as a pronated grip is required to perform this exercise.
Place your non lifting hand on your bicep for support.
Lentamente begin to Baja the dumbbell down as you Respira in.
Then, begin lifting the dumbbell upward as you contract the triceps. Remember to Respira out during the concentric (lifting part of the exercise).
Repite until you have performed your set repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: One Arm Supinated con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: Lie flat on a Banco while holding a dumbbell at brazos length. Your arm should be perpendicular to your cuerpo. The palm of your hand should be facing towards your face as a supinated grip is required to perform this exercise.
Place your non lifting hand on your bicep for support.
Lentamente begin to Baja the dumbbell down as you Respira in.
Then, begin lifting the dumbbell upward as you contract the triceps. Remember to Respira out during the concentric (lifting part of the exercise).
Repite until you have performed your set repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.
Cambia brazos again and Repite the movement.

name: One Half Locust
instructions: Lie facedown on the suelo.
Put your left hand under your left hipbone to pad your hip and pubic bone.
Bend your right knee so you can Sostén the foot in your right hand.

Levanta the foot in the air and simultaneously Levanta your shoulders off the suelo. This also stretches the right hip flexor and the chest and shoulders. Cambia sides. If it doesn't bother your back, you can try it with both brazos and piernas at the same time.

name: One Handed Hang
instructions: Grab onto a chinup bar with one hand, using a pronated grip. Mantén your feet on the suelo or a step. Allow the majority of your peso to hang from that hand, while keeping your feet on the suelo. Sostén for 10-20 seconds and Cambia sides.

name: One Knee To Chest
instructions: Start off by lying on the suelo.
Extend one leg straight and Tira the other knee to your chest. Sostén under the knee joint to protect the kneecap.
Gently tug that knee toward your nose.
Cambia sides. This stretches the buttocks and Baja back of the bent leg and the hip flexor of the straight leg.

name: One Leg con Barra Squat
instructions: Start by standing about 2 to 3 feet in front of a flat Banco with your back facing the Banco. Have a barra in front of you on the suelo. Tip: Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other.
Bend the rodillas and use a pronated grip with your manos being wider than shoulder width apart from each other to Levanta the barra up until you can rest it on your chest.

Then Levanta the barra over your head and rest it on the base of your neck. Move one foot back so that your toe is resting on the flat Banco. Your other foot should be stationary in front of you. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. Tip: Make sure your back is straight and chest is out while performing this exercise.
As you Inhala, Lentamente Baja your leg until your thigh is parallel to the suelo. At this point, your knee should be over your toes. Your chest should be directly above the middle of your thigh.
Leading with the chest and hips and contracting the quadriceps, elevate your leg back to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia piernas and Repite the movement.

name: Open Palm con Pesa Rusa Clean
instructions: Place one kettlebell between your feet. Clean the kettlebell by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebell towards your shoulders.
Release the kettlebell as it comes up, and let it flip so that the ball of the kettlebell lands in the palms of your manos.
Release the kettlebell out in front of you and catch the handle with both manos. Baja the kettlebell to the starting posición and Repite.

name: Otis-Up
instructions: Secure your feet and lay back on the suelo. Your rodillas should be bent. Sostén a peso with both manos to your chest. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by flexing the hips and spine to raise your torso up from the suelo.
As you move up, Press the peso up so that it is above your head at the top of the movement.
Regresa the peso to your chest as you reverse the Siéntate-up motion, ensuring not to go all the way down to the suelo.

name: Overhead en Cable Curl
instructions: To begin, set a peso that is comfortable on each side of the pulley machine. Note: Make sure that the amount of peso selected is the same on each side.
Now adjust the height of the pulleys on each side and make sure that they are positioned at a height higher than that of your shoulders.

Párate in the middle of both sides and use an underhand grip (palms facing towards the ceiling) to grab each handle. Your brazos should be fully extended and parallel to the suelo with your feet positioned shoulder width apart from each other. Your cuerpo should be evenly aligned the handles. This is the starting posición.
While exhaling, Lentamente squeeze the biceps on each side until your forearms and biceps touch.
While inhaling, move your forearms back to the starting posición. Note: Your entire cuerpo is stationary during this exercise except for the forearms.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

name: Overhead Lat
instructions: Siéntate upright on the suelo with your partner behind you. Raise one arm straight up, and flex the elbow, attempting to touch your hand to your back. Your parner should Sostén your tricep and wrist. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to Tira your upper arm to your side as your partner prevents you from doing actually doing so.
After 10-20 seconds, relax the arm and allow your partner to further stretch the lat by applying gentle pressure to the tricep. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Overhead Slam
instructions: Sostén a medine ball with both manos and Párate with your feet at shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the countermovement by raising the ball above your head and fully extending your cuerpo.
Reverse the motion, slamming the ball into the suelo directly in front of you as hard as you can.
Receive the ball with both manos on the bounce and Repite the movement.

name: Overhead Squat
instructions: Start out by having a barra in front of you on the suelo. Your feet should be wider than shoulder width apart from each other.

Bend the rodillas and use a pronated grip (palms facing you) to grab the barra. Your manos should be at a wider than shoulder width apart from each other before lifting. Once you are positioned, Levanta the barra up until you can rest it on your chest.

Move the barra over and slightly behind your head and make sure your brazos are fully extended. Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain a straight back. Retract your shoulder blades. This is your starting posición.

Lentamente Baja the peso by bending your rodillas until your thighs are parallel to the suelo while inhaling. Tip: Mantén your back straight while performing this exercise to avoid any injuries and your brazos should remain extended and over your head at all times.
Now use your feet and piernas to help bring the peso back up to the starting posición while exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Overhead Stretch
instructions: Standing straight up, lace your fingers together and open your palms to the ceiling. Mantén your shoulders down as you extend your brazos up.
To create a full torso stretch, Tira your tailbone down and stabilize your torso as you do this. Stretch the muscles on both the front and the back of the torso.

name: Overhead Triceps
instructions: Siéntate upright on the suelo with your partner behind you. Raise one arm straight up, and flex the elbow, attempting to touch your hand to your back. Your parner should Sostén your elbow and wrist. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to extend the arm straight into the air as your partner prevents you from doing actually doing so.
After 10-20 seconds, relax the arm and allow your partner to further stretch the tricep by applying gentle pressure to the wrist. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Connect a standard handle to a tower, and—if possible—posición the cable to shoulder height. If not, a low pulley will suffice.
With your side to the cable, grab the handle with both manos and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the peso on the cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart and rodillas slightly bent, Sostén the cable to the middle of your chest. This will be your starting posición.
Press the cable away from your chest, fully extending both brazos. You core should be tight and engaged.
Sostén the repetition for several seconds before returning to the starting posición.
At the conclusion of the set, Repite facing the other direction.

name: Pallof Press With Rotation
instructions: Connect a standard handle to a tower, and posición the cable to shoulder height.

With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the peso on the cable. Align outstretched arm with cable.
With your feet positioned hip-width apart, Tira the cable into your chest and grab the handle with your other hand. Both manos should be on the handle at this time.
Facing forward, Press the cable away from your chest. You core should be tight and engaged.
Keeping your hips straight, twist your torso away from the pulley until you get a full quarter rotation.
Maintain your rigid stance and straight brazos. Regresa to the neutral posición in a slow and controlled manner. Your brazos should be extended in front of you.
With the side tension still engaging your core, bring your manos to your chest and immediately Press outward to a fully extended posición. This constitutes one rep.
Repite to failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: Palms-Down con Mancuerna Wrist Curl Over A Bench
instructions: Start out by placing two mancuernas on one side of a flat Banco.
Kneel down on both of your rodillas so that your cuerpo is facing the flat Banco.

Use your brazos to grab both of the mancuernas with a pronated grip (palms facing down) and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against the flat Banco. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.
Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Palms-Down Wrist Curl Over A Bench
instructions: Start out by placing a barra on one side of a flat Banco.
Kneel down on both of your rodillas so that your cuerpo is facing the flat Banco.
Use your brazos to grab the barra with a pronated grip (palms down) and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against the flat Banco. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.
Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Palms-Up con Barra Wrist Curl Over A Bench
instructions: Start out by placing a barra on one side of a flat Banco.
Kneel down on both of your rodillas so that your cuerpo is facing the flat Banco.
Use your brazos to grab the barra with a supinated grip (palms up) and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against the flat Banco. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.
Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Palms-Up con Mancuerna Wrist Curl Over A Bench
instructions: Start out by placing two mancuernas on one side of a flat Banco.
Kneel down on both of your rodillas so that your cuerpo is facing the flat Banco.

Use your brazos to grab both of the mancuernas with a supinated grip (palms up) and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against the flat Banco. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.
Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling. Make sure to Inhala during this part of the exercise.
Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Parallel Bar Dip
instructions: Párate between a set of parallel bars. Place a hand on each bar, and then take a small jump to help you get into the starting posición with your brazos locked out.
Begin by flexing the elbow, lowering your cuerpo until your brazos break 90 degrees. Avoid swinging, and maintain good posture throughout the descent.
Reverse the motion by extending the elbow, pushing yourself back up into the starting posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Pelvic Tilt Into Bridge
instructions: Recuéstate with your feet on the suelo, heels directly under your rodillas.
Levanta only your tailbone to the ceiling to stretch your Baja back. (Don't Levanta the entire spine yet.) Tira in your stomach.
To go into a bridge, Levanta the entire spine except the neck.

name: Peroneals-SMR
instructions: Lay on your side, supporting your peso on your forearm and on a foam roller placed on the outside of your Baja leg. Your upper leg can either be on top of your Baja leg, or you can cross it in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your hips off of the suelo and begin to roll from below the knee to above the ankle on the side of your leg, pausing at points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Repite on the other leg.

name: Peroneals Stretch
instructions: In a seated posición, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting posición.

With the leg extended and the heel off of the suelo, Tira on the belt so that the foot is inverted, with the inside of the foot being pulled towards you. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Physioball Hip Bridge
instructions: Lay on a ball so that your upper back is on the ball with your hips unsupported. Both feet should be flat on the suelo, hip width apart or wider. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by extending the hips using your glutes and hamstrings, raising your hips upward as you bridge.
Pause at the top of the motion and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Pin Presses
instructions: Pin presses remove the eccentric phase of the Banco Press, developing starting strength. They also allow you to train a desired range of motion.

The Banco should be set up in a power rack. Set the pins to the desired point in your range of motion, whether it just be lockout or an inch off of your chest. The bar should be moved to the pins and prepared for lifting.

Begin by lying on the Banco, with the bar directly above the contact point during your regular Banco. Tuck your feet underneath you and arch your back. Using the bar to help support your peso, Levanta your shoulder off the Banco and retract them, squeezing the shoulder blades together. Use your feet to drive your traps into the Banco. Maintain this tight cuerpo posición throughout the movement.
You can take a standard Banco grip, or shoulder width to focus on the triceps. The bar, wrist, and elbow should stay in line at all times. Focus on squeezing the bar and trying to Tira it apart.
Drive the bar up with as much force as possible. The elbows should be tucked in until lockout.
Regresa the bar to the pins, pausing before beginning the next repetition.

name: Piriformis-SMR
instructions: Siéntate with your buttocks on top of a foam roll. Bend your rodillas, and then cross one leg so that the ankle is over the knee. This will be your starting posición.

Shift your peso to the side of the crossed leg, rolling over the buttocks until you feel tension in your upper glute. You may assist the stretch by using one hand to Tira the bent knee towards your chest. Sostén this posición for 10-30 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Plank
instructions: Get into a prone posición on the suelo, supporting your peso on your toes and your forearms. Your brazos are bent and directly below the shoulder.
Mantén your cuerpo straight at all times, and Sostén this posición as long as possible. To increase difficulty, an arm or leg can be raised.

name: Plate Pinch
instructions: Grab two wide-rimmed plates and put them together with the smooth sides facing outward
Use your fingers to grip the outside part of the plate and your thumb for the other side thus holding both plates together. This is the starting posición.
Squeeze the plate with your fingers and thumb. Sostén this posición for as long as you can.
Repite for the recommended amount of sets prescribed in your program.
Cambia brazos and Repite the movements.

name: Plate Twist
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo or an exercise mat with your piernas fully extended and your upper cuerpo upright. Grab the plate by its sides with both manos out in front of your abdominals with your brazos slightly bent.

Lentamente cross your piernas near your ankles and Levanta them up off the suelo. Your rodillas should also be bent slightly. Note: Move your upper cuerpo back slightly to help Mantén you balanced turning this exercise. This is the starting posición.
Move the plate to the left side and touch the suelo with it. Respira out as you perform that movement.

Come back to the starting posición as you Respira in and then Repite the movement but this time to the right side of the cuerpo. Tip: Use a slow controlled movement at all times. Jerking motions can injure the back.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Platform Hamstring Slides
instructions: For this movement a wooden suelo or similar is needed. Lay on your back with your piernas extended. Place a gym towel or a light peso underneath your heel. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing the knee, keeping your other leg straight.
Continue bringing the heel closer to you, sliding it on the suelo.
At full knee Flexión, reverse the movement to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Plie con Mancuerna Squat
instructions: Sostén a dumbbell at the base with both manos and Párate straight up. Move your piernas so that they are wider than shoulder width apart from each other with your rodillas slightly bent.
Your toes should be facing out. Note: Your brazos should be stationary while performing the exercise. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente bend the rodillas and Baja your piernas until your thighs are parallel to the suelo. Make sure to Inhala as this is the eccentric part of the exercise.
Press mainly with the heel of the foot to bring the cuerpo back to the starting posición while exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Plyo con Pesa Rusa Pushups
instructions: Place a kettlebell on the suelo. Place yourself in a pushup posición, on your toes with one hand on the suelo and one hand holding the kettlebell, with your elbows extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by lowering yourself as low as you can, keeping your back straight.

Quickly and forcefully reverse direction, pushing yourself up to the other side of the kettlebell, switching manos as you do so. Continue the movement by descending and repeating the movement back and forth.

name: Plyo Push-up
instructions: Move into a prone posición on the suelo, supporting your peso on your manos and toes.
Your brazos should be fully extended with the manos around shoulder width. Mantén your cuerpo straight throughout the movement. This will be your starting posición.
Descend by flexing at the elbow, lowering your chest towards the suelo.
At the bottom, reverse the motion by pushing yourself up through elbow Extensión as quickly as possible. Attempt to Empuja your upper cuerpo up until your manos leave the suelo.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite the exercise.
For added difficulty, add claps into the movement while you are air borne.

name: Posterior Tibialis Stretch
instructions: In a seated posición, loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. This will be your starting posición.

With the leg extended and the heel off of the suelo, Tira on the belt so that the foot is everted, with the outside of the foot being pulled towards you. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Power Clean
instructions: Párate with your feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart and toes pointing out slightly.
Sentadilla down and grasp bar with a closed, pronated grip. Your manos should be slightly wider than shoulder width apart outside rodillas with elbows fully extended.
Place the bar about 1 inch in front of your shins and over the balls of your feet.
Your back should be flat or slightly arched, your chest held up and out and your shoulder blades should be retracted.
Mantén your head in a neutral posición (in line with vertebral column and not tilted or rotated) with your eyes focused straight ahead. Inhala during this phase.

Levanta the bar from the suelo by forcefully extending the hips and the rodillas as you Exhala. Tip: The upper torso should maintain the same angle. Do not bend at the waist yet and do not let the hips rise before the shoulders (this would have the effect of pushing the glutes in the air and stretching the hamstrings.
Mantén elbows fully extended with the head in a neutral posición and the shoulders over the bar.
As the bar raises Mantén it as close to the shins as possible.
As the bar passes the rodillas, thrust your hips forward and slightly bend the rodillas to avoid locking them. Tip: At this point your thighs should be against the bar.
Mantén the back flat or slightly arched, elbows fully extended and your head neutral. Tip: You will Sostén your breath until the next phase.
Inhala and then forcefully and quickly extend your hips and rodillas and Párate on your toes.

Mantén the bar as close to your cuerpo as possible. Tip: Your back should be flat with the elbows pointed out to the sides and your head in a neutral posición. Also, Mantén your shoulders over the bar and brazos straight as long as possible.
When your Baja cuerpo joints are fully extended, shrug the shoulders upward rapidly without letting the elbows flex yet. Exhala during this portion of the movement.
As the shoulders reach their highest elevation flex your elbows to begin pulling your cuerpo under the bar.

Continue to Tira the brazos as high and as long as possible. Tip: Due to the explosive nature of this phase, your torso will be erect or with an arched back, your head will be tilted back slightly and your feet may lose contact with the suelo.
After the Baja cuerpo has fully extended and the bar reaches near maximal height, Tira your cuerpo under the bar and rotate the brazos around and under the bar.
Simultaneously, flex the hips and rodillas into a quarter Sentadilla posición.

Once the brazos are under the bar, Inhala and then Levanta your elbows to posición the upper brazos parallel to the suelo. Rack the bar across the front of your collar bones and front shoulder muscles.
Catch the bar with an erect and tight torso, a neutral head posición and flat feet. Exhala during this movement.
Párate up by extending the hips and rodillas to a fully erect posición.
Baja the bar by gradually reducing the muscular tension of the brazos to allow a controlled descent of the bar to the thighs. Inhala during this movement.
Simultaneously flex the hips and rodillas to cushion the impact of the bar on the thighs.
Sentadilla down with the elbows fully extended until the bar touches the suelo.
Start over at Phase 1 and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Power Clean from Blocks
instructions: With a barra on boxes of the desired height, take a grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips.

In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward. There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso. At the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back, with the brazos still extended.

As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the third Tira by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out. At peak Extensión, Tira yourself under the bar far enough that it can be racked onto the shoulders, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed.

Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Continue until you have risen to a standing posición, and complete the repetition by returning the peso to the boxes.

name: Power Jerk
instructions: Standing with the peso racked on the front of the shoulders, begin with the dip. With your feet directly under your hips, flex the rodillas without moving the hips backward. Go down only slightly, and reverse direction as powerfully as possible.
Drive through the heels create as much speed and force as possible, and be sure to move your head out of the way as the bar leaves the shoulders.

At this moment as the feet leave the suelo, the feet must be placed into the receiving posición as quickly as possible. In the brief moment the feet are not actively driving against the platform, the athletes effort to Empuja the bar up will drive them down. The feet should be moved to a slightly wider stance, with the rodillas partially bent.
Receive the bar with the brazos locked out overhead.
Regresa to a standing posición.

name: Power Partials
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright and a dumbbell on each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
The palms of the manos should be facing your torso. Your feet should be about shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your brazos straight and the torso stationary, Levanta the weights out to your sides until they are about shoulder level height while exhaling.

Feel the contraction for a second and begin to Baja the weights back down to the starting posición while inhaling. Tip: Mantén the palms facing down with the little finger slightly higher while lifting and lowering the weights as it will concentrate the stress on your shoulders mainly.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Power Snatch
instructions: Begin with a loaded barra on the suelo. The bar should be close to or touching the shins, and a wide grip should be taken on the bar. The feet should be directly below the hips, with the feet turned out as needed. Baja the hips, with the chest up and the head looking forward. The shoulders should be just in front of the bar. This will be the starting posición.
Begin the first Tira by driving through the front of the heels, raising the bar from the suelo. The back angle should stay the same until the bar passes the rodillas.

Transition into the second Tira by extending through the hips rodillas and ankles, driving the bar up as quickly as possible. The bar should be close to the cuerpo. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, a slightly wider posición, Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. The bar should be received in a partial Sentadilla. Continue raising the bar to the overhead posición, receiving the bar locked out overhead.
Regresa to a standing posición with the peso over head.

name: Power Snatch from Blocks
instructions: Begin with a loaded barra on boxes or stands of the desired height. A wide grip should be taken on the bar. The feet should be directly below the hips, with the feet turned out as needed. Baja the hips, with the chest up and the head looking forward. The shoulders should be just in front of the bar, with the elbows pointed out. This will be the starting posición.
Begin the first Tira by driving through the front of the heels, raising the bar from the boxes.

Transition into the second Tira by extending through the hips rodillas and ankles, driving the bar up as quickly as possible. The bar should be close to the cuerpo. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, forcefully Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. The feet should move to just outside the hips, turned out as necessary. Receive the bar above a full Sentadilla and with the brazos fully extended overhead.
Keeping the bar aligned over the front of the heels, your head and chest up, drive through heels of the feet to move to a standing posición. Carefully Regresa the peso to the boxes.

name: Power Stairs
instructions: In the power stairs, implements are moved up a staircase. For training purposes, these can be performed with a tire or box.

Begin by taking the implement with both manos. Set your feet wide, with your head and chest up. Drive through the suelo with your heels, extending your rodillas and hips to raise the peso from the suelo.
As you lean back, attempt to swing the peso onto the stairs, which are usually around 16-18" high. You can use your piernas to help Empuja the peso onto the stair.
Repite for 3-5 repetitions, and continue with a heavier peso, moving as fast as possible.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: To perform this movement you will need a preacher Banco and an E-Z bar. Grab the E-Z Curl bar at the close inner handle (either have someone hand you the bar which is preferable or grab the bar from the front bar rest provided by most preacher benches). The palm of your manos should be facing forward and they should be slightly tilted inwards due to the shape of the bar.
With the upper brazos positioned against the preacher Banco pad and the chest against it, Sostén the E-Z Curl Bar at shoulder length. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the bar until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you Exhala, use the biceps to Curl the peso up until your biceps is fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder height. Squeeze the biceps hard and Sostén this posición for a second.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Preacher Hammer con Mancuerna Curl
instructions: Place the upper part of both brazos on top of the preacher Banco as you Sostén a dumbbell in each hand with the palms facing each other (neutral grip).
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you Exhala, use the biceps to Curl the peso up until your biceps is fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted posición and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Press Sit-Up
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on a Banco with a barra resting on your chest. posición your piernas so they are secure on the Extensión of the abdominal Banco. This is the starting posición.

While inhaling, tighten your abdominals and glutes. Simultaneously Curl your torso as you do when performing a Siéntate-up and Press the barra to an overhead posición while exhaling. Tip: Use your brazos to Empuja the barra out as you perform this exercise while still focusing on the abdominal muscles.
Baja your upper cuerpo back down to the starting posición while bringing the barra back down to your torso. Remember to Respira in while lowering the cuerpo.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Prone Manual Hamstring
instructions: You will need a partner for this exercise. Lay face down with your piernas straight. Your assistant will place their hand on your heel.

To begin, flex the knee to Curl your leg up. Your partner should provide resistance, starting light and increasing the pressure as the movement is completed. Communicate with your partner to monitor appropriate resistance levels.
Pause at the top, returning the leg to the starting posición as your partner provides resistance going the other direction.

name: Prowler Sprint
instructions: Place your sled on an appropriate surface, loaded to a suitable peso. The sled should provide enough resistance to require effort, but not so heavy that you are significantly slowed down.
You may use the upright or the low handles for this exercise. Place your manos on the handles with your brazos extended, leaning into the implement.
With good posture, drive through the suelo with alternating, short steps. Move as fast as you can for a short distance.

name: Pull Through
instructions: Begin standing a few feet in front of a low pulley with a rope or handle attached. Face away from the machine, straddling the cable, with your feet set wide apart.

Begin the movement by reaching through your piernas as far as possible, bending at the hips. Mantén your rodillas slightly bent. Keeping your brazos straight, extend through the hip to Párate straight up. Avoid pulling upward through the shoulders; all of the motion should originate through the hips.

name: Pullups
instructions: Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms facing forward using the prescribed grip. Note on grips: For a wide grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance wider than your shoulder width. For a medium grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance equal to your shoulder width and for a close grip at a distance smaller than your shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

Tira your torso up until the bar touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second on the contracted posición, start to Inhala and Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Push-Up Wide
instructions: With your manos wide apart, support your cuerpo on your toes and manos in a plank posición. Your elbows should be extended and your cuerpo straight. Do not allow your hips to sag. This will be your starting posición.
To begin, allow the elbows to flex, lowering your chest to the suelo as you Inhala.
Using your pectoral muscles, Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición by extending the elbows. Exhala as you perform this step.
After pausing at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Push-Ups - Close Triceps Position
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and place your manos closer than shoulder width for a close hand posición. Make sure that you are holding your torso up at brazos' length.
Baja yourself until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Using your triceps and some of your pectoral muscles, Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición and squeeze your chest. Respira out as you perform this step.
After a second pause at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Push-Ups With Feet Elevated
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and place your manos about 36 inches apart from each other holding your torso up at brazos length.
Place your toes on top of a flat Banco. This will allow your cuerpo to be elevated. Note: The higher the elevation of the flat Banco, the higher the resistance of the exercise is.
Baja yourself until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Using your pectoral muscles, Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición and squeeze your chest. Respira out as you perform this step.
After a second pause at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Push-Ups With Feet On An Exercise Ball
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and place your manos about 36 inches apart from each other holding your torso up at brazos length.
Place your toes on top of an exercise ball. This will allow your cuerpo to be elevated.
Baja yourself until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Using your pectoral muscles, Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición and squeeze your chest. Respira out as you perform this step.
After a second pause at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Push Press - Behind the Neck
instructions: Standing with the peso racked on the back of the shoulders, begin with the dip. With your feet directly under your hips, flex the rodillas without moving the hips backward. Go down only slightly, and reverse direction as powerfully as possible. Drive through the heels create as much speed and force as possible, moving the bar in a vertical path.
Using the momentum generated, finish pressing the peso overhead be extending through the brazos.
Regresa to the starting posición, using your piernas to absorb the impact.

name: Push Up to Side Plank
instructions: Get into pushup posición on the toes with your manos just outside of shoulder width.
Perform a pushup by allowing the elbows to flex. As you descend, Mantén your cuerpo straight.
Do one pushup and as you come up, shift your peso on the left side of the cuerpo, twist to the side while bringing the right arm up towards the ceiling in a side plank.
Baja the arm back to the suelo for another pushup and then twist to the other side.
Repite the series, alternating each side, for 10 or more reps.

name: Pushups
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and place your manos about 36 inches apart while holding your torso up at brazos length.
Next, Baja yourself downward until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Now Respira out and Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición while squeezing your chest.
After a brief pause at the top contracted posición, you can begin to Baja yourself downward again for as many repetitions as needed.

name: Pushups (Close and Wide Hand Positions)
instructions: Lie on the suelo face down and cuerpo straight with your toes on the suelo and the manos wider than shoulder width for a wide hand posición and closer than shoulder width for a close hand posición. Make sure you are holding your torso up at brazos length.
Baja yourself until your chest almost touches the suelo as you Inhala.
Using your pectoral muscles, Press your upper cuerpo back up to the starting posición and squeeze your chest. Respira out as you perform this step.
After a second pause at the contracted posición, Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Pyramid
instructions: Start off by rolling your torso forward onto the ball so your hips rest on top of the ball and become the highest point of your cuerpo.

Rest your manos and feet on the suelo. Your brazos and piernas can be slightly bent or straight, depending on the size of the ball, your flexibility, and the length of your limbs. This also helps develop stabilizing strength in your torso and shoulders.

name: Quad Stretch
instructions: Lay on your side. Loop a belt, rope, or band around your top foot. Flex the knee and extend your hip, attempting to touch your glutes with your foot, and holding the belt with your manos. This will be your starting posición.
With the belt being held over the shoulder or overhead, gently Tira to increase the stretch in the quadriceps. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Cambia sides.

name: Quadriceps-SMR
instructions: Lay facedown on the suelo with your peso supported by your manos or forearms. Place a foam roll underneath one leg on the quadriceps, and Mantén the foot off of the suelo. Make sure to relax the leg as much as possible. This will be your starting posición.
Shifting as much peso onto the leg to be stretched as is tolerable, roll over the foam from above the knee to below the hip, holding points of tension for 10-30 seconds. Cambia sides.

name: Quick Leap
instructions: You will need a box for this exerise.
