Begin facing the box standing 1-2 feet from its edge.
By utilizing your hips, hop onto the box, landing on both piernas. Ensure that you land with your piernas bent and your feet flat.
Immediately upon landing, fully extend through the entire cuerpo and swing your brazos overhead to explode off of the box. Use your piernas to absorb the impact of landing.

name: Rack Delivery
instructions: This drill teaches the delivery of the barra to the rack posición on the shoulders. Begin holding a bar in the scarecrow posición, with the upper brazos parallel to the suelo, and the forearms hanging down. Use a hook grip, with your fingers wrapped over your thumbs.

Begin by rotating the elbows around the bar, delivering the bar to the shoulders. As your elbows come forward, relax your grip. The shoulders should be protracted, providing a shelf for the bar, which should lightly contact the throat.

It is important that the bar stay close to the cuerpo at all times, as with a heavier load any distance will result in an unwanted collision. As the movement becomes smoother, speed and load can be increased before progressing further.

name: Rack Pull with con Bandas
instructions: Set up in a power rack with the bar on the pins. The pins should be set to the desired point; just below the rodillas, just above, or in the mid thigh posición. Attach bands to the base of the rack, or secure them with mancuernas. Attach the other end to the bar. You may need to choke the bands to provide tension.

posición yourself against the bar in proper deadlifting posición. Your feet should be under your hips, your grip shoulder width, back arched, and hips back to engage the hamstrings. Since the peso is typically heavy, you may use a mixed grip, a hook grip, or use straps to aid in holding the peso.

With your head looking forward, extend through the hips and rodillas, pulling the peso up and back until lockout. Be sure to Tira your shoulders back as you complete the movement. Regresa the peso to the pins and Repite.

name: Rack Pulls
instructions: Set up in a power rack with the bar on the pins. The pins should be set to the desired point; just below the rodillas, just above, or in the mid thigh posición. posición yourself against the bar in proper deadlifting posición. Your feet should be under your hips, your grip shoulder width, back arched, and hips back to engage the hamstrings. Since the peso is typically heavy, you may use a mixed grip, a hook grip, or use straps to aid in holding the peso.
With your head looking forward, extend through the hips and rodillas, pulling the peso up and back until lockout. Be sure to Tira your shoulders back as you complete the movement.
Regresa the peso to the pins and Repite.

name: Rear Leg Raises
instructions: Place yourself on your manos rodillas on an exercise mat. Your head should be looking forward and the bend of the rodillas should create a 90-degree angle between the hamstrings and the calves. This will be your starting posición.
Extend one leg up and behind you. The knee and hip should both extend. Repite for 5-10 repetitions, and then Cambia sides.

name: Recumbent Bike
instructions: To begin, seat yourself on the bike and adjust the seat to your height.

Selecciona the desired option from the menu. You may have to start pedaling to turn it on. You can use the manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to use. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. The level of resistance can be changed throughout the workout. The handles can be used to monitor your heart rate to help you stay at an appropriate intensity.

Recumbent bikes offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and have less impact than other activities. A 150 lb person will burn about 230 calories cycling at a moderate rate for 30 minutes, compared to 450 calories or more running.

name: Return Push from Stance
instructions: You will need a partner for this drill.
Begin in an athletic 2 or 3 point stance.
At the signal, move into a posición to receive the pass from your partner.
Catch the medicine ball with both manos and immediately throw it back to your partner.
You can modify this drill by running different routes.

name: Reverse con Banda Bench Press
instructions: posición a Banco inside a power rack, with the bar set to the correct height. Begin by anchoring bands either to band pegs or to the top of the rack. Ensure that you will be posición properly under the bands. Attach the other end to the barra.

Lie on the Banco, tuck your feet underneath you and arch your back. Using the bar to help support your peso, Levanta your shoulder off the Banco and retract them, squeezing the shoulder blades together. Use your feet to drive your traps into the Banco. Maintain this tight cuerpo posición throughout the movement. However wide your grip, it should cover the ring on the bar.

Tira the bar out of the rack without protracting your shoulders. Focus on squeezing the bar and trying to Tira it apart. Baja the bar to your Baja chest or upper stomach. The bar, wrist, and elbow should stay in line at all times.
Pause when the barra touches your torso, and then drive the bar up with as much force as possible. The elbows should be tucked in until lockout.

name: Reverse con Banda Box Squat
instructions: Begin in a power rack with a box at the appropriate height behind you. Set up the bands either on band pegs or attached to the top of the rack, ensuring they will be directly above the bar during the Sentadilla. Attach the other end to the bar.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wider for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings, or closer together for more quad development. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Pause when you reach the box, and relax the hip flexors. Never bounce off of a box.

Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward off of the box as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe. Use care to Regresa the barra to the rack.

name: Reverse con Banda Deadlift
instructions: Set the bar up in a power rack. Attach bands to the top of the rack, using either bands pegs or the frame itself. Attach the other end of the bands to the bar.

Approach the bar so that it is centered over your feet. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hip to grip the bar at shoulder width, allowing your shoulder blades to protract. Typically, you would use an overhand grip or an over/under grip on heavier sets.

With your feet, and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and bend the rodillas until your shins contact the bar. Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward.
After the bar passes the rodillas, aggressively Tira the bar back, pulling your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward into the bar.
Baja the bar by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Reverse con Banda Power Squat
instructions: Begin in a power rack with the pins and bar set at the appropriate height. After loading the bar, attach bands to the top of the rack, using either pegs or the frame itself. Attach the other end of the bands to the bar.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wide for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings.

Mantén your head facing forward. With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips as much as possible. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Baja bar posición necessitates a greater torso lean to Mantén the bar over the heels. Continue until you break parallel, which is defined as the crease of the hip being in line with the top of the knee.

Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe, until you have returned to the starting posición.

name: Reverse con Banda Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Begin with a bar loaded on the suelo inside of a power rack. Attach bands to the top of the rack, using either pegs or the frame itself. Attach the other end to the barra.

Approach the bar so that the bar intersects the middle of the feet. The feet should be set very wide, near the collars. Bend at the hips to grip the bar. The brazos should be directly below the shoulders, inside the piernas, and you can use a pronated grip, a mixed grip, or hook grip. Relax the shoulders, which in effect lengthens your brazos.

Take a breath, and then Baja your hips, looking forward with your head with your chest up. Drive through the suelo, spreading your feet apart, with your peso on the back half of your feet. Extend through the hips and rodillas.
As the bar passes through the rodillas, lean back and drive the hips into the bar, pulling your shoulder blades together.
Regresa the peso to the suelo by bending at the hips and controlling the peso on the way down.

name: Reverse con Barra Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding a barra at shoulder width with the elbows close to the torso. The palm of your manos should be facing down (pronated grip). This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse con Barra Preacher Curls
instructions: Grab an EZ-bar using a shoulder width and palms down (pronated) grip.
Now place the upper part of both brazos on top of the preacher Banco and have your brazos extended. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala, use the biceps to Curl the peso up until your biceps are fully contracted and the barra is at shoulder height. Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the barra until your upper brazos are extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse en Cable Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding a bar attachment that is attached to a low pulley using a pronated (palms down) and shoulder width grip. Make sure also that you Mantén the elbows close to the torso. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo with your piernas fully extended and brazos to the side of your torso with the palms on the suelo. Your brazos should be stationary for the entire exercise.
Move your piernas up so that your thighs are perpendicular to the suelo and feet are together and parallel to the suelo. This is the starting posición.
While inhaling, move your piernas towards the torso as you roll your pelvis backwards and you raise your hips off the suelo. At the end of this movement your rodillas will be touching your chest.
Sostén the contraction for a second and move your piernas back to the starting posición while exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Flyes
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on an incline Banco with the chest and stomach pressing against the incline. Have the mancuernas in each hand with the palms facing each other (neutral grip).

Extend the brazos in front of you so that they are perpendicular to the angle of the Banco. The piernas should be stationary while applying pressure with the ball of your toes. This is the starting posición.

Maintaining the slight bend of the elbows, move the weights out and away from each other (to the side) in an arc motion while exhaling. Tip: Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together to get the best results from this exercise.
The brazos should be elevated until they are parallel to the suelo.
Feel the contraction and Lentamente Baja the weights back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Flyes With External Rotation
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on an incline Banco set at a 30-degree angle with the chest and stomach pressing against the incline.

Have the mancuernas in each hand with the palms facing down to the suelo. Your brazos should be in front of you so that they are perpendicular to the angle of the Banco. Tip: Your elbows should have a slight bend. The piernas should be stationary while applying pressure with the ball of your toes (your heels should not be touching the suelo). This is the starting posición.
Maintaining the slight bend of the elbows, move the weights out and away from each other in an arc motion while exhaling.

As you Levanta the peso, your wrist should externally rotate by 90-degrees so that you go from a palms down (pronated) grip to a palms facing each other (neutral) grip. Tip: Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together to get the best results from this exercise.
The brazos should be elevated until they are level with the head.
Feel the contraction and Lentamente Baja the weights back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Grip Bent-Over Rows
instructions: Párate erect while holding a barra with a supinated grip (palms facing up).

Bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén the head up. The barra should hang directly in front of you as your brazos hang perpendicular to the suelo and your torso. This is your starting posición.

While keeping the torso stationary, Levanta the barra as you Respira out, keeping the elbows close to the cuerpo and not doing any force with the forearm other than holding the weights. On the top contracted posición, squeeze the back muscles and Sostén for a second.
Lentamente Baja the peso again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Grip Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Start by setting a bar attachment (straight or e-z) on a high pulley machine.

Facing the bar attachment, grab it with the palms facing up (supinated grip) at shoulder width. Baja the bar by using your lats until your brazos are fully extended by your sides. Tip: Elbows should be in by your sides and your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente elevate the bar attachment up as you Inhala so it is aligned with your chest. Only the forearms should move and the elbows/upper brazos should be stationary by your side at all times.
Then begin to Baja the cable bar back down to the original staring posición while exhaling and contracting the triceps hard.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Hyperextension
instructions: Place your feet between the pads after loading an appropriate peso. Lay on the top pad, allowing your hips to hang off the back, while grasping the handles to Sostén your posición.
To begin the movement, flex the hips, pulling the piernas forward.
Reverse the motion by extending the hips, kicking the leg back. It is very important not to over-extend the hip on this movement, stopping short of your full range of motion.
Regresa by again flexing the hip, pulling the carriage forward as far as you can.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Reverse Machine Flyes
instructions: Adjust the handles so that they are fully to the rear. Make an appropriate peso selection and adjust the seat height so the handles are at shoulder level. Grasp the handles with your manos facing inwards. This will be your starting posición.
In a semicircular motion, Tira your manos out to your side and back, contracting your rear delts.
Mantén your brazos slightly bent throughout the movement, with all of the motion occurring at the shoulder joint.
Pause at the rear of the movement, and Lentamente Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: Reverse Plate Curls
instructions: Start by standing straight with a weighted plate held by both manos and brazos fully extended. Use a pronated grip (palms facing down) and make sure your fingers grab the rough side of the plate while your thumb grabs the smooth side. Note: For the best results, grab the weighted plate at an 11:00 and 1:00 o'clock posición.
Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other and the weighted plate should be near the groin area. This is the starting posición.

Lentamente Levanta the plate up while keeping the elbows in and the upper brazos stationary until your biceps and forearms touch while exhaling. The plate should be evenly aligned with your torso at this point.
Feel the contraction for a second and begin to Baja the peso back down to the starting posición while inhaling
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Reverse Triceps Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat Banco. Using a close, supinated grip (around shoulder width), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked extended in front of you and perpendicular to the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your middle chest. Tip: Make sure that as opposed to a regular Banco Press, you Mantén the elbows close to the torso at all times in order to maximize triceps involvement.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your triceps muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Rhomboids-SMR
instructions: Lay down with your back on the suelo. Place a foam roll underneath your upper back, and cross your brazos in front of you, protracting your shoulders. This will be your starting posición.
Raise your hips off of the suelo, placing your peso onto the foam roll. Shift your peso to one side at a time, rolling over your middle and upper back. Pause at points of tension for 10-30 seconds.

name: Rickshaw Carry
instructions: posición the frame at the starting point, and load with the appropriate peso. Standing in the center of the frame, begin by gripping the handles and driving through your heels to Levanta the frame. Ensure your chest and head are up and your back is straight.

Immediately begin walking briskly with quick, controlled steps. Mantén your chest up and head forward, and make sure you continue breathing. Bring the frame to the suelo after you have reached the end point.

name: Rickshaw Deadlift
instructions: Load the frame with the desired peso. Center yourself between the handles. You feet should be about hip width apart. Bend at the hips to grip the handles, allowing your shoulder blades to protract.

With your feet and your grip set, take a big breath and then Baja your hips and flex the rodillas. Look forward with your head, Mantén your chest up and your back arched, and begin driving through the heels to move the peso upward. As the peso comes up, Tira your shoulder blades together as you drive your hips forward.
Baja the peso by bending at the hips and guiding it to the suelo.

name: Ring Dips
instructions: Grip a ring in each hand, and then take a small jump to help you get into the starting posición with your brazos locked out.
Begin by flexing the elbow, lowering your cuerpo until your brazos break 90 degrees. Avoid swinging, and maintain good posture throughout the descent.
Reverse the motion by extending the elbow, pushing yourself back up into the starting posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Rocket Jump
instructions: Begin in a relaxed stance with your feet shoulder width apart and Sostén your brazos close to the cuerpo.
To initiate the move, Sentadilla down halfway and explode back up as high as possible.
Fully extend your entire cuerpo, reaching overhead as far as possible. As you land, absorb your impact through the piernas.

name: Rocking Standing Calf Raise
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place it on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck).
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance. Also maintain a straight back and Mantén the rodillas with a slight bend; never locked. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your heels as you Respira out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending (other than the slight initial bend we created during positioning) at any time. Sostén the contracted posición by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Now Levanta your toes by contracting the tibia muscles in the front of the calves as you Respira out.
Sostén for a second and bring them back down as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Rocky Pull-Ups/Pulldowns
instructions: Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms facing forward using a wide grip.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

Tira your torso up until the bar touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second on the contracted posición, start to Inhala and Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched.

Now Repite the same movements as described above except this time your torso will remain straight as you go up and the bar will touch the back of the neck instead of the upper chest. Tip: Use the head to lean forward slightly as it will help you properly execute this portion of the exercise.
Once you have lowered yourself back down to the starting posición, Repite the exercise for the prescribed amount of repetitions in your program.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Put a barra in front of you on the suelo and grab it using a pronated (palms facing down) grip that a little wider than shoulder width. Tip: Depending on the peso used, you may need wrist wraps to perform the exercise and also a raised platform in order to allow for better range of motion.
Bend the rodillas slightly and Mantén the shins vertical, hips back and back straight. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your back and brazos completely straight at all times, use your hips to Levanta the bar as you Exhala. Tip: The movement should not be fast but steady and under control.

Once you are standing completely straight up, Baja the bar by pushing the hips back, only slightly bending the rodillas, unlike when squatting. Tip: Take a deep breath at the start of the movement and Mantén your chest up. Sostén your breath as you Baja and Exhala as you complete the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Romanian Deadlift from Deficit
instructions: Begin standing while holding a bar at arm's length in front of you. You can Párate on a raised platform to increase the range of motion.

Begin by flexing the rodillas slightly, and then flex at the hip, moving your butt back as far as possible, lowering the torso as far as flexibility allows. The back should remain in absolute Extensión at all times, and the bar should remain in contact with the piernas. If done properly, there should be heavy tension felt in the hamstrings.
Reverse the motion to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Rope Climb
instructions: Grab the rope with both manos above your head. Tira down on the rope as you take a small jump.
Wrap the rope around one leg, using your feet to pinch the rope. Reach up as high as possible with your brazos, gripping the rope tightly.
Release the rope from your feet as you Tira yourself up with your brazos, bringing your rodillas towards your chest.
Resecure your feet on the rope, and then Párate up to take another high Sostén on the rope. Continue until you reach the top of the rope.
To Baja yourself, loosen the grip of your feet on the rope as you slide down using a hand over hand motion.

name: Rope Crunch
instructions: Kneel 1-2 feet in front of a cable system with a rope attached.
After selecting an appropriate peso, grasp the rope with both manos reaching overhead. Your torso should be upright in the starting posición.
To begin, flex at the spine, attempting to bring your rib cage to your piernas as you Tira the cable down.
Pause at the bottom of the motion, and then Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.
These can be done with twists or to the side to hit the obliques.

name: Rope Jumping
instructions: Sostén an end of the rope in each hand. posición the rope behind you on the suelo. Raise your brazos up and turn the rope over your head bringing it down in front of you. When it reaches the suelo, jump over it. Find a good turning pace that can be maintained. Different speeds and techniques can be used to introduce variation.
Rope jumping is exciting, challenges your coordination, and requires a lot of energy. A 150 lb person will burn about 350 calories jumping rope for 30 minutes, compared to over 450 calories running.

name: Rope Straight-Arm Pulldown
instructions: Attach a rope to a high pulley and make your peso selection. Párate a couple feet back from the pulley with your feet staggered and take the rope with both manos. Lean forward from the hip, keeping your back straight, with your brazos extended up in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your brazos straight, extend the shoulder to Tira the rope down to your thighs.
Pause at the bottom of the motion, squeezing your lats.
Regresa to the starting posición without allowing the peso to fully rest on the stack.

name: Round The World Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Párate up straight with your piernas together, holding a bodybar or broomstick.
Sostén the pole behind your hips with a wider than shoulder width grip. Your palms should be down and your thumbs facing out.
Lentamente Levanta your brazos up behind your head. Don't force it if it gets hard to Levanta further.

name: Rowing, Stationary
instructions: To begin, seat yourself on the rower. Make sure that your heels are resting comfortably against the base of the foot pedals and that the straps are secured. Selecciona the program that you wish to use, if applicable. Siéntate up straight and bend forward at the hips.

There are three phases of movement when using a rower. The first phase is when you come forward on the rower. Your rodillas are bent and against your chest. Your upper cuerpo is leaning slightly forward while still maintaining good posture. Next, Empuja against the foot pedals and extend your piernas while bringing your manos to your upper abdominal area, squeezing your shoulders back as you do so. To avoid straining your back, use primarily your leg and hip muscles.
The recovery phase simply involves straightening your brazos, bending the rodillas, and bringing your cuerpo forward again as you transition back into the first phase.

name: Runner's Stretch
instructions: It's easiest to get into this stretch if you start standing up, put one leg behind you, and Lentamente Baja your torso down to the suelo.
Mantén the front heel on the suelo (if it lifts up, scoot your other leg further back).

Place your manos on either side of your front leg. To get more out of this stretch, Empuja your butt up toward the ceiling, and then gradually Baja it back toward the suelo. You'll Stretch the hip flexor of the back leg and the hamstring and buttocks of the front.

name: Running, Treadmill
instructions: To begin, step onto the treadmill and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. Most treadmills have a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. Elevation can be adjusted to change the intensity of the workout.

Treadmills offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and usually have less impact than running outside. A 150 lb person will burn over 450 calories running 8 miles per hour for 30 minutes. Maintain proper posture as you run, and only Sostén onto the handles when necessary, such as when dismounting or checking your heart rate.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner Sostén them. Your piernas should be bent at the rodillas.

Elevate your upper cuerpo so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Your brazos should be fully extended in front of you perpendicular to your torso and with the manos clasped. This is the starting posición.
Twist your torso to the right side until your brazos are parallel with the suelo while breathing out.
Sostén the contraction for a second and move back to the starting posición while breathing out. Now move to the opposite side performing the same techniques you applied to the right side.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Sandbag Load
instructions: To load sandbags or other objects, begin with the implements placed a distance from the loading platform, typically 50 feet.

Begin by lifting the sandbag. Sandbags are extremely awkward, and the manner of lifting them can vary depending on the particular sandbag used. Reach as far around it as possible, extending through the hips and rodillas to Tira it up high. Shouldering is usually not allowed.
Move as quickly as possible to the platform, and load it, extending through your hips, rodillas, and ankles to get it as high as possible. Place it onto the platform, ensuring it doesn't fall off.
Regresa to the starting posición to retrieve the next sandbag, and Repite until the event is completed.

name: Scapular Pull-Up
instructions: Take a pronated grip on a Tira-up bar.
From a hanging posición, raise yourself a few inches without using your brazos. Do this by depressing your shoulder girdle in a reverse shrugging motion.
Pause at the completion of the movement, and then Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición before performing more repetitions.

name: Scissor Kick
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate with your back pressed against the suelo or on an exercise mat (optional). Your brazos should be fully extended to the sides with your palms facing down. Note: The brazos should be stationary the entire time.
With a slight bend at the rodillas, Levanta your piernas up so that your heels are about 6 inches off the suelo. This is the starting posición.
Now Levanta your left leg up to about a 45 degree angle while your right leg is lowered until the heel is about 2-3 inches from the suelo.
Cambia movements by raising your right leg up and lowering your left leg. Remember to Respira while performing this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Scissors Jump
instructions: Assume a Zancada stance posición with one foot forward with the knee bent, and the rear knee nearly touching the suelo.
Ensure that the front knee is over the midline of the foot. Extending through both piernas, jump as high as possible, swinging your brazos to gain Levanta.
As you jump as high as you can, Cambia the posición of your piernas, moving your front leg to the back and the rear leg to the front.
As you land, absorb the impact through the piernas by adopting the Zancada posición, and Repite.

name: Seated con Banda Hamstring Curl
instructions: Secure a band close to the suelo and place a Banco a couple feet away from it.
Seat yourself on the Banco and secure the band behind your ankles, beginning with your piernas straight. This will be your starting posición.
Flex the rodillas, bringing your feet towards the Banco. You may need to lean back slightly to Mantén your feet from striking the suelo.
Pause at the completion of the movement, and then Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Seated con Barra Military Press
instructions: Siéntate on a Military Press Banco with a bar behind your head and either have a spotter give you the bar (better on the rotator cuff this way) or pick it up yourself carefully with a pronated grip (palms facing forward). Tip: Your grip should be wider than shoulder width and it should create a 90-degree angle between the forearm and the upper arm as the barra goes down.

Once you pick up the barra with the correct grip length, Levanta the bar up over your head by locking your brazos. Sostén at about shoulder level and slightly in front of your head. This is your starting posición.
Baja the bar down to the collarbone Lentamente as you Inhala.
Levanta the bar back up to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated con Barra Twist
instructions: Start out by sitting at the end of a flat Banco with a barra placed on top of your thighs. Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other.

Grip the bar with your palms facing down and make sure your manos are wider than shoulder width apart from each other. Begin to Levanta the barra up over your head until your brazos are fully extended.
Now Baja the barra behind your head until it is resting along the base of your neck. This is the starting posición.

While keeping your feet and head stationary, move your waist from side to side so that your oblique muscles feel the contraction. Only move from side to side as far as your waist will allow you to go. Stretching or moving too far can cause an injury to occur. Tip: Use a slow and controlled motion.
Remember to Respira out while twisting your cuerpo to the side and in when moving back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Bent-Over One-Arm con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: Siéntate down at the end of a flat Banco with a dumbbell in one arm using a neutral grip (palms of the hand facing you).
Bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Make sure that you Mantén the head up.

The upper arm with the dumbbell should be close to the torso and aligned with it (lifted up until it is parallel to the suelo while the forearms are pointing towards the suelo as the manos Sostén the weights). Tip: There should be a 90-degree angle between the forearms and the upper arm. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the upper arm stationary, use the triceps to Levanta the peso as you Exhala until the forearm is parallel to the suelo and the whole arm is extended. Like many other arm exercises, only the forearm moves.
After a second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the dumbbell back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Seated Bent-Over Rear Delt Raise
instructions: Place a couple of mancuernas looking forward in front of a flat Banco.
Siéntate on the end of the Banco with your piernas together and the mancuernas behind your calves.
Bend at the waist while keeping the back straight in order to pick up the mancuernas. The palms of your manos should be facing each other as you pick them. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your torso forward and stationary, and the brazos slightly bent at the elbows, Levanta the mancuernas straight to the side until both brazos are parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you Levanta the weights. (Note: avoid swinging the torso or bringing the brazos back as opposed to the side.)
After a one second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Bent-Over Two-Arm con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: Siéntate down at the end of a flat Banco with a dumbbell in both brazos using a neutral grip (palms of the hand facing you).
Bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Make sure that you Mantén the head up.

The upper brazos with the mancuernas should be close to the torso and aligned with it (lifted up until they are parallel to the suelo while the forearms are pointing towards the suelo as the manos Sostén the weights). Tip: There should be a 90-degree angle between the forearms and the upper arm. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the upper brazos stationary, use the triceps to Levanta the peso as you Exhala until the forearms are parallel to the suelo and the whole arm is extended. Like many other arm exercises, only the forearm moves.
After a second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Biceps
instructions: Siéntate on the suelo with your rodillas bent and your partner standing behind you. Extend your brazos straight behind you with your palms facing each other. Your partner will Sostén your wrists for you. This will be the starting posición.
Attempt to flex your elbows, while your partner prevents any actual movement.

After 10-20 seconds, relax your brazos while your partner gently pulls your wrists up to stretch your biceps. Be sure to let your partner know when the stretch is appropriate to prevent injury or overstretching.

name: Seated en Cable Rows
instructions: For this exercise you will need access to a low pulley Remo machine with a V-bar. Note: The V-bar will enable you to have a neutral grip where the palms of your manos face each other. To get into the starting posición, first Siéntate down on the machine and place your feet on the front platform or crossbar provided making sure that your rodillas are slightly bent and not locked.
Lean over as you Mantén the natural alignment of your back and grab the V-bar handles.

With your brazos extended Tira back until your torso is at a 90-degree angle from your piernas. Your back should be slightly arched and your chest should be sticking out. You should be feeling a nice stretch on your lats as you Sostén the bar in front of you. This is the starting posición of the exercise.

Keeping the torso stationary, Tira the handles back towards your torso while keeping the brazos close to it until you touch the abdominals. Respira out as you perform that movement. At that point you should be squeezing your back muscles hard. Sostén that contraction for a second and Lentamente go back to the original posición while breathing in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated en Cable Shoulder Press
instructions: Adjust the peso to an appropriate amount and be seated, grasping the handles. Your upper brazos should be about 90 degrees to the cuerpo, with your head and chest up. The elbows should also be bent to about 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by extending through the elbow, pressing the handles together above your head.
After pausing at the top, Regresa the handles to the starting posición. Ensure that you maintain tension on the cables.
You can also execute this movement with your back off the pad and alternate manos.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Siéntate on the machine and place your toes on the Baja portion of the platform provided with the heels extending off. Choose the toe positioning of your choice (forward, in, or out) as per the beginning of this chapter.

Place your Baja thighs under the lever pad, which will need to be adjusted according to the height of your thighs. Now place your manos on top of the lever pad in order to prevent it from slipping forward.
Levanta the lever slightly by pushing your heels up and release the safety bar. This will be your starting posición.
Lentamente Baja your heels by bending at the ankles until the calves are fully stretched. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Raise the heels by extending the ankles as high as possible as you contract the calves and Respira out. Sostén the top contraction for a second.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Calf Stretch
instructions: Siéntate up straight on an exercise mat.
Bend one knee and put that foot on the suelo to stabilize the torso.
Straighten your other leg and flex your ankle.
Using a band, towel, or your hand if you can reach, Tira the toes toward you. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds, then Cambia sides.

name: Seated Close-Grip Concentration con Barra Curl
instructions: Siéntate down on a flat Banco with a barra or E-Z Bar in front of you in between your piernas. Your piernas should be spread with the rodillas bent and the feet on the suelo.

Use your brazos to pick the barra up and place the back of your upper brazos on top of your inner thighs (around three and a half inches away from the front of the knee). A supinated grip closer than shoulder width is needed to perform this exercise. Tip: Your arm should be extended at brazos length and the barra should be above the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the barra back to starting posición as your Respira in. Tip: Avoid swinging motions at any time.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated con Mancuerna Curl
instructions: Siéntate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell on each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Rotate the palms of the manos so that they are facing your torso. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the weights and start twisting the wrists once the mancuernas pass your thighs so that the palms of your manos face forward at the end of the movement. Make sure that you contract the biceps as you Respira out and make sure that only the forearms move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to the starting posición as your Respira in and as you rotate the wrists back to a neutral grip.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated con Mancuerna Inner Biceps Curl
instructions: Siéntate on the end of a flat Banco with a dumbbell in each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Rotate the palms of the manos so that they are facing inward in a neutral posición. This will be your starting posición.
While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the mancuernas out and up, turning the palms out as you Levanta and keeping your forearms in line with your outer deltoids. Tips:

Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to the starting posición as your Respira in. Remember to rotate your brazos as you Baja the mancuernas so that you can Cambia back to a neutral grip.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated con Mancuerna Palms-Down Wrist Curl
instructions: Start out by placing two mancuernas on the suelo in front of a flat Banco.
Siéntate down on the edge of the flat Banco with your piernas at about shoulder width apart. Make sure to Mantén your feet on the suelo.

Use your brazos to grab both of the mancuernas and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against your thighs with the palms of the manos facing down. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge of your thighs.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.

Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling. Make sure to Inhala during this part of the exercise. Tip: Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
When finished, simply Baja the mancuernas to the suelo.

name: Seated con Mancuerna Palms-Up Wrist Curl
instructions: Start out by placing two mancuernas on the suelo in front of a flat Banco.
Siéntate down on the edge of the flat Banco with your piernas at about shoulder width apart. Make sure to Mantén your feet on the suelo.

Use your brazos to grab both of the mancuernas and bring them up so that your forearms are resting against your thighs with the palms of the manos facing up. Your wrists should be hanging over the edge of your thighs.
Start out by curling your wrist upwards and exhaling.

Lentamente Baja your wrists back down to the starting posición while inhaling. Make sure to Inhala during this part of the exercise. Tip: Your forearms should be stationary as your wrist is the only movement needed to perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
When finished, simply Baja the mancuernas to the suelo.

name: Seated con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Grab a couple of mancuernas and Siéntate on a military Press Banco or a utility Banco that has a back support on it as you place the mancuernas upright on top of your thighs.
Clean the mancuernas up one at a time by using your thighs to bring the mancuernas up to shoulder height at each side.
Rotate the wrists so that the palms of your manos are facing forward. This is your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Empuja the mancuernas up until they touch at the top.
After a second pause, Lentamente come down back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Flat Bench Leg Pull-In
instructions: Siéntate on a Banco with the piernas stretched out in front of you slightly below parallel and your brazos holding on to the sides of the Banco. Your torso should be leaning backwards around a 45-degree angle from the Banco. This will be your starting posición.
Bring the rodillas in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Respira out as you perform this movement.
After a second pause, go back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Floor Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Siéntate on a mat with your right leg extended in front of you and your left leg bent with your foot against your right inner thigh.
Lean forward from your hips and reach for your ankle until you feel a stretch in your hamstring. Sostén for 15 seconds, then Repite for your other side.

name: Seated Front Deltoid
instructions: Siéntate upright on the suelo with your piernas bent, your partner standing behind you. Stick your brazos straight out to your sides, with your palms facing the suelo. Attempt to move them as far behind you as possible, as your assistant holds your wrists. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your elbows straight, attempt to move your brazos to the front, with your partner gently restraining you to prevent any actual movement for 10-20 seconds.
Now, relax your muscles and allow your partner to gently increase the stretch on the shoulders and chest. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds.

name: Seated Glute
instructions: In a seated posición with your rodillas bent, cross one ankle over the opposite knee. Your partner will Párate behind you. Now, lean forward as your partner braces your shoulders with their manos. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to Empuja your torso back for 10-20 seconds, as your partner prevents any actual movement of your torso.
Now relax your muscles as your partner increases the stretch by gently pushing your torso forward for 10-20 seconds.

name: Seated Good Mornings
instructions: Set up a box in a power rack. The pins should be set at an appropriate height. Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders, not on top of your traps. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders.

Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back. Mantén your head facing forward. With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the bar tight, bend forward at the hips as much as possible. If you set the pins to what would be parallel, you not only have a safety if you fail, but know when to stop.
Pause just above the pins and reverse the motion until your torso it upright.

name: Seated Hamstring
instructions: In a seated posición with your piernas extended, have your partner Párate behind you. Now, lean forward as your partner braces your shoulders with their manos. This will be your starting posición.
Attempt to Empuja your torso back for 10-20 seconds, as your partner prevents any actual movement of your torso.
Now relax your muscles as your partner increases the stretch by gently pushing your torso forward for 10-20 seconds.

name: Seated Hamstring and Calf Stretch
instructions: Loop a belt, rope, or band around one foot. Siéntate down with both piernas extended . This will be your starting posición.
Leaning forward slightly, Tira on the belt to draw the toes of your foot back. Sostén this posición for 10-20 seconds and then Repite with the other leg.

name: Seated Head Harness Neck Resistance
instructions: Place a neck strap on the suelo at the end of a flat Banco. Once you have selected the weights, Siéntate at the end of the flat Banco with your feet wider than shoulder width apart from each other. Your toes should be pointed out.

Lentamente move your torso forward until it is almost parallel with the suelo. Using both manos, securely posición the neck strap around your head. Tip: Make sure the weights are still lying on the suelo to prevent any strain on the neck. Now grab the peso with both manos while elevating your torso back until it is almost perpendicular to the suelo. Note: Your head and torso needs to be slightly tilted forward to perform this exercise.
Now place both manos on top of your rodillas. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente Baja your neck down until your chin touches the upper part of your chest while breathing in.
While exhaling, bring your neck back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Adjust the machine lever to fit your height and Siéntate on the machine with your back against the back support pad.

Place the back of Baja leg on top of padded lever (just a few inches under the calves) and secure the lap pad against your thighs, just above the rodillas. Then grasp the side handles on the machine as you point your toes straight (or you can also use any of the other two stances) and ensure that the piernas are fully straight right in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Tira the machine lever as far as possible to the back of your thighs by flexing at the rodillas. Mantén your torso stationary at all times. Sostén the contracted posición for a second.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Leg Tucks
instructions: Siéntate on a Banco with the piernas stretched out in front of you slightly below parallel and your brazos holding on to the sides of the Banco. Your torso should be leaning backwards around a 45-degree angle from the Banco. This will be your starting posición.
Bring the rodillas in toward you as you move your torso closer to them at the same time. Respira out as you perform this movement.
After a second pause, go back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated One-Arm con Mancuerna Palms-Down Wrist Curl
instructions: Siéntate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in your right hand.
Place your feet flat on the suelo, at a distance that is slightly wider than shoulder width apart.

Lean forward and place your right forearm on top of your upper right thigh with your palm down. Tip: Make sure that the back of the wrist lies on top of your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the dumbbell as far as possible as you Mantén a tight grip on the dumbbell. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Now Curl the dumbbell as high as possible as you contract the forearms and as you Exhala. Mantén the contraction for a second before you Baja again. Tip: The only movement should happen at the wrist.
Perform for the recommended amount of repetitions, Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: Seated One-Arm con Mancuerna Palms-Up Wrist Curl
instructions: Siéntate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in your right hand.
Place your feet flat on the suelo, at a distance that is slightly wider than shoulder width apart.

Lean forward and place your right forearm on top of your upper right thigh with your palm up. Tip: Make sure that the front of the wrist lies on top of your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the dumbbell as far as possible as you Mantén a tight grip on the dumbbell. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Now Curl the dumbbell as high as possible as you contract the forearms and as you Exhala. Mantén the contraction for a second before you Baja again. Tip: The only movement should happen at the wrist.
Perform for the recommended amount of repetitions, Cambia brazos and Repite the movement.

name: Seated One-arm en Cable Pulley Rows
instructions: To get into the starting posición, first Siéntate down on the machine and place your feet on the front platform or crossbar provided making sure that your rodillas are slightly bent and not locked.
Lean over as you Mantén the natural alignment of your back and grab the single handle attachment with your left arm using a palms-down grip.

With your arm extended Tira back until your torso is at a 90-degree angle from your piernas. Your back should be slightly arched and your chest should be sticking out. You should be feeling a nice stretch on your lat as you Sostén the bar in front of you. The right arm can be kept by the waist. This is the starting posición of the exercise.

Keeping the torso stationary, Tira the handles back towards your torso while keeping the brazos close to it as you rotate the wrist, so that by the time your hand is by your abdominals it is in a neutral posición (palms facing the torso). Respira out as you perform that movement. At that point you should be squeezing your back muscles hard.

Sostén that contraction for a second and Lentamente go back to the original posición while breathing in. Tip: Remember to rotate the wrist as you go back to the starting posición so that the palms are facing down again.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions and then perform the same movement with the right hand.

name: Seated Overhead Stretch
instructions: Siéntate up straight on an exercise mat.
Touch the soles of your feet together with your feet six to eight inches in front of your hips.
Place one hand on the suelo beside you and your other hand behind your head.
Levanta your elbow to the ceiling as you incline your torso to the other side. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds, then Cambia sides.

name: Seated Palm-Up con Barra Wrist Curl
instructions: Sostén a barra with both manos and your palms facing up; manos spaced about shoulder width.
Place your feet flat on the suelo, at a distance that is slightly wider than shoulder width apart.
Lean forward and place your forearms on top of your upper thighs with your palms up. Tip: Make sure that the front of the wrists lay on top of your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the bar as far as possible while inhaling and keeping a tight grip.
Now Curl bar up as high as possible while flexing the forearms and exhaling. Sostén the contraction at the top for a second and Tip: Only the wrist should move.

name: Seated Palms-Down con Barra Wrist Curl
instructions: Sostén a barra with both manos and your palms facing down; manos spaced about shoulder width.
Place your feet flat on the suelo, at a distance that is slightly wider than shoulder width apart.
Lean forward and place your forearms on top of your upper thighs with your palms down. Tip: Make sure that the back of the wrists lay on top of your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the bar as far as possible while inhaling and keeping a tight grip.
Now Curl bar up as high as possible while flexing the forearms and exhaling. Sostén the contraction at the top for a second and Tip: Only the wrist should move.

name: Seated Side Lateral Raise
instructions: Pick a couple of mancuernas and Siéntate at the end of a flat Banco with your feet firmly on the suelo. Sostén the mancuernas with your palms facing in and your brazos straight down at your sides at brazos' length. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso stationary (no swinging), Levanta the mancuernas to your side with a slight bend on the elbow and the manos slightly tilted forward as if pouring water in a glass. Continue to go up until you brazos are parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this movement and pause for a second at the top.
Baja the mancuernas back down Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Triceps Press
instructions: Siéntate down on a Banco with back support and grasp a dumbbell with both manos and Sostén it overhead at arm's length. Tip: a better way is to have somebody hand it to you especially if it is very heavy. The resistance should be resting in the palms of your manos with your thumbs around it. The palm of the hand should be facing inward. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your upper brazos close to your head (elbows in) and perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semi-circular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Tip: The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the dumbbell. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Seated Two-Arm Palms-Up Low-Pulley Wrist Curl
instructions: Put a Banco in front of a low pulley machine that has a barra or EZ Curl attachment on it.
Move the Banco far enough away so that when you bring the handle to the top of your thighs tension is created on the cable due to the peso stack being moved up.
Now Sostén the handle with both manos, palms up, using a shoulder-width grip.
Step back and Siéntate on the Banco with your feet about shoulder width apart, firmly on the suelo.
Lean forward and place the forearms on your thighs with the back of your wrists over your rodillas. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the bar as far as possible, while inhaling and keeping a tight grip.
Now Curl the bar up as high as possible while contracting the forearms. Tip: Only the wrist should move; not the forearms.
After a second contraction at the top go back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: See-Saw Press (Alternating Side Press)
instructions: Grab a dumbbell with each hand and Párate up erect.

Clean (Levanta) the mancuernas to the chest/shoulder level and then rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing towards you as if you were getting ready to perform an Arnold Press. This will be your starting posición.

Now start extending your left arm overhead as you rotate the wrist so that the palm of your hand faces forward as you go up. Your elbows should come out also as you Levanta the peso. Simultaneously, you will also be bending from your hip to your opposite side. Tip: If you perform the exercise correctly, is should look as if you are trying to reach for something overhead on the right hand side of your cuerpo, but with your left arm. Respira out as you perform this movement.
Once you reach the top posición Respira in. Then, with the peso fully extended overhead and you bent over to your right hand side, begin the movement to the left side.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Shotgun Row
instructions: Attach a single handle to a low cable.
After selecting the correct peso, Párate a couple feet back with a wide-split stance. Your arm should be extended and your shoulder forward. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by retracting the shoulder and flexing the elbow. As you Tira, supinate the wrist, turning the palm upward as you go.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Shoulder Circles
instructions: With shoulders relaxed and brazos resting loosely at your sides (or in your lap if you're seated), gently roll your shoulders forward, up, back, and down.
Reverse direction. You can do this exercise alternating shoulders or both at the same time.

name: Shoulder Press - With con Bandas
instructions: To begin, Párate on an exercise band so that tension begins at arm's length. Grasp the handles and Levanta them so that the manos are at shoulder height at each side.
Rotate the wrists so that the palms of your manos are facing forward. Your elbows should be bent, with the upper brazos and forearms in line to the torso. This is your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Levanta the handles up until your brazos are fully extended overhead.

name: Shoulder Raise
instructions: Relax your brazos to your sides and raise your shoulders up toward your ears, then back down.

name: Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Reach your left arm across your cuerpo and Sostén it straight.

name: Side-Lying Floor Stretch
instructions: First lie on your left side, bending your left knee in front of you to stabilize your torso (use your abdominal muscles as well to Sostén you upright).

Straighten your right leg and rest the right foot on the suelo behind your left. Straighten your right arm over your head and gently Tira on your right wrist to stretch the entire right side of the cuerpo. Cambia sides.

name: Side Hop-Sprint
instructions: Párate to the side of a cone or hurdle.
Begin this drill by hopping sideways over the obstacle, rebounding out of your landing to hop back to where you started.
Hop for a prescribed number or repetitions as quickly as possible, and finish this drill by sprinting a short distance upon landing the last hop.

name: Side Lateral Raise
instructions: Pick a couple of mancuernas and Párate with a straight torso and the mancuernas by your side at brazos length with the palms of the hand facing you. This will be your starting posición.

While maintaining the torso in a stationary posición (no swinging), Levanta the mancuernas to your side with a slight bend on the elbow and the manos slightly tilted forward as if pouring water in a glass. Continue to go up until you brazos are parallel to the suelo. Exhala as you execute this movement and pause for a second at the top.
Baja the mancuernas back down Lentamente to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Side Laterals to Front Raise
instructions: In a standing posición, Sostén a pair of mancuernas at your side. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your elbows slightly bent, raise the weights directly in front of you to shoulder height, avoiding any swinging or cheating.
At the top of the exercise move the weights out in front of you, keeping your brazos extended.
Baja the weights with a controlled motion.
On the next repetition, raise the weights in front of you to shoulder height before moving the weights laterally to your sides.
Baja the weights to the starting posición.

name: Side Leg Raises
instructions: Párate next to a chair, which you may Sostén onto as a support. Párate on one leg. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your leg straight, raise it as far out to the side as possible, and swing it back down, allowing it to cross the opposite leg.
Repite this swinging motion 5-10 times, increasing the range of motion as you do so.

name: Side Lying Groin Stretch
instructions: Start off by lying on your right side and bend your right knee in front of you to stabilize the torso.
Rest your head on your right hand or shoulder. Levanta your left leg upward and Sostén it by the back of the knee (easier) or the foot (harder).
Tira your left knee in toward your left shoulder and simultaneously Press your foot or knee down to the suelo. To intensify this stretch, straighten your left leg. Cambia sides.

name: Side Neck Stretch
instructions: Start with your shoulders relaxed, gently tilt your head towards your shoulder.
Assist stretch with a gentle Tira on the side of the head.

name: Side Standing Long Jump
instructions: Begin standing with your feet hip width apart in an athletic stance. Your head and chest should be up, rodillas and hips slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.
Leaning to your right, extend through your hips, rodillas, and ankles to jump into the air. Block with the brazos to lead the movement, jumping as far to your right as you can.
Land facing the same direction with your feet hip width apart, absorbing the impact through your Baja cuerpo.

name: Side To Side Chins
instructions: Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms facing forward using a wide grip.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at a wide grip, bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

Tira your torso up while leaning to the left hand side until the bar almost touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space (no swinging) and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second of contraction, Inhala as you go back to the starting posición.

Now, Tira your torso up while leaning to the right hand side until the bar almost touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second of contraction, Inhala as you go back to the starting posición.
Repite steps 3-6 until you have performed the prescribed amount of repetitions for each side.

name: Side Wrist Pull
instructions: This stretch works best standing. Cross your left arm over the midline of your cuerpo and Sostén the left wrist in your right hand down at the level of your hips. Start the stretch with a bent left arm.

Lentamente straighten, Tira, and Levanta it up to shoulder height, as pictured. Feel this stretch originate in your back, not your shoulders, and don't Tira too hard on the shoulders joint. Cambia sides.

name: Side to Side Box Shuffle
instructions: Párate to one side of the box with your left foot resting on the middle of it.
To begin, jump up and over to the other side of the box, landing with your right foot on top of the box and your left foot on the suelo. Swing your brazos to aid your movement.
Continue shuffling back and forth across the box.

name: Single-Arm en Cable Crossover
instructions: Begin by moving the pulleys to the high posición, Selecciona the resistance to be used, and take a handle in each hand.

Step forward in front of both pulleys with your brazos extended in front of you, bringing your manos together. Your head and chest should be up as you lean forward, while your feet should be staggered. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your left arm in place, allow your right arm to extend out to the side, maintaining a slight bend at the elbow. The right arm should be perpendicular to the cuerpo at approximately shoulder level.
Regresa your arm back to the starting posición by pulling your hand back to the midline of the cuerpo.
Sostén for a second at the starting posición and Repite the movement on the opposite side. Continue alternating back and forth for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: Single-Arm Linear Jammer
instructions: posición a bar into a landmine or securely anchor it in a corner. Load the bar to an appropriate peso.
Raise the bar from the suelo, taking it to your shoulders with one or both manos. Adopt a wide stance. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by extending the elbow, pressing the peso up. Move explosively, extending the hips and rodillas fully to produce maximal force.
Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Single-Arm Push-Up
instructions: Begin laying prone on the suelo. Move yourself into a posición supporting your peso on your toes and one arm. Your working arm should be placed directly under the shoulder, fully extended. Your piernas should be extended, and for this movement you may need a wider base, placing your feet further apart than in a normal Empuja-up.
Maintain good posture, and place your free hand behind your back. This will be your starting posición.
Baja yourself by allowing the elbow to flex until you touch the suelo.
Descend Lentamente, and reverse direction be extending the arm to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Single-Cone Sprint Drill
instructions: This drill teaches quick foot action. You need a single cone. Begin standing next to the cone with one arm back and one arm forward.
Chop the feet as quickly as possible, blocking with the brazos. Circle the cone, Mantén your rodillas up, with violent foot action.
Rest after three trips around the cone.

name: Single-Leg High Box Squat
instructions: posición a box in a rack. Secure a band or rope in place above the box.
Standing in front of it, step onto the box to a full standing posición, letting your other leg remain unsupported. Sostén onto the band for balance
. Continue stepping up and down on the same leg before switching to the opposite side.

name: Single-Leg Hop Progression
instructions: Arrange a line of cones in front of you. Assume a relaxed standing posición, balanced on one leg. Raise the knee of your opposite leg. This will be your starting posición.
Hop forward, jumping and landing with the same leg over the cone.
Use a countermovement jump to hop from cone to cone.
At the end, turn around and go back on the other leg.

name: Single-Leg Lateral Hop
instructions: Párate to the side of a cone or hurdle. To get into the start posición, Párate on one leg with your knee slightly bent.
To begin, execute a counterjump to hop sideways over the cone.
Land on your jumping leg, and immediately rebound out of it by jumping back to the start posición.
Continue hopping back and forth.

name: Single-Leg Leg Extension
instructions: Seat yourself in the machine and adjust it so that you are positioned properly. The pad should be against the Baja part of the shin but not in contact with the ankle. Adjust the seat so that the pivot point is in line with your knee. Selecciona a peso appropriate for your abilities.
Maintaining good posture, fully extend one leg, pausing at the top of the motion.
Regresa to the starting posición without letting the peso stop, keeping tension on the muscle.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Single-Leg Stride Jump
instructions: Párate to the side of a box with your inside foot on top of it, close to the edge.
Begin by swinging the brazos upward as you Empuja through the top leg, jumping upward as high as possible. Attempt to drive the opposite knee upward.
Land in the same posición that you started, using your inside leg to decelerate the impact.

name: Single con Mancuerna Raise
instructions: With a wide stance, Sostén a dumbell with both manos, grasping the head of the dumbbell instead of the handle. Your brazos should be extended and hanging at the waist. This will be your starting posición.
Raise the peso until it is above shoulder level, keeping your brazos extended. Your torso and hips should remain stationary throughout the movement.
Regresa to the starting posición and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Single Leg Butt Kick
instructions: Begin by standing on one leg, with the bent knee raised. This will be your start posición.
Using a countermovement jump, take off upward by extending the hip, knee, and ankle of the grounded leg.
Immediately flex the knee and attempt to touch your butt with the heel of your jumping leg.
Regresa the leg to a partially bent posición underneath the hips and land. Your opposite leg should stay in relatively the same posición throughout the drill.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: Lay on the suelo with your feet flat and rodillas bent.
Raise one leg off of the suelo, pulling the knee to your chest. This will be your starting posición.
Execute the movement by driving through the heel, extending your hip upward and raising your glutes off of the suelo.
Extend as far as possible, pause and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Single Leg Push-off
instructions: Párate on the suelo with one foot resting on the box, heel close to the edge.
Empuja off with your foot on top of the box, trying to gain as much height as possible by extending through the hip and knee.
Land with the same foot on top of the box, returning your other foot back to the start posición.

name: Sit-Up
instructions: Recuéstate on the suelo placing your feet either under something that will not move or by having a partner Sostén them. Your piernas should be bent at the rodillas.
Place your manos behind your head and lock them together by clasping your fingers. This is the starting posición.
Elevate your upper cuerpo so that it creates an imaginary V-shape with your thighs. Respira out when performing this part of the exercise.
Once you feel the contraction for a second, Baja your upper cuerpo back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Sit Squats
instructions: Párate with your feet shoulder width apart. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing your rodillas and hips, sitting back with your hips.
Continue until you have squatted a portion of the way down, but are above parallel, and quickly reverse the motion until you Regresa to the starting posición. Repite for 5-10 repetitions.

name: Skating
instructions: Roller skating is a fun activity which can be effective in improving cardiorespiratory fitness and muscular endurance. It requires relatively good balance and coordination. It is necessary to learn the basics of skating including turning and stopping and to wear protective gear to avoid possible injury.

You can skate at a comfortable pace for 30 minutes straight. If you want a cardio challenge, do interval skating — speed skate two minutes of every five minutes, using the remaining three minutes to recover. A 150 lb person will typically burn about 175 calories in 30 minutes skating at a comfortable pace, similar to brisk walking.

name: Sled Drag - Harness
instructions: To begin, load the sled with the desired peso and attach the pulling strap. You can Tira with handles, use a harness, or attach the pulling strap to a peso belt.
Whether pulling forwards or backwards, lean in the direction of travel and progress by extending through the hips and rodillas.

name: Sled Overhead Backward Walk
instructions: Attach dual handles to a sled connected by a rope or chain. Load the sled to a light peso.
Face the sled, backing up until there is some tension in the line. Sostén your manos directly above your head with your elbows extended. This will be your starting posición.
Walk backwards, keeping your brazos raised above your head. Avoid jerky movements.

name: Sled Overhead Triceps Extension
instructions: Attach dual handles to a sled using a chain or rope. Load the sled to an appropriate load.

Facing away from the sled, step away until there is tension in the line. Raise your manos above your head, keeping them together, palms facing each other. Your elbows should be pointed upward with the elbows flexed. This will be your starting posición.
Extend through the elbow to straighten the arm. Ensure that your upper arm stays in posición to isolate the triceps.
Upon full Extensión, step forward to take the slack out of the line. You may Mantén your feet staggered for more stability.

name: Sled Push
