instructions: Load your pushing sled with the desired peso.

Take an athletic posture, leaning into the sled with your brazos fully extended, grasping the handles. Empuja the sled as fast as possible, focusing on extending your hips and rodillas to strengthen your posterior chain.

name: Sled Reverse Flye
instructions: Attach dual handles to a sled connected by a rope or chain. Load the sled to a light peso.

Face the sled, backing up until there is some tension in the line. Take both handles at brazos length at about waist level. Bend the rodillas slightly and Mantén your chest and head up. This will be your starting posición.
Without flexing the elbow, Tira the handles upward and apart, performing a reverse Aperturas with some external rotation. Your palms should be facing forward as you do this.
Regresa to the starting posición, taking a couple steps back to take the slack out of the line.

name: Sled Row
instructions: Attach dual handles to a sled connected by a rope or chain. Load the sled to an appropriate peso. Face the sled, backing up until there is some tension in the line.
With a handle in each hand, bend the rodillas slightly, Mantén your head and chest up, and begin with your brazos extended.
To initiate the movement, flex the elbow as you retract your shoulder blades, pulling the sled towards you.
Take a step or two back to get tension in the line and Repite.

name: Sledgehammer Swings
instructions: You will need a tire and a sledgehammer for this exercise. Párate in front of the tire about two feet away from it with a staggered stance. Grip the sledgehammer.
If you are right handed, your left hand should be at the bottom of the handle, and your right hand should be choking up closer to the head.

As you bring the sledge up, your right hand slides toward the head; as you swing down, your right hand will slide down to join your left hand. Slam it down as hard as you can against the tire. Control the bounce of the hammer off of the tire.
Repite on the other side.

name: Smith Incline Shoulder Raise
instructions: Place an incline Banco underneath the smith machine. Place the barra at a height that you can reach when lying down and your brazos are almost fully extended. Once the peso you need is selected, Recuéstate on the incline Banco and make sure your shoulders are aligned right under the barra.
Using a shoulder width pronated (palms forward) grip, Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with a slight bend at the elbows. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira out, Levanta the bar up until your brazos are fully extended. Note: The contraction should be felt around the shoulders.
After a second pause, bring the bar back down to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Smith Machine Behind the Back Shrug
instructions: With the bar at thigh level, load an appropriate peso.

Párate with the bar behind you, taking a shoulder-width, pronated grip on the bar and unhook the peso. You should be standing up straight with your head and chest up and your brazos extended. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by shrugging your shoulders straight up. Do not flex the brazos or wrist during the movement.
After a brief pause Regresa the peso to the starting posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions before engaging the hooks to rack the peso.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
instructions: Place a flat Banco underneath the smith machine. Now place the barra at a height that you can reach when lying down and your brazos are almost fully extended. Once the peso you need is selected, Recuéstate on the flat Banco. Using a pronated grip that is wider than shoulder width, unlock the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your middle chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, lock the bar back in the rack.

name: Smith Machine Bent Over Row
instructions: Set the barra attached to the smith machine to a height that is about 2 inches below your rodillas.

Bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Tip: Make sure that you Mantén the head up.

Now grasp the barra using an overhand (pronated) grip and unlock it from the smith machine rack. Then let it hang directly in front of you as your brazos hang extended perpendicular to the suelo and your torso. This is your starting posición.

While keeping the torso stationary, Levanta the barra as you Respira out, keeping the elbows close to the cuerpo and not doing any force with the forearm other than holding the weights. On the top contracted posición, squeeze the back muscles and Sostén for a second.
Lentamente Baja the peso again to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Calf Raise
instructions: Place a block or peso plate below the bar on the Smith machine. Set the bar to a posición that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step onto the plates with the balls of your feet and place the bar on the back of your shoulders.
Take the bar with both manos facing forward. Rotate the bar to unrack it. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your heels as high as possible by pushing off of the balls of your feet, flexing your calf at the top of the contraction. Your rodillas should remain extended. Sostén the contracted posición for a second before you start to go back down.
Regresa Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in while lowering your heels.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Place a flat Banco underneath the smith machine. Place the barra at a height that you can reach when lying down and your brazos are almost fully extended. Once the peso you need is selected, Recuéstate on the flat Banco. Using a close and pronated grip (palms facing forward) that is around shoulder width, unlock the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.

As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your middle chest. Tip: Make sure that as opposed to a regular Banco Press, you Mantén the elbows close to the torso at all times in order to maximize triceps involvement.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your triceps muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, lock the bar back in the rack.

name: Smith Machine Decline Press
instructions: posición a decline Banco in the rack so that the bar will be above your chest. Load an appropriate peso and take your place on the Banco.
Rotate the bar to unhook it from the rack and fully extend your brazos. Your back should be slightly arched and your shoulder blades retracted. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing your brazos, lowering the bar to your chest.
Pause briefly, and then extend your brazos to Empuja the peso back to the starting posición.
After completing the desired number of repetitions, rotate the bar to rack the peso.

name: Smith Machine Hang Power Clean
instructions: posición the bar at knee height and load it to an appropriate peso.

Take a pronated grip on the bar outside of shoulder width and unhook the bar from the machine. Your brazos should be fully extended with your head and chest up. Your elbows should be pointed out with your shoulders back and down. Your hips should be back, loading the tension into the hamstrings. This will be your starting posición.
Initate the movement by forcefully extending the hips and rodillas, accelerating into the bar. Ensure that you Mantén your brazos straight during this part of the motion.
Upon full Extensión, rebend the hips and rodillas to Baja your receiving posición.
Allow the brazos to flex at this point, rotating the elbows around the bar to receive it on your shoulders.
Extend through the hips and rodillas to come to a standing posición with the bar racked on your shoulders to complete the movement.

name: Smith Machine Hip Raise
instructions: posición a Banco in the rack and load the bar to an appropriate peso. Recuéstate on the Banco, placing the bottom of your feet against the bar. Unlock the bar and extend your piernas. You may need to use your manos to assist you. For added stability grasp the sides of the Smith Machine. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by rotating your pelvis, flexing your spine to raise your hips off of the Banco. Maintain a slight bend in the rodillas throughout the motion.
After a brief pause, Regresa the hips to the Banco.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Incline Bench Press
instructions: Place an incline Banco underneath the smith machine. Place the barra at a height that you can reach when lying down and your brazos are almost fully extended. Once the peso you need is selected, Recuéstate on the incline Banco and make sure your upper chest is aligned with the barra. Using a pronated grip (palms facing forward) that is wider than shoulder width, unlock the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your upper chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
When you are done, place the bar back in the rack.

name: Smith Machine Leg Press
instructions: posición a Smith machine bar a couple feet off of the suelo. Ensure that it is resting on the safeties. After loading the bar to an appropriate peso, lie underneath the bar. Place the middle of your feet on the bar, tucking your rodillas to your chest. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by driving through your feet to move the bar upward, extending the hips and rodillas. Do not lock out your rodillas.
At the top of the motion, pause briefly before returning to the starting posición.

name: Smith Machine One-Arm Upright Row
instructions: With the bar at thigh level, load an appropriate peso.

Take a wide grip on the bar and unhook the peso, removing your off hand from the bar. Your arm should be extended as you Párate up straight with your head and chest up. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing the elbow, raising the upper arm with the elbow pointed out. Continue until your upper arm is parallel to the suelo.
After a brief pause, Regresa the peso to the starting posición.
Repite for the desired number of repetitions before engaging the hooks to rack the peso.

name: Smith Machine Overhead Shoulder Press
instructions: To begin, place a flat Banco (or preferably one with back support) underneath a smith machine. posición the barra at a height so that when seated on the flat Banco, the brazos must be almost fully extended to reach the barra.

Once you have the correct height, Siéntate slightly in behind the barra so that there is an imaginary straight line from the tip of your nose to the barra. Your feet should be stationary. Grab the barra with the palms facing forward, unlock it and Levanta it up so that your brazos are fully extended. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente begin to Baja the barra until it is level with your chin while inhaling.
Then Levanta the barra back to the starting posición using your shoulders while exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Pistol Squat
instructions: To begin, first set the bar to a posición that best matches your height. Step under it and posición the bar across the back of your shoulders.
Take the bar with your manos facing forward, unlock it and Levanta it off the rack by extending your piernas. 3

Move one foot forward about 12 inches in front of the bar. Extend the other leg out in front of you, holding it off the suelo. Look forward at all times and maintain a neutral or slightly arched spine. This will be your starting posición.
Maintaining good posture, Baja yourself by flexing the knee and hip, going down as far as flexibility allows.
Pause briefly at the bottom and then Regresa to the starting posición by driving through the heel of your foot, extending the knee and hip.

name: Smith Machine Reverse Calf Raises
instructions: Adjust the barra on the smith machine to fit your height and align a raised platform right under the bar.
Párate on the platform with the heels of your feet secured on top of it with the balls of your feet extending off it. posición your toes facing forward with a shoulder width stance.

Now, place your shoulders under the barra while maintaining the foot positioning described and Empuja the barra up by extending your hips and rodillas until your torso is standing erect. The rodillas should be kept with a slight bend; never locked. This will be your starting posición. Tip: The barra on your back is only for balance purposes.

Raise the balls of your feet as you Respira out by extending your toes as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Sostén the contracted posición for a second before you start to go back down.
Lentamente go back down to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering the balls of your feet and toes.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: To begin, first set the bar on the height that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side (palms facing forward), unlock it and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Stiff-Legged Deadlift
instructions: To begin, set the bar on the smith machine to a height that is around the middle of your thighs. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, grasp the bar using a pronated (palms forward) grip that is shoulder width apart. You may need some wrist wraps if using a significant amount of peso.

Levanta the bar up by fully extending your brazos while keeping your back straight. Párate with your torso straight and your piernas spaced using a shoulder width or narrower stance. The rodillas should be slightly bent. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the rodillas stationary, Baja the barra to over the top of your feet by bending at the waist while keeping your back straight. Mantén moving forward as if you were going to pick something from the suelo until you feel a stretch on the hamstrings. Exhala as you perform this movement

Start bringing your torso up straight again as soon as you feel the hamstrings stretch by extending your hips and waist until you are back at the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Machine Upright Row
instructions: To begin, set the bar on the smith machine to a height that is around the middle of your thighs. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, grasp the bar using a pronated (palms forward) grip that is shoulder width apart. You may need some wrist wraps if using a significant amount of peso.
Levanta the barra up and fully extend your brazos with your back straight. There should be a slight bend at the elbows. This is the starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the bar as you Exhala. The bar should be close to the cuerpo as you move it up. Continue to Levanta it until it nearly touches your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the bar, your elbows should always be higher than your forearms. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the bar back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Smith Single-Leg Split Squat
instructions: To begin, place a flat Banco 2-3 feet behind the smith machine. Then, set the bar on the height that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side (palms facing forward), unlock it and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.
posición your piernas by placing one foot slightly forward under the bar and extending your other leg back and place the top of your foot on the Banco. This will be your starting posición

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the knee as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calf becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the knee should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your knee is past that imaginary line (if it is past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot mainly as you straighten your leg again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia piernas and Repite the movement.

name: Snatch
instructions: Place your feet at a shoulder width stance with the barra resting right above the connection between the toes and the rest of the foot.

With a palms facing down grip, bend at the rodillas and keeping the back flat grab the bar using a wider than shoulder width grip. Bring the hips down and make sure that your cuerpo drops as if you were going to Siéntate on a chair. This will be your starting posición.
Start pushing the suelo as if it were a moving platform with your feet and simultaneously start lifting the barra keeping it close to your piernas.
As the bar reaches the middle of your thighs, Empuja the suelo with your piernas and Levanta your cuerpo to a complete Extensión in an explosive motion.
Levanta your shoulders back in a shrugging movement as you bring the bar up while lifting your elbows out to the side and keeping them above the bar for as long as possible.

Now in a very quick but powerful motion, you have to get your cuerpo under the barra when it has reached a high enough point where it can be controlled and drop while locking your brazos and holding the barra overhead as you assume a Sentadilla posición.

Finalize the movement by rising up out of the Sentadilla posición to finish the Levanta. At the end of the Levanta both feet should be on line and the brazos fully extended holding the barra overhead.

name: Snatch Balance
instructions: Begin with the feet in the pulling posición, the bar racked across the back of the shoulders, and the manos placed in a wide snatch grip.
Pop the bar with an abrupt dip and drive of the rodillas, and aggressively drive under the bar, transitioning the feet into the receiving posición.
Receive the bar locked out overhead near the bottom of the Sentadilla. The torso should remain vertical, lowering the hips between the piernas.
Continue to descend to full depth, and Regresa to a standing posición. Carefully Baja the peso.

name: Snatch Deadlift
instructions: The snatch Peso Muerto strengthens the first Tira of the snatch. Begin with a wide snatch grip with the barra placed on the platform. The feet should be directly under the hips, with the feet turned out. Sentadilla down to the bar, keeping the back in absolute Extensión with the head facing forward.
Initiate the movement by driving through the heels, raising the hips. The back angle should remain the same until the bar passes the rodillas.
At that point, drive your hips through the bar as you lay back. Regresa the bar to the platform by reversing the motion.

name: Snatch Pull
instructions: With a barra on the suelo close to the shins, take a wide snatch grip. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight. Move the peso with control as you continue to above the rodillas.

Next comes the second Tira, the main source of acceleration for the Tira. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips. In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward.

There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso; at the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back. Full Extensión should be violent and abrupt, and ensure that you do not prolong the Extensión for longer than necessary.

name: Snatch Shrug
instructions: Begin with a wide grip, with the bar hanging at the mid thigh posición. You can use a hook or overhand grip. Your back should be straight and inclined slightly forward.
Shrug your shoulders towards your ears. While this exercise can usually by loaded with heavier peso than a snatch, avoid overloading to the point that the execution slows down.

name: Snatch from Blocks
instructions: Begin with a loaded barra on boxes or stands of the desired height. A wide grip should be taken on the bar. The feet should be directly below the hips, with the feet turned out as needed. Baja the hips, with the chest up and the head looking forward. The shoulders should be just in front of the bar, with the elbows pointed out. This will be the starting posición.
Begin the first Tira by driving through the front of the heels, raising the bar from the boxes.

Transition into the second Tira by extending through the hips rodillas and ankles, driving the bar up as quickly as possible. The bar should be close to the cuerpo. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, forcefully Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. The feet should move to just outside the hips, turned out as necessary. Receive the bar with your cuerpo as low as possible and the brazos fully extended overhead.
Keeping the bar aligned over the front of the heels, your head and chest up, drive through heels of the feet to move to a standing posición. Carefully Regresa the peso to the boxes.

name: Speed con Banda Overhead Triceps
instructions: For this exercise anchor a band to the suelo. We used an incline Banco and anchored the band to the base, standing over the Banco. Alternatively, this could be performed standing on the band.
To begin, Tira the band behind your head, holding it with a pronated grip and your elbows up. This will be your starting posición.
To perform the movement, extend through the elbow to to straighten your brazos, ensuring that you Mantén your upper arm in place.
Pause, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Speed Box Squat
instructions: Attach bands to the bar that are securely anchored near the suelo. You may need to choke the bands to get adequate tension.

Use a box of an appropriate height for this exercise. Load the bar to a peso that still requires effort, but isn't so heavy that speed is compromised. Typically, that will be between 50-70% of your one rep max.
posición the bar on your upper back, shoulder blades retracted, back arched and everything tight head to toe. This will be the starting posición.
Unrack the bar and posición yourself in front of the box. Siéntate back with your hips until you are seated on the box, ensuring that you descend under control and don't crash onto the surface.
Pause briefly, and explode off of the box, extending through the hips and rodillas.

name: Speed Squats
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.

Begin to raise the bar as fast as possible without involving momentum as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición. Note: You should perform these exercises as fast as possible but without breaking perfect form and without involving momentum.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Spell Caster
instructions: Sostén a dumbbell in each hand with a pronated grip. Your feet should be wide with your hips and rodillas extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by pulling both of the mancuernas to one side next to your hip, rotating your torso.
Keeping your brazos straight and the mancuernas parallel to the suelo, rotate your torso to swing the weights to your opposite side.
Continue alternating, rotating from one side to the other until the set is complete.

name: Spider Crawl
instructions: Begin in a prone posición on the suelo. Support your peso on your manos and toes, with your feet together and your cuerpo straight. Your brazos should be bent to 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement by raising one foot off of the suelo. Externally rotate the leg and bring the knee toward your elbow, as far forward as possible.
Regresa this leg to the starting posición and Repite on the opposite side.

name: Spider Curl
instructions: Start out by setting the bar on the part of the preacher Banco that you would normally Siéntate on. Make sure to align the barra properly so that it is balanced and will not fall off.

Move to the front side of the preacher Banco (the part where the brazos usually lay) and posición yourself to lay at a 45 degree slant with your torso and stomach pressed against the front side of the preacher Banco.
Make sure that your feet (especially the toes) are well positioned on the suelo and place your upper brazos on top of the pad located on the inside part of the preacher Banco.
Use your brazos to grab the barra with a supinated grip (palms facing up) at about shoulder width apart or slightly closer from each other.
Lentamente begin to Levanta the barra upwards and Exhala. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the barra back to the starting posición as your Respira in. .
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Spinal Stretch
instructions: Siéntate in a chair so your back is straight and your feet planted on the suelo.
Interlace your fingers behind your head, elbows out and your chin down.
Twist your upper cuerpo to one side about 3 times as far as you can. Then lean forward and twist your torso to reach your elbow to the suelo on the inside of your knee.
Regresa to upright posición and then Repite for your other side.

name: Split Clean
instructions: With a barra on the suelo close to the shins, take an overhand grip just outside the piernas. Baja your hips with the peso focused on the heels, back straight, head facing forward, chest up, with your shoulders just in front of the bar. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the first Tira by driving through the heels, extending your rodillas. Your back angle should stay the same, and your brazos should remain straight. Move the peso with control as you continue to above the rodillas.

Next comes the second Tira, the main source of acceleration for the clean. As the bar approaches the mid-thigh posición, begin extending through the hips. In a jumping motion, accelerate by extending the hips, rodillas, and ankles, using speed to move the bar upward. There should be no need to actively Tira through the brazos to accelerate the peso; at the end of the second Tira, the cuerpo should be fully extended, leaning slightly back, with the brazos still extended.

As full Extensión is achieved, transition into the third Tira by aggressively shrugging and flexing the brazos with the elbows up and out. At peak Extensión, aggressively Tira yourself down, rotating your elbows under the bar as you do so.

Receive the bar with the feet split, aggressively moving one foot forward and one foot back. The bar should be racked onto the protracted shoulders, lightly touching the throat with the manos relaxed. Continue to descend to the bottom posición, which will help in the recovery.
Immediately recover by driving through the heels, keeping the torso upright and elbows up. Bring the feet together as you Párate up.

name: Split Jerk
instructions: Standing with the peso racked on the front of the shoulders, begin with the dip. With your feet directly under your hips, flex the rodillas without moving the hips backward.

Go down only slightly, and reverse direction as powerfully as possible. Drive through the heels create as much speed and force as possible, and be sure to move your head out of the way as the bar leaves the shoulders. At this moment as the feet leave the suelo, the feet must be placed into the receiving posición as quickly as possible.

In the brief moment the feet are not actively driving against the platform, the athlete's effort to Empuja the bar up will drive them down. The feet should be moved to a split stance, one foot forward, one foot back, with the rodillas partially bent. Receive the bar with the brazos locked out overhead.
Regresa to a standing posición, bringing the feet together.

name: Split Jump
instructions: Assume a Zancada stance posición with one foot forward with the knee bent, and the rear knee nearly touching the suelo.
Ensure that the front knee is over the midline of the foot.
Extending through both piernas, jump as high as possible, swinging your brazos to gain Levanta.
As you jump, bring your feet together, and move them back to their initial positions as you land.
Absorb the impact by reverting back to the starting posición.

name: Split Snatch
instructions: Begin with a loaded barra on the suelo. The bar should be close to or touching the shins, and a wide grip should be taken on the bar. The feet should be directly below the hips, with the feet turned out as needed. Baja the hips, with the chest up and the head looking forward. The shoulders should be just in front of the bar. This will be the starting posición.
Begin the first Tira by driving through the front of the heels, raising the bar from the suelo. The back angle should stay the same until the bar passes the rodillas.

Transition into the second Tira by extending through the hips rodillas and ankles, driving the bar up as quickly as possible. The bar should be close to the cuerpo. At peak Extensión, shrug the shoulders and allow the elbows to flex to the side.

As you move your feet into the receiving posición, forcefully Tira yourself below the bar as you elevate the bar overhead. The feet should move forcefully to a split posición, one foot forward one foot back. Receive the bar with your cuerpo as low as possible and the brazos fully extended overhead.
Keeping the bar aligned over the front of the heels, your head and chest up, drive through heels of the feet to move to a standing posición, bringing your feet together.
Carefully Regresa the peso to suelo.

name: Split Squat with con Mancuernas
instructions: posición yourself into a staggered stance with the rear foot elevated and front foot forward.
Sostén a dumbbell in each hand, letting them hang at the sides. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by descending, flexing your knee and hip to Baja your cuerpo down. Maintain good posture througout the movement. Mantén the front knee in line with the foot as you perform the exercise.
At the bottom of the movement, drive through the heel to extend the knee and hip to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Split Squats
instructions: Being in a standing posición. Jump into a split leg posición, with one leg forward and one leg back, flexing the rodillas and lowering your hips slightly as you do so.
As you descend, immediately reverse direction, standing back up and jumping, reversing the posición of your piernas. Repite 5-10 times on each leg.

name: Squat Jerk
instructions: Standing with the peso racked on the front of the shoulders, begin with the dip. With your feet directly under your hips, flex the rodillas without moving the hips backward. Go down only slightly, and reverse direction as powerfully as possible. Drive through the heels create as much speed and force as possible, and be sure to move your head out of the way as the bar leaves the shoulders.

At this moment as the feet leave the suelo, the feet must be placed into the receiving posición as quickly as possible. In the brief moment the feet are not actively driving against the platform, the athlete's effort to Empuja the bar up will drive them down. The feet should move forcefully to just outside the hips, turned out as necessary. Receive the bar with your cuerpo in a full Sentadilla and the brazos fully extended overhead.
Keeping the bar aligned over the front of the heels, your head and chest up, drive throught heels of the feet to move to a standing posición. Carefully Regresa the peso to suelo.

name: Squat with con Bandas
instructions: Set up the bands on the sleeves, secured to either band pegs, the rack, or mancuernas so that there is appropriate tension.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wide for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips as much as possible. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Baja bar posición necessitates a greater torso lean to Mantén the bar over the heels. Continue until you break parallel, which is defined as the crease of the hip being in line with the top of the knee.

Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe, until you have returned to the starting posición.

name: Squat with Chains
instructions: To set up the chains, begin by looping the leader chain over the sleeves of the bar. The heavy chain should be attached using a snap hook. Adjust the length of the lead chain so that a few links are still on the suelo at the top of the movement.

Begin by stepping under the bar and placing it across the back of the shoulders. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and rotate your elbows forward, attempting to bend the bar across your shoulders. Remove the bar from the rack, creating a tight arch in your Baja back, and step back into posición. Place your feet wide for more emphasis on the back, glutes, adductors, and hamstrings. Mantén your head facing forward.

With your back, shoulders, and core tight, Empuja your rodillas and butt out and you begin your descent. Siéntate back with your hips as much as possible. Ideally, your shins should be perpendicular to the suelo. Baja bar posición necessitates a greater torso lean to Mantén the bar over the heels. Continue until you break parallel, which is defined as the crease of the hip being in line with the top of the knee.

Keeping the peso on your heels and pushing your feet and rodillas out, drive upward as you lead the movement with your head. Continue upward, maintaining tightness head to toe, until you have returned to the starting posición.

name: Squat with Plate Movers
instructions: To begin, first set the bar on a rack to just below shoulder level. posición a peso plate on the suelo a couple feet back from the rack. Once the bar is loaded, step under it and place the back of your shoulders across it.
Sostén on to the bar with both manos and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straighten your torso.
Step away from the rack and adopt a wide stance with the toes slightly pointed out, with one foot on the peso plate. Mantén your head up at all times. This will be your starting posición.
Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas and hips. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees.
Raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heels of your feet as you extend the hips and rodillas.
At the top of the movement, side step, bringing your feet together on the opposite side of the plate.
Using your inside foot, Empuja the peso plate, sliding it across the suelo to where you were just standing.
Place your inside foot on the peso plate, adopting a wide stance for the next repetition.

name: Squats - With con Bandas
instructions: To start out, make sure that the exercise band is at an even split between both the left and right side of the cuerpo. To do this, use your manos to grab both sides of the band and place both feet in the middle of the band. Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other.

When holding the bands, they should be the same height on each side. You should be using a pronated grip (palms facing forward) and have the handles of the bands next to your face for this exercise. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente start to bend the rodillas and Baja the piernas so that your thighs are parallel to the suelo while exhaling.
Use the heel of your feet to Empuja your cuerpo up to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Stairmaster
instructions: To begin, step onto the stairmaster and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. You can choose a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise.

Pump your piernas up and down in an established rhythm, driving the pedals down but not all the way to the suelo. It is recommended that you maintain your grip on the handles so that you don't fall. The handles can be used to monitor your heart rate to help you stay at an appropriate intensity.

Stairmasters offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and usually have less impact than running outside. They are typically much harder than other cardio equipment. A 150 lb person will typically burn over 300 calories in 30 minutes, compared to about 175 calories walking.

name: Standing Alternating con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Párate with a dumbbell in each hand. Raise the mancuernas to your shoulders with your palms facing forward and your elbows pointed out. This will be your starting posición.
Extend one arm to Press the dumbbell straight up, keeping your off hand in place. Do not lean or jerk the peso during the movement.
After a brief pause, Regresa the peso to the starting posición.
Repite for the opposite side, continuing to alternate between brazos.

name: Standing con Barra Calf Raise
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the bar on the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck).
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. The rodillas should be kept with a slight bend; never locked. This will be your starting posición. Tip: For better range of motion you may also place the ball of your feet on a wooden block but be careful as this option requires more balance and a sturdy block.

Raise your heels as you Respira out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Sostén the contracted posición by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing con Barra Press Behind Neck
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for easier pick up of the bar. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Your back should be kept straight while performing this exercise. This will be your starting posición.
Elevate the barra overhead by fully extending your brazos while breathing out.
Sostén the contraction for a second and Baja the barra back down to the starting posición by inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Bent-Over One-Arm con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: With a dumbbell in one hand and the palm facing your torso, bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Make sure that you Mantén the head up.

The upper arm should be close to the torso and parallel to the suelo while the forearm is pointing towards the suelo as the hand holds the peso. Tip: There should be a 90-degree angle between the forearm and the upper arm. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the upper brazos stationary, use the triceps to Levanta the weights as you Exhala until the forearms are parallel to the suelo and the whole arm is extended. Like many other arm exercises, only the forearm moves.
After a second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the dumbbell back to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Standing Bent-Over Two-Arm con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: With a dumbbell in each hand and the palms facing your torso, bend your rodillas slightly and bring your torso forward, by bending at the waist, while keeping the back straight until it is almost parallel to the suelo. Make sure that you Mantén the head up. The upper brazos should be close to the torso and parallel to the suelo while the forearms are pointing towards the suelo as the manos Sostén the weights. Tip: There should be a 90-degree angle between the forearms and the upper arm. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the upper brazos stationary, use the triceps to Levanta the weights as you Exhala until the forearms are parallel to the suelo and the whole brazos are extended. Like many other arm exercises, only the forearm moves.
After a second contraction at the top, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas back to their starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Biceps en Cable Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding a cable Curl bar that is attached to a low pulley. Grab the cable bar at shoulder width and Mantén the elbows close to the torso. The palm of your manos should be facing up (supinated grip). This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Lentamente begin to bring the Curl bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Biceps Stretch
instructions: Clasp your manos behind your back with your palms together, straighten brazos and then rotate them so your palms face downward.
Raise your brazos up and Sostén until you feel a stretch in your biceps.

name: Standing Bradford Press
instructions: Place a loaded bar at shoulder level in a rack. With a pronated grip at shoulder width, begin with the bar racked across the front of your shoulders. This is your starting posición.
Initiate the Levanta by extending the elbows to Press the bar overhead. Avoid locking out the elbow as you move the peso behind your head.
Baja the bar down to the back of the head until your elbow forms a right angle.
Levanta the bar back over your head by extending the elbows
Baja the bar down to the starting posición.
Alternate in this manner until you complete the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing en Cable Chest Press
instructions: posición dual pulleys to chest height and Selecciona an appropriate peso. Párate a foot or two in front of the cables, holding one in each hand. You can stagger your stance for better stability.
posición the upper arm at a 90 degree angle with the shoulder blades together. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping the rest of the cuerpo stationary, extend through the elbows to Press the handles forward, drawing them together in front of you.
Pause at the top of the motion, and Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Standing en Cable Lift
instructions: Connect a standard handle on a tower, and move the cable to the lowest pulley posición.

With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the peso on the cable. Your outstretched arm should be aligned with the cable.
With your feet positioned shoulder width apart, Sentadilla down and grab the handle with both manos. Your brazos should still be fully extended.
In one motion, Tira the handle up and across your cuerpo until your brazos are in a fully-extended posición above your head.
Mantén your back straight and your brazos close to your cuerpo as you pivot your back foot and straighten your piernas to get a full range of motion.
Retract your brazos and then your cuerpo. Regresa to the neutral posición in a slow and controlled manner.
Repite to failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: Standing en Cable Wood Chop
instructions: Connect a standard handle to a tower, and move the cable to the highest pulley posición.

With your side to the cable, grab the handle with one hand and step away from the tower. You should be approximately arm's length away from the pulley, with the tension of the peso on the cable. Your outstretched arm should be aligned with the cable.
With your feet positioned shoulder width apart, reach upward with your other hand and grab the handle with both manos. Your brazos should still be fully extended.
In one motion, Tira the handle down and across your cuerpo to your front knee while rotating your torso.
Mantén your back and brazos straight and core tight while you pivot your back foot and bend your rodillas to get a full range of motion.
Maintain your stance and straight brazos. Regresa to the neutral posición in a slow and controlled manner.
Repite to failure.
Then, reposition and Repite the same series of movements on the opposite side.

name: Standing Calf Raises
instructions: Adjust the padded lever of the calf raise machine to fit your height.

Place your shoulders under the pads provided and posición your toes facing forward (or using any of the two other positions described at the beginning of the chapter). The balls of your feet should be secured on top of the calf block with the heels extending off it. Empuja the lever up by extending your hips and rodillas until your torso is standing erect. The rodillas should be kept with a slight bend; never locked. Toes should be facing forward, outwards or inwards as described at the beginning of the chapter. This will be your starting posición.

Raise your heels as you Respira out by extending your ankles as high as possible and flexing your calf. Ensure that the knee is kept stationary at all times. There should be no bending at any time. Sostén the contracted posición by a second before you start to go back down.
Go back Lentamente to the starting posición as you Respira in by lowering your heels as you bend the ankles until calves are stretched.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Concentration Curl
instructions: Taking a dumbbell in your working hand, lean forward. Allow your working arm to hang perpendicular to the suelo with the elbow pointing out. This will be your starting posición.
Flex the elbow to Curl the peso, keeping the upper arm stationary. At the top of the repetition, flex the biceps and pause.
Baja the dumbbell back to the starting posición.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Calf Raise
instructions: Párate with your torso upright holding two mancuernas in your manos by your sides. Place the ball of the foot on a sturdy and stable wooden board (that is around 2-3 inches tall) while your heels extend off and touch the suelo. This will be your starting posición.

With the toes pointing either straight (to hit all parts equally), inwards (for emphasis on the outer head) or outwards (for emphasis on the inner head), raise the heels off the suelo as you Exhala by contracting the calves. Sostén the top contraction for a second.
As you Inhala, go back to the starting posición by Lentamente lowering the heels.
Repite for the recommended amount of times.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Standing with your feet shoulder width apart, take a dumbbell in each hand. Raise the mancuernas to head height, the elbows out and about 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Maintaining strict technique with no leg drive or leaning back, extend through the elbow to raise the weights together directly above your head.
Pause, and Lentamente Regresa the peso to the starting posición.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Reverse Curl
instructions: To begin, Párate straight with a dumbbell in each hand using a pronated grip (palms facing down). Your brazos should be fully extended while your feet are shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the muscle.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Straight-Arm Front Delt Raise Above Head
instructions: Sostén the mancuernas in front of your thighs, palms facing your thighs.
Mantén your brazos straight with a slight bend at the elbows but Mantén them locked. This will be your starting posición.
Raise the mancuernas in a semicircular motion to arm's length overhead as you Exhala.
Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición using the same path as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: To begin, Párate up with a dumbbell held by both manos. Your feet should be about shoulder width apart from each other. Lentamente use both manos to grab the dumbbell and Levanta it over your head until both brazos are fully extended.
The resistance should be resting in the palms of your manos with your thumbs around it. The palm of the manos should be facing up towards the ceiling. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your upper brazos close to your head with elbows in and perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Tip: The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the dumbbell. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing con Mancuerna Upright Row
instructions: Grasp a dumbbell in each hand with a pronated (palms forward) grip that is slightly less than shoulder width. The mancuernas should be resting on top of your thighs. Your brazos should be extended with a slight bend at the elbows and your back should be straight. This will be your starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the mancuernas as you Exhala. The mancuernas should be close to the cuerpo as you move it up and the elbows should drive the motion. Continue to Levanta them until they nearly touch your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the mancuernas, your elbows should always be higher than your forearms. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the mancuernas back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Elevated Quad Stretch
instructions: Start by standing with your back about two to three feet away from a Banco or step.
Levanta one leg behind you and rest your foot on the step,either on your instep or the ball of your foot, whichever you find most comfortable.
Mantén your supporting knee slightly bent and avoid letting that knee extend out beyond your toes. Cambia sides.

name: Standing Front con Barra Raise Over Head
instructions: To begin, Párate straight with a barra in your manos. You should grip the bar with palms facing down and a closer than shoulder width grip apart from each other.
Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. Your elbows should be slightly bent. This is the starting posición.
Levanta the barra up until it is directly over your head while exhaling. Make sure to Mantén your elbows slightly bent when performing each repetition.
Once you feel the contraction, begin to Baja the barra back down to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Gastrocnemius Calf Stretch
instructions: Place your right heel on a step with your knee extended and lean forward to grab your right toe with your right hand. Your left knee should be slightly bent and your back should be straight.
Support your peso on your left leg and place your left hand on your left thigh.
Tira your right toes toward your knee until you feel a stretch in your calf.

name: Standing Hamstring and Calf Stretch
instructions: Being by looping a belt, band, or rope around one foot. While standing, place that foot forward.
Bend your back leg, while keeping the front one straight. Now raise the toes of your front foot off of the suelo and lean forward.
Using the belt, Tira on the top of the foot to increase the stretch in the calf. Sostén for 10-20 seconds and Repite with the other foot.

name: Standing Hip Circles
instructions: Begin standing on one leg, holding to a vertical support.
Raise the unsupported knee to 90 degrees. This will be your starting posición.
Open the hip as far as possible, attempting to make a big circle with your knee.
Perform this movement Lentamente for a number of repetitions, and Repite on the other side.

name: Standing Hip Flexors
instructions: Párate up straight with the spine vertical, the left foot slightly in front of the right.

Bend both rodillas and Levanta the back heel off the suelo as you Press the right hip forward. You can't get a thorough, deep stretch in this posición, however, because it's hard to relax the hip flexor and Párate on it at the same time. Cambia sides.

name: Standing Inner-Biceps Curl
instructions: Párate up with a dumbbell in each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso. Your piernas should be at about shoulder's width apart from each other.
Rotate the palms of the manos so that they are facing inward in a neutral posición. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights out while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Your wrist should turn so that when the weights are fully elevated you have supinated grip (palms facing up).
Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level. Tip: Mantén the forearms aligned with your outer deltoids.
Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to the starting posición as your Respira in. Remember to rotate the wrists as you Baja the peso in order to Cambia back to a neutral grip.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Lateral Stretch
instructions: Take a slightly wider than hip distance stance with your rodillas slightly bent.
Place your right hand on your right hip to support the spine.
Raise your left arm in a vertical line and place your left hand behind your head. Mantén it there as you incline your torso to the right.
Mantén your peso evenly distributed between both piernas (don't lean into your left hip). Cambia sides.

name: Standing Leg Curl
instructions: Adjust the machine lever to fit your height and lie with your torso bent at the waist facing forward around 30-45 degrees (since an angled posición is more favorable for hamstrings recruitment) with the pad of the lever on the back of your right leg (just a few inches under the calves) and the front of the right leg on top of the machine pad.
Keeping the torso bent forward, ensure your leg is fully stretched and grab the side handles of the machine. posición your toes straight. This will be your starting posición.
As you Exhala, Curl your right leg up as far as possible without lifting the upper leg from the pad. Once you hit the fully contracted posición, Sostén it for a second.
As you Inhala, bring the piernas back to the initial posición. Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Perform the same exercise now for the left leg.

name: Standing Long Jump
instructions: This drill is best done in sand or other soft landing surface. Ensure that you are able to measure distance. Párate in a partial Sentadilla stance with feet shoulder width apart.
Utilizing a big arm swing and a countermovement of the piernas, jump forward as far as you can.
Attempt to land with your feet out in front you, reaching as far as possible with your piernas.
Measure the distance from your landing point to the starting point and track results.

name: Standing Low-Pulley Deltoid Raise
instructions: Start by standing to the right side of a low pulley Remo. Use your left hand to come across the cuerpo and grab a single handle attached to the low pulley with a pronated grip (palms facing down). Rest your arm in front of you. Your right hand should grab the machine for better support and balance.
Make sure that your back is erect and your feet are shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting posición.
Begin to use the left hand and come across your cuerpo out until it is elevated to shoulder height while exhaling.
Feel the contraction at the top for a second and begin to Lentamente Baja the handle back down to the original starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Standing Low-Pulley One-Arm Triceps Extension
instructions: Grab a single handle with your left arm next to the low pulley machine. Turn away from the machine keeping the handle to the side of your cuerpo with your arm fully extended. Now use both manos to elevate the single handle directly above the head with the palm facing forward. Mantén your upper arm completely vertical (perpendicular to the suelo) and put your right hand on your left elbow to help Mantén it steady. This is the starting posición.

Keeping your upper brazos close to your head (elbows in) and perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Tip: The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the single handle. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Standing Military Press
instructions: Start by placing a barra that is about chest high on a Sentadilla rack. Once you have selected the weights, grab the barra using a pronated (palms facing forward) grip. Make sure to grip the bar wider than shoulder width apart from each other.
Slightly bend the rodillas and place the barra on your collar bone. Levanta the barra up keeping it lying on your chest. Take a step back and posición your feet shoulder width apart from each other.

Once you pick up the barra with the correct grip length, Levanta the bar up over your head by locking your brazos. Sostén at about shoulder level and slightly in front of your head. This is your starting posición.
Baja the bar down to the collarbone Lentamente as you Inhala.
Levanta the bar back up to the starting posición as you Exhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Olympic Plate Hand Squeeze
instructions: To begin, Párate straight while holding a peso plate by the ridge at arm's length in each hand using a neutral grip (palms facing in). You feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. This will be your starting posición.
Baja the plates until the fingers are nearly extended but can still Sostén weights. Inhala as you Baja the plates.
Now raise the plates back to the starting posición as you Exhala by closing your manos.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

name: Standing One-Arm en Cable Curl
instructions: Start out by grabbing single handle next to the low pulley machine. Make sure you are far enough from the machine so that your arm is supporting the peso.

Make sure that your upper arm is stationary, perpendicular to the suelo with elbows in and palms facing forward. Your non lifting arm should be grabbing your waist. This will allow you to Mantén your balance.
Lentamente begin to Curl the single handle upwards while keeping the upper arm stationary until your forearm touches your bicep while exhaling. Tip: Only the forearm should move.
Sostén the contraction posición as you squeeze the bicep and then Baja the single handle back down to the starting posición as you Inhala.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos while performing this exercise.

name: Standing One-Arm con Mancuerna Curl Over Incline Bench
instructions: Párate on the back side of an incline Banco as if you were going to be a spotter for someone. Have a dumbbell in one hand and rest it across the incline Banco with a supinated (palms up) grip.

posición your non lifting hand at the corner or side of the incline Banco. The chest should be pressed against the top part of the incline and your feet should be pressed against the suelo at a wide stance. This is the starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the dumbbell upward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos while performing this exercise.

name: Standing One-Arm con Mancuerna Triceps Extension
instructions: To begin, Párate up with a dumbbell held in one hand. Your feet should be about shoulder width apart from each other. Now fully extend the arm with the dumbbell over your head. Tip: The small finger of your hand should be facing the ceiling and the palm of your hand should be facing forward. The dumbbell should be above your head.
This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your upper arm close to your head (elbows in) and perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearm touch your bicep. Tip: The upper arm should remain stationary and only the forearm should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the dumbbell. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Standing Overhead con Barra Triceps Extension
instructions: To begin, Párate up holding a barra or e-z bar using a pronated grip (palms facing forward) with your manos closer than shoulder width apart from each other. Your feet should be about shoulder width apart.
Now elevate the barra above your head until your brazos are fully extended. Mantén your elbows in. This will be your starting posición.

Keeping your upper brazos close to your head and elbows in, perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Tip: The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the barra. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Palm-In One-Arm con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Start by having a dumbbell in one hand with your arm fully extended to the side using a neutral grip. Use your other arm to Sostén on to an incline Banco to Mantén your balance.

Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. Now Lentamente Levanta the dumbbell up until you create a 90 degree angle with your arm. Note: Your forearm should be perpendicular to the suelo. Continue to maintain a neutral grip throughout the entire exercise.
Lentamente Levanta the dumbbell up until your arm is fully extended. This the starting posición.
While inhaling Baja the peso down until your arm is at a 90 degree angle again.

Feel the contraction for a second and then Levanta the peso back up towards the starting posición while exhaling. Remember to Sostén on to the incline Banco and Mantén your feet positioned to Mantén balance during the exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia brazos and Repite the exercise.

name: Standing Palms-In con Mancuerna Press
instructions: Start by having a dumbbell in each hand with your arm fully extended to the side using a neutral grip. Your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. Now Lentamente Levanta the mancuernas up until you create a 90 degree angle with your brazos. Note: Your forearms should be perpendicular to the suelo. This the starting posición.
Continue to maintain a neutral grip throughout the entire exercise. Lentamente Levanta the mancuernas up until your brazos are fully extended.
While inhaling Baja the weights down until your arm is at a 90 degree angle again.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Palms-Up con Barra Behind The Back Wrist Curl
instructions: Start by standing straight and holding a barra behind your glutes at arm's length while using a pronated grip (palms will be facing back away from the glutes) and having your manos shoulder width apart from each other.
You should be looking straight forward while your feet are shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting posición.
While exhaling, Lentamente elevate the barra up by curling your wrist in a semi-circular motion towards the ceiling. Note: Your wrist should be the only cuerpo part moving for this exercise.
Sostén the contraction for a second and Baja the barra back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
When finished, Baja the barra down to the Sentadilla rack or the suelo by bending the rodillas. Tip: It is easiest to either pick it up from a Sentadilla rack or have a partner hand it to you.

name: Standing Pelvic Tilt
instructions: Start off with your feet hip-distance apart.
Bend your rodillas slightly to Mantén them soft and springy.
You may want to move your pelvis forward and backward and back few times before holding the tailbone forward in this stretch.

name: Standing Rope Crunch
instructions: Attach a rope to a high pulley and Selecciona an appropriate peso.
Párate with your back to the cable tower. Take the rope with both manos over your shoulders, holding it to your upper chest. This will be your starting posición.
Perform the movement by flexing the spine, crunching the peso down as far as you can.
Sostén the peak contraction for a moment before returning to the starting posición.

name: Standing Soleus And Achilles Stretch
instructions: Párate with your feet hip-distance apart, one foot slightly in front of the other.
Bend both rodillas, keeping your back heel on the suelo. Cambia sides.

name: Standing Toe Touches
instructions: Párate with some space in front and behind you.
Bend at the waist, keeping your piernas straight, until you can relax and let your upper cuerpo hang down in front of you. Let your brazos and manos hang down naturally. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds.

name: Standing Towel Triceps Extension
instructions: To begin, Párate up with both brazos fully extended above the head holding one end of a towel with both manos. Your elbows should be in and the brazos perpendicular to the suelo with the palms facing each other while your feet should be shoulder width apart from each other. This is the starting posición.

Now communicate with your partner so that he/she can grip the other side of the towel to apply resistance. Keeping your upper brazos close to your head (elbows in) and perpendicular to the suelo, Baja the resistance in a semicircular motion behind your head until your forearms touch your biceps. Tip: The upper brazos should remain stationary and only the forearms should move. Respira in as you perform this step.
Go back to the starting posición by using the triceps to raise the towel. Respira out as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Standing Two-Arm Overhead Throw
instructions: Párate with your feet shoulder width apart holding a medicine ball in both manos. To begin, reach the medicine ball deep behind your head as you bend the rodillas slightly and lean back.
Violently throw the ball forward, flexing at the hip and using your whole cuerpo to complete the movement.
The medicine ball can be thrown to a partner or to a wall, receiving it as it bounces back.

name: Star Jump
instructions: Begin in a relaxed stance with your feet shoulder width apart and Sostén your brazos close to the cuerpo.
To initiate the move, Sentadilla down halfway and explode back up as high as possible. Fully extend your entire cuerpo, spreading your piernas and brazos away from the cuerpo.
As you land, bring your limbs back in and absorb your impact through the piernas.

name: Step-up with Knee Raise
instructions: Párate facing a box or Banco of an appropriate height with your feet together. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the movement by stepping up, putting your left foot on the top of the Banco. Extend through the hip and knee of your front leg to Párate up on the box. As you Párate on the box with your left leg, flex your right knee and hip, bringing your knee as high as you can.
Reverse this motion to step down off the box, and then Repite the sequence on the opposite leg.

name: Step Mill
instructions: To begin, step onto the stepmill and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. You can choose a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. Use caution so that you don't trip as you climb the stairs. It is recommended that you maintain your grip on the handles so that you don't fall.

Stepmills offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and usually have less impact than running outside while offering a similar rate of calories burned. They are typically much harder than other cardio equipment. A 150 lb person will typically burn over 300 calories in 30 minutes, compared to about 175 calories walking.

name: Stiff-Legged con Barra Deadlift
instructions: Grasp a bar using an overhand grip (palms facing down). You may need some wrist wraps if using a significant amount of peso.
Párate with your torso straight and your piernas spaced using a shoulder width or narrower stance. The rodillas should be slightly bent. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the rodillas stationary, Baja the barra to over the top of your feet by bending at the hips while keeping your back straight. Mantén moving forward as if you were going to pick something from the suelo until you feel a stretch on the hamstrings. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Start bringing your torso up straight again by extending your hips until you are back at the starting posición. Exhala as you perform this movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Stiff-Legged con Mancuerna Deadlift
instructions: Grasp a couple of mancuernas holding them by your side at arm's length.
Párate with your torso straight and your piernas spaced using a shoulder width or narrower stance. The rodillas should be slightly bent. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the rodillas stationary, Baja the mancuernas to over the top of your feet by bending at the waist while keeping your back straight. Mantén moving forward as if you were going to pick something from the suelo until you feel a stretch on the hamstrings. Exhala as you perform this movement
Start bringing your torso up straight again by extending your hips and waist until you are back at the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Stiff Leg con Barra Good Morning
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your piernas stationary, move your torso forward by bending at the hips while inhaling. Baja your torso until it is parallel with the suelo.
