Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by elevating your torso back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Stomach Vacuum
instructions: To begin, Párate straight with your feet shoulder width apart from each other. Place your manos on your hips. This is the starting posición.

Now Lentamente Inhala as much air as possible and then start to Exhala as much as possible while bringing your stomach in as much as possible and Sostén this posición. Try to visualize your navel touching your backbone.
One isometric contraction is around 20 seconds. During the 20 second Sostén, try to Respira normally. Then Inhala and bring your stomach back to the starting posición.
Once you have practiced this exercise, try to perform this exercise for longer than 20 seconds. Tip: You can work your way up to 40-60 seconds.
Repite for the recommended amount of sets.

name: Straight-Arm con Mancuerna Pullover
instructions: Place a dumbbell standing up on a flat Banco.

Ensuring that the dumbbell stays securely placed at the top of the Banco, lie perpendicular to the Banco (torso across it as in forming a cross) with only your shoulders lying on the surface. Hips should be below the Banco and piernas bent with feet firmly on the suelo. The head will be off the Banco as well.

Grasp the dumbbell with both manos and Sostén it straight over your chest at brazos length. Both palms should be pressing against the underside one of the sides of the dumbbell. This will be your starting posición.
Caution: Always ensure that the dumbbell used for this exercise is secure. Using a dumbbell with loose plates can result in the dumbbell falling apart and falling on your face.
While keeping your brazos straight, Baja the peso Lentamente in an arc behind your head while breathing in until you feel a stretch on the chest.
At that point, bring the dumbbell back to the starting posición using the arc through which the peso was lowered and Exhala as you perform this movement.
Sostén the peso on the initial posición for a second and Repite the motion for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: Straight-Arm Pulldown
instructions: You will start by grabbing the wide bar from the top pulley of a pulldown machine and using a wider than shoulder-width pronated (palms down) grip. Step backwards two feet or so.

Bend your torso forward at the waist by around 30-degrees with your brazos fully extended in front of you and a slight bend at the elbows. If your brazos are not fully extended then you need to step a bit more backwards until they are. Once your brazos are fully extended and your torso is slightly bent at the waist, tighten the lats and then you are ready to begin.
While keeping the brazos straight, Tira the bar down by contracting the lats until your manos are next to the side of the thighs. Respira out as you perform this step.
While keeping the brazos straight, go back to the starting posición while breathing in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Straight Bar Bench Mid Rows
instructions: Place a loaded barra on the end of a Banco. Standing on the Banco behind the bar, take a medium, pronated grip. Párate with your hips back and chest up, maintaining a neutral spine. This will be your starting posición.
Remo the bar to your torso by retracting the shoulder blades and flexing the elbows. Use a controlled movement with no jerking.
After a brief pause, Lentamente Regresa the bar to the starting posición, ensuring to go all the way down.

name: Straight Raises on Incline Bench
instructions: Place a bar on the suelo behind the head of an incline Banco.
Lay on the Banco face down. With a pronated grip, pick the barra up from the suelo, keeping your brazos straight. Allow the bar to hang straight down. This will be your starting posición.
To begin, raise the barra out in front of your head while keeping your brazos extended.
Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Stride Jump Crossover
instructions: Párate to the side of a box with your inside foot on top of it, close to the edge.
Begin by swinging the brazos upward as you Empuja through the top leg, jumping upward as high as possible. Attempt to drive the opposite knee upward.
Land in the opposite posición that you started, on the opposite side of the box. The foot that was initially on the box will now be on the suelo, with the opposite foot now on the box.
Repite the movement, crossing back over to the other side.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Begin with a bar loaded on the suelo. Approach the bar so that the bar intersects the middle of the feet. The feet should be set very wide, near the collars. Bend at the hips to grip the bar. The brazos should be directly below the shoulders, inside the piernas, and you can use a pronated grip, a mixed grip, or hook grip. Relax the shoulders, which in effect lengthens your brazos.

Take a breath, and then Baja your hips, looking forward with your head with your chest up. Drive through the suelo, spreading your feet apart, with your peso on the back half of your feet. Extend through the hips and rodillas.
As the bar passes through the rodillas, lean back and drive the hips into the bar, pulling your shoulder blades together.
Regresa the peso to the suelo by bending at the hips and controlling the peso on the way down.

name: Sumo Deadlift with con Bandas
instructions: To Peso Muerto with short bands, simply loop them over the bar before you start, and step into them to set up. Ensure that they under the back half of your foot, directly where you are driving into the suelo.

Begin with a bar loaded on the suelo. Approach the bar so that the bar intersects the middle of the feet. The feet should be set very wide, near the collars. Bend at the hips to grip the bar. The brazos should be directly below the shoulders, inside the piernas, and you can use a pronated grip, a mixed grip, or hook grip.

Take a breath, and then Baja your hips, looking forward with your head with your chest up. Drive through the suelo, spreading your feet apart, with your peso on the back half of your feet. Extend through the hips and rodillas.
As the bar passes through the rodillas, lean back and drive the hips into the bar, pulling your shoulder blades together.
Regresa the peso to the suelo by bending at the hips and controlling the peso on the way down.

name: Sumo Deadlift with Chains
instructions: You can attach the chains to the sleeves of the bar, or just drape the middle over the bar so there is a greater peso increase as you Levanta. Attempt to Mantén the ends of the chains away from the plates so you don't hit them when you Baja the peso.

Begin with a bar loaded on the suelo. Approach the bar so that the bar intersects the middle of the feet. The feet should be set very wide, near the collars. Bend at the hips to grip the bar. The brazos should be directly below the shoulders, inside the piernas, and you can use a pronated grip, a mixed grip, or hook grip. Relax the shoulders, which in effect lengthens your brazos.

Take a breath, and then Baja your hips, looking forward with your head with your chest up. Drive through the suelo, spreading your feet apart, with your peso on the back half of your feet. Extend through the hips and rodillas.
As the bar passes through the rodillas, lean back and drive the hips into the bar, pulling your shoulder blades together.
Regresa the peso to the suelo by bending at the hips and controlling the peso on the way down.

name: Superman
instructions: To begin, lie straight and face down on the suelo or exercise mat. Your brazos should be fully extended in front of you. This is the starting posición.

Simultaneously raise your brazos, piernas, and chest off of the suelo and Sostén this contraction for 2 seconds. Tip: Squeeze your Baja back to get the best results from this exercise. Remember to Exhala during this movement. Note: When holding the contracted posición, you should look like superman when he is flying.
Lentamente begin to Baja your brazos, piernas and chest back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

name: Supine Chest Throw
instructions: This drill is great for chest passes when you lack a partner or a wall of sufficient strength. Lay on the suelo on your back with your rodillas bent.
Begin with the ball on your chest, held with both manos on the bottom.
Explode up, extending through the elbow to throw the ball directly above you as high as possible.
Catch the ball with both manos as it comes down.

name: Supine One-Arm Overhead Throw
instructions: Lay on the suelo on your back with your rodillas bent. Sostén the ball with one hand, extending the arm fully behind your head. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement at the shoulder, throwing the ball directly forward of you as you Siéntate up, attempting to go for maximum distance.
The ball can be thrown to a partner or bounced off of a wall.

name: Supine Two-Arm Overhead Throw
instructions: Lay on the suelo on your back with your rodillas bent.
Sostén the ball with both manos, extending the brazos fully behind your head. This will be your starting posición.
Initiate the movement at the shoulder, throwing the ball directly forward of you as you Siéntate up, attempting to go for maximum distance.
The ball can be thrown to a partner or bounced off of a wall.

name: Suspended Fallout
instructions: Adjust the straps so the handles are at an appropriate height, below waist level.
Begin standing and grasping the handles. Lean into the straps, moving to an incline Empuja-up posición. This will be your starting posición.
Keeping your brazos straight, lean further into the suspension straps, bringing your cuerpo closer to the suelo, allowing your shoulders to extend, raising your brazos up and over your head.
Maintain a neutral spine and Mantén the rest of your cuerpo straight, your shoulders being the only joints allowed to move.
Pause during the peak contraction, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Suspended Push-Up
instructions: Anchor your suspension straps securely to the top of a rack or other object.

Leaning into the straps, take a handle in each hand and move into a Empuja-up plank posición. You should be as close to parallel to the suelo as you can manage with your brazos fully extended, maintaining good posture.
Maintaining a straight, rigid torso, descend Lentamente by allowing the elbows to flex.
Continue until your elbows break 90 degrees, pausing before you extend to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Suspended Reverse Crunch
instructions: Secure a set of suspension straps with the handles hanging about a foot off of the suelo. Move yourself into a pushup plank posición facing away from the rack.
Place your feet into the handles. You should maintain a straight posture, not allowing the hips to sag. This will be your starting posición.
Begin the movement by flexing the rodillas and hips, drawing the rodillas to your torso. As you do so, anteriorly tilt your pelvis, allowing your spine to flex.
At the top of the controlled motion, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Suspended Row
instructions: Suspend your straps at around chest height. Take a handle in each hand and lean back. Mantén your cuerpo erect and your head and chest up. Your brazos should be fully extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by flexing the elbow to initiate the movement. Protract your shoulder blades as you do so.
At the completion of the motion pause, and then Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Suspended Split Squat
instructions: Suspend your straps so the handles are 18-30 inches from the suelo.
Facing away from the setup, place your rear foot into the handle behind you. Mantén your head looking forward and your chest up, with your knee slightly bent. This will be your starting posición.
Descend by flexing the knee and hips, lowering yourself to the suelo. Mantén your peso on the heel of your foot and maintain your posture throughout the exercise.
At the bottom of the movement, reverse the motion, extending through the hip and knee to Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Svend Press
instructions: Begin in a standing posición.

Press two lightweight plates together with your manos. Sostén the plates together close to your chest to create an isometric contraction in your chest muscles. Your fingers should be pointed forward. This is your starting posición.
Squeeze the plates between your palms and extend your brazos directly out in front of you in a controlled motion.
Pause at the top of the motion, and then Lentamente Regresa to the starting posición.

name: T-Bar Row with Handle
instructions: posición a bar into a landmine or in a corner to Mantén it from moving. Load an appropriate peso onto your end.
Párate over the bar, and posición a Double D Remo handle around the bar next to the collar. Using your hips and piernas, rise to a standing posición.
Assume a wide stance with your hips back and your chest up. Your brazos should be extended. This will be your starting posición.
Tira the peso to your upper abdomen by retracting the shoulder blades and flexing the elbows. Do not jerk the peso or cheat during the movement.
After a brief pause, Regresa to the starting posición.

name: Tate Press
instructions: Recuéstate on a flat Banco with a dumbbell in each hand on top of your thighs. The palms of your hand will be facing each other.

By using your thighs to help you get the mancuernas up, clean the mancuernas one arm at a time so that you can Sostén them in front of you at shoulder width. Note: when holding the mancuernas in front of you, make sure your brazos are wider than shoulder width apart from each other using a pronated (palms forward) grip. Allow your elbows to point out. This is your starting posición.

Keeping the upper brazos stationary, Lentamente move the mancuernas in and down in a semi circular motion until they touch the upper chest while inhaling. Mantén full control of the mancuernas at all times and do not move the upper brazos nor rest the mancuernas on the chest.

As you Respira out, move the mancuernas up using your triceps and the same semi-circular motion but in reverse. Attempt to Mantén the mancuernas together as they move up. Lock your brazos in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down again Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.

name: The Straddle
instructions: Begin in a seated, upright posición. Start by extending your piernas in front of you in a V.
With your manos on the suelo, lean forward as far as possible. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds.

name: Thigh Abductor
instructions: To begin, Siéntate down on the abductor machine and Selecciona a peso you are comfortable with. When your piernas are positioned properly, grip the handles on each side. Your entire upper cuerpo (from the waist up) should be stationary. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente Press against the machine with your piernas to move them away from each other while exhaling.

Feel the contraction for a second and begin to move your piernas back to the starting posición while breathing in. Note: Remember to Mantén your upper cuerpo stationary to prevent any injuries from occurring.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Thigh Adductor
instructions: To begin, Siéntate down on the adductor machine and Selecciona a peso you are comfortable with. When your piernas are positioned properly on the leg pads of the machine, grip the handles on each side. Your entire upper cuerpo (from the waist up) should be stationary. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente Press against the machine with your piernas to move them towards each other while exhaling.

Feel the contraction for a second and begin to move your piernas back to the starting posición while breathing in. Note: Remember to Mantén your upper cuerpo stationary and avoid fast jerking motions in order to prevent any injuries from occurring.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Tire Flip
instructions: Begin by gripping the bottom of the tire on the tread, and posición your feet back a bit. Your chest should be driving into the tire.
To Levanta the tire, extend through the hips, rodillas, and ankles, driving into the tire and up.

As the tire reaches a 45 degree angle, step forward and drive a knee into the tire. As you do so adjust your grip to the upper portion of the tire and Empuja it forward as hard as possible to complete the turn. Repite as necessary.

name: Toe Touchers
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on the suelo or an exercise mat with your back pressed against the suelo. Your brazos should be lying across your sides with the palms facing down.

Your piernas should be touching each other. Lentamente elevate your piernas up in the air until they are almost perpendicular to the suelo with a slight bend at the rodillas. Your feet should be parallel to the suelo.
Move your brazos so that they are fully extended at a 45 degree angle from the suelo. This is the starting posición.
While keeping your Baja back pressed against the suelo, Lentamente Levanta your torso and use your manos to try and touch your toes. Remember to Exhala while perform this part of the exercise.
Lentamente begin to Baja your torso and brazos back down to the starting posición while inhaling. Remember to Mantén your brazos straight out pointing towards your toes.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Torso Rotation
instructions: Párate upright holding an exercise ball with both manos. Extend your brazos so the ball is straight out in front of you. This will be your starting posición.
Rotate your torso to one side, keeping your eyes on the ball as you move. Now, rotate back to the opposite direction. Repite for 10-20 repetitions.

name: Trail Running/Walking
instructions: Running or hiking on trails will get the blood pumping and heart beating almost immediately. Make sure you have good shoes. While you use the muscles in your calves and buttocks to Tira yourself up a hill, the rodillas, joints and ankles absorb the bulk of the pounding coming back down. Take smaller steps as you walk downhill, Mantén your rodillas bent to reduce the impact and slow down to avoid falling.
A 150 lb person can burn over 200 calories for 30 minutes walking uphill, compared to 175 on a flat surface. If running the trail, a 150 lb person can burn well over 500 calories in 30 minutes.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
instructions: For this exercise load a trap bar, also known as a hex bar, to an appropriate peso resting on the suelo. Párate in the center of the apparatus and grasp both handles.
Baja your hips, look forward with your head and Mantén your chest up.
Begin the movement by driving through the heels and extend your hips and rodillas. Avoid rounding your back at all times.
At the completion of the movement, Baja the peso back to the suelo under control.

name: Tricep con Mancuerna Kickback
instructions: Start with a dumbbell in each hand and your palms facing your torso. Mantén your back straight with a slight bend in the rodillas and bend forward at the waist. Your torso should be almost parallel to the suelo. Make sure to Mantén your head up. Your upper brazos should be close to your torso and parallel to the suelo. Your forearms should be pointed towards the suelo as you Sostén the weights. There should be a 90-degree angle formed between your forearm and upper arm. This is your starting posición.
Now, while keeping your upper brazos stationary, Exhala and use your triceps to Levanta the weights until the arm is fully extended. Focus on moving the forearm.
After a brief pause at the top contraction, Inhala and Lentamente Baja the mancuernas back down to the starting posición.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Tricep Side Stretch
instructions: Bring right arm across your cuerpo and over your left shoulder, holding your elbow with your left hand, until you feel a stretch in your tricep. Then Repite for your other arm.

name: Triceps Overhead Extension with Rope
instructions: Attach a rope to a low pulley. After selecting an appropriate peso, grasp the rope with both manos and face away from the cable.

posición your manos behind your head with your elbows point straight up. Your elbows should start out flexed, and you can stagger your stance and lean gently away from the machine to create greater stability. This will be your starting posición.
To perform the movement, extend through the elbow while keeping the upper arm in posición, raising your manos above your head.
Squeeze your triceps at the top of the movement, and Lentamente Baja the peso back to the start posición.

name: Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Attach a straight or angled bar to a high pulley and grab with an overhand grip (palms facing down) at shoulder width.

Standing upright with the torso straight and a very small inclination forward, bring the upper brazos close to your cuerpo and perpendicular to the suelo. The forearms should be pointing up towards the pulley as they Sostén the bar. This is your starting posición.

Using the triceps, bring the bar down until it touches the front of your thighs and the brazos are fully extended perpendicular to the suelo. The upper brazos should always remain stationary next to your torso and only the forearms should move. Exhala as you perform this movement.
After a second Sostén at the contracted posición, bring the bar Lentamente up to the starting point. Respira in as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Triceps Pushdown - Rope Attachment
instructions: Attach a rope attachment to a high pulley and grab with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).

Standing upright with the torso straight and a very small inclination forward, bring the upper brazos close to your cuerpo and perpendicular to the suelo. The forearms should be pointing up towards the pulley as they Sostén the rope with the palms facing each other. This is your starting posición.

Using the triceps, bring the rope down as you bring each side of the rope to the side of your thighs. At the end of the movement the brazos are fully extended and perpendicular to the suelo. The upper brazos should always remain stationary next to your torso and only the forearms should move. Exhala as you perform this movement.
After holding for a second, at the contracted posición, bring the rope Lentamente up to the starting point. Respira in as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Triceps Pushdown - V-Bar Attachment
instructions: Attach a V-Bar to a high pulley and grab with an overhand grip (palms facing down) at shoulder width.

Standing upright with the torso straight and a very small inclination forward, bring the upper brazos close to your cuerpo and perpendicular to the suelo. The forearms should be pointing up towards the pulley as they Sostén the bar. The thumbs should be higher than the small finger. This is your starting posición.

Using the triceps, bring the bar down until it touches the front of your thighs and the brazos are fully extended perpendicular to the suelo. The upper brazos should always remain stationary next to your torso and only the forearms should move. Exhala as you perform this movement.
After a second Sostén at the contracted posición, bring the V-Bar Lentamente up to the starting point. Respira in as you perform this step.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Triceps Stretch
instructions: Reach your hand behind your head, grasp your elbow and gently Tira. Sostén for 10 to 20 seconds, then Cambia sides.

name: Tuck Crunch
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on the suelo or an exercise mat with your back pressed against the suelo. Your brazos should be lying across your sides with the palms facing down.

Your piernas should be crossed by wrapping one ankle around the other. Lentamente elevate your piernas up in the air until your thighs are perpendicular to the suelo with a slight bend at the rodillas. Note: Your rodillas and toes should be parallel to the suelo as opposed to the thighs.
Move your brazos from the suelo and cross them so they are resting on your chest. This is the starting posición.
While keeping your Baja back pressed against the suelo, Lentamente Levanta your torso. Remember to Exhala while perform this part of the exercise.
Lentamente begin to Baja your torso back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Two-Arm con Mancuerna Preacher Curl
instructions: Grab a dumbbell with each arm and place the upper brazos on top of the preacher Banco or the incline Banco. The dumbbell should be held at shoulder length. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas until your upper arm is extended and the biceps is fully stretched.
As you Exhala, use the biceps to Curl the weights up until your biceps is fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder height.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted posición and Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Two-Arm con Pesa Rusa Clean
instructions: Place two kettlebells between your feet. To get in the starting posición, Empuja your butt back and look straight ahead.
Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you raise the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so.
Baja the kettlebells back to the starting posición and Repite.

name: Two-Arm con Pesa Rusa Jerk
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders. Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you swing the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so, so that the palms face forward. Sentadilla down a few inches and reverse the motion rapidly driving both kettlebells overhead. Immediately after the initial Empuja, Sentadilla down again and get under the kettlebells. Once the kettlebells are locked out, Párate upright to complete the exercise.

name: Two-Arm con Pesa Rusa Military Press
instructions: Clean two kettlebells to your shoulders. Clean the kettlebells to your shoulders by extending through the piernas and hips as you swing the kettlebells towards your shoulders. Rotate your wrists as you do so, so that the palms face forward.

Press the kettlebells up and out. As the kettlebells pass your head, lean into the weights so that the kettlebells are racked behind your head. Make sure to contract your lats, butt, and stomach for added stability.

name: Two-Arm con Pesa Rusa Row
instructions: Place two kettlebells in front of your feet. Bend your rodillas slightly and then Empuja your butt out as much as possible as you bend over to get in the starting posición.
Grab both kettlebells and Tira them to your stomach, retracting your shoulder blades and flexing the elbows. Mantén your back straight. Baja and Repite.

name: Underhand en Cable Pulldowns
instructions: Siéntate down on a Tira-down machine with a wide bar attached to the top pulley. Adjust the knee pad of the machine to fit your height. These pads will prevent your cuerpo from being raised by the resistance attached to the bar.
Grab the Tira-down bar with the palms facing your torso (a supinated grip). Make sure that the manos are placed closer than the shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

As you Respira out, Tira the bar down until it touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the fully contracted posición and Mantén the elbows close to your cuerpo. The upper torso should remain stationary as your bring the bar to you and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second on the contracted posición, while breathing in, Lentamente bring the bar back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Upper Back-Leg Grab
instructions: While seated, bend forward to hug your thighs from underneath with both brazos.

Mantén your rodillas together and your piernas extended out as you bring your chest down to your rodillas. You can also stretch your middle back by pulling your back away from your rodillas as your hugging them.

name: Upper Back Stretch
instructions: Clasp fingers together with your thumbs pointing down, round your shoulders as you reach your manos forward.

name: Upright con Barra Row
instructions: Grasp a barra with an overhand grip that is slightly less than shoulder width. The bar should be resting on the top of your thighs with your brazos extended and a slight bend in your elbows. Your back should also be straight. This will be your starting posición.

Now Exhala and use the sides of your shoulders to Levanta the bar, raising your elbows up and to the side. Mantén the bar close to your cuerpo as you raise it. Continue to Levanta the bar until it nearly touches your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion, and should always be higher than your forearms. Remember to Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the bar back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Upright en Cable Row
instructions: Grasp a straight bar cable attachment that is attached to a low pulley with a pronated (palms facing your thighs) grip that is slightly less than shoulder width. The bar should be resting on top of your thighs. Your brazos should be extended with a slight bend at the elbows and your back should be straight. This will be your starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the cable bar as you Exhala. The bar should be close to the cuerpo as you move it up. Continue to Levanta it until it nearly touches your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the bar, your elbows should always be higher than your forearms. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the bar back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Upright Row - With con Bandas
instructions: To begin, Párate on an exercise band so that tension begins at arm's length. Grasp the handles using a pronated (palms facing your thighs) grip that is slightly less than shoulder width. The handles should be resting on top of your thighs. Your brazos should be extended with a slight bend at the elbows and your back should be straight. This will be your starting posición.

Use your side shoulders to Levanta the handles as you Exhala. The handles should be close to the cuerpo as you move them up. Continue to Levanta the handles until they nearly touches your chin. Tip: Your elbows should drive the motion. As you Levanta the handles, your elbows should always be higher than your forearms. Also, Mantén your torso stationary and pause for a second at the top of the movement.
Baja the handles back down Lentamente to the starting posición. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Upward Stretch
instructions: Extend both manos straight above your head, palms touching.
Lentamente Empuja your manos up and back, keeping your back straight.

name: V-Bar Pulldown
instructions: Siéntate down on a Tira-down machine with a V-Bar attached to the top pulley.
Adjust the knee pad of the machine to fit your height. These pads will prevent your cuerpo from being raised by the resistance attached to the bar.

Grab the V-bar with the palms facing each other (a neutral grip). Stick your chest out and lean yourself back slightly (around 30-degrees) in order to better engage the lats. This will be your starting posición.

Using your lats, Tira the bar down as you squeeze your shoulder blades. Continue until your chest nearly touches the V-bar. Exhala as you execute this motion. Tip: Mantén the torso stationary throughout the movement.
After a second Sostén on the contracted posición, Lentamente bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: V-Bar Pullup
instructions: Start by placing the middle of the V-bar in the middle of the Tira-up bar (assuming that the Tira-up station you are using does not have neutral grip handles). The V-Bar handles will be facing down so that you can hang from the Tira-up bar through the use of the handles.

Once you securely place the V-bar, take a Sostén of the bar from each side and hang from it. Stick your chest out and lean yourself back slightly in order to better engage the lats. This will be your starting posición.

Using your lats, Tira your torso up while leaning your head back slightly so that you do not hit yourself with the chin-up bar. Continue until your chest nearly touches the V-bar. Exhala as you execute this motion.
After a second Sostén on the contracted posición, Lentamente Baja your cuerpo back to the starting posición as you Respira in.
Repite for the prescribed number of repetitions.

name: Vertical Swing
instructions: Allow the dumbbell to hang at brazos length between your piernas, holding it with both manos. Mantén your back straight and your head up.
Swing the dumbbell between your piernas, flexing at the hips and bending the rodillas slightly.
Powerfully reverse the motion by extending at the hips, rodillas, and ankles to propel yourself upward, swinging the dumbell over your head.
As you land, absorb the impact through your piernas and draw the dumbbell to your torso before the next repetition.

name: Walking, Treadmill
instructions: To begin, step onto the treadmill and Selecciona the desired option from the menu. Most treadmills have a manual setting, or you can Selecciona a program to run. Typically, you can enter your age and peso to estimate the amount of calories burned during exercise. Elevation can be adjusted to change the intensity of the workout.

Treadmills offer convenience, cardiovascular benefits, and usually have less impact than walking outside. When walking, you should move at a moderate to fast pace, not a leisurely one. Being an activity of Baja intensity, walking doesn't burn as many calories as some other activities, but still provides great benefit. A 150 lb person will burn about 175 calories walking 4 miles per hour for 30 minutes, compared to 450 calories running twice as fast. Maintain proper posture as you walk, and only Sostén onto the handles when necessary, such as when dismounting or checking your heart rate.

name: Weighted Ball Hyperextension
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on an exercise ball with your torso pressing against the ball and parallel to the suelo. The ball of your feet should be pressed against the suelo to help Mantén you balanced. Place a weighted plate under your chin or behind your neck. This is the starting posición.
Lentamente raise your torso up by bending at the waist and Baja back. Remember to Exhala during this movement.
Sostén the contraction on your Baja back for a second and Baja your torso back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions prescribed in your program.

name: Weighted Ball Side Bend
instructions: To begin, Recuéstate on an exercise ball with your left side of the torso (waist, hips and shoulder) pressed against the ball.

Your feet should be on the suelo while your piernas are crossed and hanging from the ball. Sostén a weighted plate with your right hand directly to the right side of your head. Tip: Make sure the smooth side of the plate is resting against your head.
Place your left arm across your torso so that your palm is on your obliques. There should be a right angle between your left forearm and upper arm. This is the starting posición.
Raise the side of your torso up by laterally flexing at the waist while exhaling.
Sostén the contraction for a second and Lentamente Baja yourself back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
Cambia sides and Repite the exercise.

name: Weighted Bench Dip
instructions: For this exercise you will need to place a Banco behind your back and another one in front of you. With the benches perpendicular to your cuerpo, Sostén on to one Banco on its edge with the manos close to your cuerpo, separated at shoulder width. Your brazos should be fully extended.

The piernas will be extended forward on top of the other Banco. Your piernas should be parallel to the suelo while your torso is to be perpendicular to the suelo. Have your partner place the dumbbell on your lap. Note: This exercise is best performed with a partner as placing the peso on your lap can be challenging and cause injury without assistance. This will be your starting posición.

Lentamente Baja your cuerpo as you Inhala by bending at the elbows until you Baja yourself far enough to where there is an angle slightly smaller than 90 degrees between the upper arm and the forearm. Tip: Mantén the elbows as close as possible throughout the movement. Forearms should always be pointing down.
Using your triceps to bring your torso up again, Levanta yourself back to the starting posición while exhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Weighted Crunches
instructions: Lie flat on your back with your feet flat on the suelo or resting on a Banco with your rodillas bent at a 90 degree angle.
Sostén a peso to your chest, or you may Sostén it extended above your torso. This will be your starting posición.
Now, Exhala and Lentamente begin to roll your shoulders off the suelo. Your shoulders should come up off the suelo about 4 inches while your Baja back remains on the suelo.
At the top of the movement, flex your abdominals and Sostén for a brief pause.
Then Inhala and Lentamente Baja yourself back down to the starting posición.

name: Weighted Jump Squat
instructions: posición a lightly loaded barra across the back of your shoulders. You could also use a weighted vest, sandbag, or other type of resistance for this exercise.
The peso should be light enough that it doesn't slow you down significantly. Your feet should be just outside of shoulder width with your head and chest up. This will be your starting posición.

Using a countermovement, Sentadilla partially down and immediately reverse your direction to explode off of the suelo, extending through your hips, rodillas, and ankles. Maintain good posture throughout the jump.
As you Regresa to the suelo, absorb the impact through your piernas.

name: Weighted Pull Ups
instructions: Attach a peso to a dip belt and secure it around your waist. Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms of your manos facing forward. For a medium grip, your manos should be spaced at shoulder width. Both brazos should be extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip.
You'll want to bring your torso back about 30 degrees while creating a curvature in your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This will be your starting posición.
Now, Exhala and Tira your torso up until your head is above your manos. Concentrate on squeezing yourshoulder blades back and down as you reach the top contracted posición.
After a brief moment at the top contracted posición, Inhala and Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición with your brazos extended and your lats fully stretched.

name: Weighted Sissy Squat
instructions: Standing upright, with feet at shoulder width and toes raised, use one hand to Sostén onto the beams of a Sentadilla rack and the opposite arm to Sostén a plate on top of your chest. This is your starting posición.

As you use one arm to Sostén yourself, bend at the rodillas and Lentamente Baja your torso toward the suelo by bringing your pelvis and rodillas forward. Inhala as you go down and stop when your upper and Baja piernas almost create a 90-degree angle. Sostén the stretch posición for a second.
After your one second Sostén, use your thigh muscles to bring your torso back up to the starting posición. Exhala as you move up.
Repite for the recommended amount of times.

name: Weighted Sit-Ups - With con Bandas
instructions: Start out by strapping the bands around the base of the decline Banco. Place the handles towards the inside of the decline Banco so that when lying down, you can reach for both of them.

posición your piernas through the decline machine until they are secured. Now reach for the exercise bands with both manos. Use a pronated (palms forward) grip to grasp the handles. posición them near your collar bone and rotate your wrist to a neutral grip (palms facing the torso). Note: Your brazos should remain stationary throughout the exercise. This is the starting posición.

Move your torso upward until your upper cuerpo is perpendicular to the suelo while exhaling. Sostén the contraction for a second and Baja your upper cuerpo back down to the starting posición while inhaling.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Weighted Squat
instructions: Start by positioning two flat benches shoulder width apart from each other. Párate on top of them and wrap the weighted belt around your waist with the amount of peso you feel comfortable with. Make sure your toes are facing out.
Once you are standing straight up with the peso hanging in between your piernas, posición your brazos so that they are fully extended to the side of your cuerpo. This is the starting posición.

Begin by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that are perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.

Begin to move the cuerpo back up by pushing the suelo of the flat Banco with the ball of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición. Exhala as you perform this portion of the exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip con Barra Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat Banco with feet firm on the suelo. Using a wide, pronated (palms forward) grip that is around 3 inches away from shoulder width (for each hand), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. The bar will be perpendicular to the torso and the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your middle chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip Decline con Barra Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a decline Banco with the feet securely locked at the front of the Banco. Using a wide, pronated (palms forward) grip that is around 3 inches away from shoulder width (for each hand), Levanta the bar from the rack and Sostén it straight over you with your brazos locked. The bar will be perpendicular to the torso and the suelo. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, come down Lentamente until you feel the bar on your Baja chest.

After a second pause, bring the bar back to the starting posición as you Respira out and Empuja the bar using your chest muscles. Lock your brazos and squeeze your chest in the contracted posición, Sostén for a second and then start coming down Lentamente again. Tip: It should take at least twice as long to go down than to come up.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip Decline con Barra Pullover
instructions: Recuéstate on a decline Banco with both piernas securely locked in posición. Reach for the barra behind the head using a pronated grip (palms facing out). Make sure to grab the barra wider than shoulder width apart for this exercise. Lentamente Levanta the barra up from the suelo by using your brazos.
When positioned properly, your brazos should be fully extended and perpendicular to the suelo. This is the starting posición.

Begin by moving the barra back down in a semicircular motion as if you were going to place it on the suelo, but instead, stop when the brazos are parallel to the suelo. Tip: Mantén the brazos fully extended at all times. The movement should only happen at the shoulder joint. Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement.
Now bring the barra up while exhaling until you are back at the starting posición. Remember to Mantén full control of the barra at all times.
Repite the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions of your training program.
When finished with your set, Lentamente Baja the barra back down until it is level with your head and release it.

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Siéntate down on a Tira-down machine with a wide bar attached to the top pulley. Make sure that you adjust the knee pad of the machine to fit your height. These pads will prevent your cuerpo from being raised by the resistance attached to the bar.

Grab the bar with the palms facing forward using the prescribed grip. Note on grips: For a wide grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance wider than shoulder width. For a medium grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance equal to your shoulder width and for a close grip at a distance smaller than your shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, bring your torso back around 30 degrees or so while creating a curvature on your Baja back and sticking your chest out. This is your starting posición.

As you Respira out, bring the bar down until it touches your upper chest by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work except for holding the bar; therefore do not try to Tira down the bar using the forearms.

After a second at the contracted posición squeezing your shoulder blades together, Lentamente raise the bar back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched. Inhala during this portion of the movement.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip Pulldown Behind The Neck
instructions: Siéntate down on a Tira-down machine with a wide bar attached to the top pulley. Make sure that you adjust the knee pad of the machine to fit your height. These pads will prevent your cuerpo from being raised by the resistance attached to the bar.

Grab the bar with the palms facing forward using the prescribed grip. Note on grips: For a wide grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance wider than your shoulder width. For a medium grip, your manos need to be spaced out at a distance equal to your shoulder width and for a close grip at a distance smaller than your shoulder width.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar at the chosen grip width, bring your torso and head forward. Think of an imaginary line from the center of the bar down to the back of your neck. This is your starting posición.

As you Respira out, bring the bar down until it touches the back of your neck by drawing the shoulders and the upper brazos down and back. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work except for holding the bar; therefore do not try to Tira down the bar using the forearms.

After a second on the contracted posición squeezing your shoulder blades together, Lentamente raise the bar back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched. Inhala during this portion of the movement.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip Rear Pull-Up
instructions: Grab the Tira-up bar with the palms facing forward using a wide grip.

As you have both brazos extended in front of you holding the bar, bring your torso forward and head so that there is an imaginary line from the Tira-up bar to the back of your neck. This is your starting posición.

Tira your torso up until the bar is near the back of your neck. To do this, draw the shoulders and upper brazos down and back while slightly leaning your head forward. Exhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: Concentrate on squeezing the back muscles once you reach the full contracted posición. The upper torso should remain stationary as it moves through space and only the brazos should move. The forearms should do no other work other than Sostén the bar.
After a second on the contracted posición, start to Inhala and Lentamente Baja your torso back to the starting posición when your brazos are fully extended and the lats are fully stretched.
Repite this motion for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: Wide-Grip Standing con Barra Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright while holding a barra at the wide outer handle. The palm of your manos should be facing forward. The elbows should be close to the torso. This will be your starting posición.
While holding the upper brazos stationary, Curl the weights forward while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Tip: Only the forearms should move.
Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level. Sostén the contracted posición for a second and squeeze the biceps hard.
Lentamente begin to bring the bar back to starting posición as your Respira in.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Wide Stance con Barra Squat
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, step under the bar and place the back of your shoulders (slightly below the neck) across it.
Sostén on to the bar using both brazos at each side and Levanta it off the rack by first pushing with your piernas and at the same time straightening your torso.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a wider-than-shoulder-width stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance, and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición.

Begin to Lentamente Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the heel of your foot as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Wide Stance Stiff Legs
instructions: Begin with a barra loaded on the suelo. Adopt a wide stance, and then bend at the hips to grab the bar. Your hips should be as far back as possible, and your piernas nearly straight. Mantén your back straight, and your head and chest up. This will be your starting posición.

Begin the movement be engaging the hips, driving them forward as you allow the brazos to hang straight. Continue until you are standing straight up, and then Lentamente Regresa the peso to the starting posición. For successive reps, the peso need not touch the suelo.

name: Wind Sprints
instructions: Hang from a Tira-up bar using a pronated grip. Your brazos and piernas should be extended. This will be your starting posición.
Begin by quickly raising one knee as high as you can. Do not swing your cuerpo or your piernas. 3
Immediately reverse the motion, returning that leg to the starting posición. Simultaneously raise the opposite knee as high as possible.
Continue alternating between piernas until the set is complete.

name: Windmills
instructions: Lie on your back with your brazos extended out to the sides and your piernas straight. This will be your starting posición.
Levanta one leg and quickly cross it over your cuerpo, attempting to touch the suelo near the opposite hand.
Regresa to the starting posición, and Repite with the opposite leg. Continue to alternate for 10-20 repetitions.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
instructions: This is a three-part stretch. Begin by lunging forward, with your front foot flat on the suelo and on the toes of your back foot. With your rodillas bent, Sentadilla down until your knee is almost touching the suelo. Mantén your torso erect, and Sostén this posición for 10-20 seconds.

Now, place the arm on the same side as your front leg on the suelo, with the elbow next to the foot. Your other hand should be placed on the suelo, parallel to your lead leg, to help support you during this portion of the stretch.

After 10-20 seconds, place your manos on either side of your front foot. Raise the toes of the front foot off of the suelo, and straighten your leg. You may need to reposition your rear leg to do so. Sostén for 10-20 seconds, and then Repite the entire sequence for the other side.

name: Wrist Circles
instructions: Start by standing straight with your feet being shoulder width apart from each other. Elevate your brazos to the side of you until they are fully extended and parallel to the suelo at a height that is evenly aligned with your shoulders. Tip: Your torso and brazos should form the letter "T: Your palms should be facing down. This is the starting posición.

Keeping your entire cuerpo stationary except for the wrists, begin to rotate both wrists forward in a circular motion. Tip: Pretend that you are trying to draw circles by using your manos as the brush. Respira normally as you perform this exercise.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Wrist Roller
instructions: To begin, Párate straight up grabbing a wrist roller using a pronated grip (palms facing down). Your feet should be shoulder width apart.

Lentamente Levanta both brazos until they are fully extended and parallel to the suelo in front of you. Note: Make sure the rope is not wrapped around the roller. Your entire cuerpo should be stationary except for the forearms. This is the starting posición.
Rotate one wrist at a time in an upward motion to bring the peso up to the bar by rolling the rope around the roller.
Once the peso has reached the bar, Lentamente begin to Baja the peso back down by rotating the wrist in a downward motion until the peso reaches the starting posición.
Repite for the prescribed amount of repetitions in your program.

name: Wrist Rotations with Straight Bar
instructions: Sostén a barra with both manos and your palms facing down; manos spaced about shoulder width. This will be your starting posición.
Alternating between each of your manos, perform the movement by extending the wrist as though you were rolling up a newspaper. Continue alternating back and forth until failure.
Reverse the motion by flexing the wrist, rolling the opposite direction. Continue the alternating motion until failure.

name: Yoke Walk
instructions: The yoke is usually done with a yoke apparatus, but is sometimes seen with refrigerators or other heavy objects.
Begin by racking the apparatus across the back of the shoulders. With your head looking forward and back arched, Levanta the yoke by driving through the heels.

Begin walking as quickly as possible using short, quick steps. You may Sostén the side posts of the yoke to help steady it and Sostén it in posición. Continue for the given distance as fast as possible, usually 75-100 feet.

name: Zercher Squats
instructions: This exercise is best performed inside a Sentadilla rack for safety purposes. To begin, first set the bar on a rack that best matches your height. The correct height should be anywhere above the waist but below the chest. Once the correct height is chosen and the bar is loaded, lock your manos together and place the bar on top of your brazos in between the forearm and upper arm.
Levanta the bar up so that it is resting on top of your forearms. If you are holding the bar properly, it should look as if you have your brazos crossed but with a bar running across them.

Step away from the rack and posición your piernas using a shoulder width medium stance with the toes slightly pointed out. Mantén your head up at all times as looking down will get you off balance and also maintain a straight back. This will be your starting posición. (Note: For the purposes of this discussion we will use the medium stance described above which targets overall development; however you can choose any of the three stances discussed in the foot stances section).

Begin to Baja the bar by bending the rodillas as you maintain a straight posture with the head up. Continue down until the angle between the upper leg and the calves becomes slightly less than 90-degrees (which is the point in which the upper piernas are below parallel to the suelo). Inhala as you perform this portion of the movement. Tip: If you performed the exercise correctly, the front of the rodillas should make an imaginary straight line with the toes that is perpendicular to the front. If your rodillas are past that imaginary line (if they are past your toes) then you are placing undue stress on the knee and the exercise has been performed incorrectly.
Begin to raise the bar as you Exhala by pushing the suelo with the ball of your foot mainly as you straighten the piernas again and go back to the starting posición.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Párate up with your torso upright and a dumbbell in each hand being held at brazos length. The elbows should be close to the torso.
Make sure the palms of the manos are facing each other. This will be your starting posición.

While holding the upper arm stationary, Curl the weights while contracting the biceps as you Respira out. Only the forearms should move. Your wrist should rotate so that you have a supinated (palms up) grip. Continue the movement until your biceps are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder level.
Sostén the contracted posición for a second as you squeeze the biceps.
Now during the contracted posición, rotate your wrist until you now have a pronated (palms facing down) grip with the thumb at a higher posición than the pinky.
Lentamente begin to bring the mancuernas back down using the pronated grip.
As the mancuernas close your thighs, start rotating the wrist so that you go back to a neutral (palms facing your cuerpo) grip.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.

name: Zottman Preacher Curl
instructions: Grab a dumbbell in each hand and place your upper brazos on top of the preacher Banco or the incline Banco. The mancuernas should be held at shoulder height and the elbows should be flexed. Sostén the mancuernas with the palms of your manos facing down. This will be your starting posición.
As you Respira in, Lentamente Baja the mancuernas keeping the palms down until your upper arm is extended and your biceps are fully stretched.
Now rotate your wrists once you are at the bottom of the movement so that the palms of the manos are facing up.

As you Exhala, use your biceps to Curl the weights up until they are fully contracted and the mancuernas are at shoulder height. Again, remember that to ensure full contraction you need to bring that small finger higher than the thumb.
Squeeze the biceps hard for a second at the contracted posición and rotate your wrists so that the palms are facing down again.
Repite for the recommended amount of repetitions.
